015         .

! [ Image result for Nuclear Fission ] ( https://i1.wp.com/kidspressmagazine.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/dreamstimem35501453.jpg )

‘    ,      ,       ‘

* ,    [  22, 1921 ] *

“          ,     !         ,    !   ,        .      ,     . ”       .

! [ Image result for floating reactors ] ( https://i1.wp.com/cdn.images.dailystar.co.uk/dynamic/1/photos/350000/620x/floating-nuclear-power-plant-488893.jpg )

         

Floating reactors can support offshore drilling and production rigs by providing them with large amounts of power, thus reducing the need to store extra fuel on board for power generation. That means a much safer rig.

China Nuclear Group

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

https://link.springer.com/content/pdf/10.1007%2Fs13280-015-0732-y.pdf

http://www.oecd.org/environment/nuclearenergyinthe21stcentury.htm

blob:https://www.dailymotion.com/86cffd55-0baa-418c-9b6f-8e7a606b129c

https://www.c-span.org/video/?326786-1/hearing-nuclear-deterrence-21st-century

“ 2025       , 50       2.8   . ”

 . , ,     .

https://media.c-spanvideo.org/trimmed/program/040/405246/program.405246.MP4-D20.mp4?

: 21    50       [ Fission Power ]      .   [ Fusion Power ]             .  30    450     11%    .  60     .  30          .      ,      ,       ,     ,      .

! [ China Floating Nuclear Reactor ACP 100 ] ( https://www.popsci.com/g00/3c-7x78x78x78.qpqtdj.dpn/c-7NPSFQIFVT34x24iuuqtx3ax2fx2fx78x78x78.qpqtdj.dpnx2ftjuftx2fqpqtdj.dpnx2fgjmftx2ftuzmftx2f7662yx2fqvcmjdx2fjnbhftx2f3128x2f19x2fbdq211.kqhx3fjuplx3d1i8-P4Uvx26gdx3d61x2c61x26j21d.nbsl.jnbhf.uzqf_$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$ )

       

21           37     32.4  [ 32400  ]    .   20     .   20        .         ,      ,   / /      /     . 2017            .            .

! [ China Floating Nuclear Reactor CNNP ] ( https://www.popsci.com/g00/3c-7x78x78x78.qpqtdj.dpn/c-7NPSFQIFVT34x24iuuqtx3ax2fx2fx78x78x78.qpqtdj.dpnx2ftjuftx2fqpqtdj.dpnx2fgjmftx2ftuzmftx2f7662yx2fqvcmjdx2fjnbhftx2f3128x2f19x2fdijob-gmpbujoh-ovdmfbs-qmbou761y51192564986730.kqhx3fjuplx3dHRVFfzbCx26gdx3d61x2c61x26j21d.nbsl.jnbhf.uzqf_$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$ )

CNNP hopes to have the first of these floating reactors in operation around 2020. Lloyd 's Registry will assist with regulatory and safety issues.

China National Nuclear Power

     150       [ Chinese Shipyards & Electric Machinery Companies, Nuclear Reactor Suppliers ]  .  2020    ACPR50S REACTOR   200  , [ 60   ]   2016   .  2015   ACP100 REACTOR 450 MWt  [ 140   ]      .

! [ Image result for floating reactors ] ( https://i0.wp.com/i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2013/07/09/article-2358732-1ABBBB1B000005DC-943_634x444.jpg )

Floating Reactor Building Model

! [ Image result for floating reactors ] ( https://i2.wp.com/scitechdaily.com/images/Offshore-Floating-Nuclear-Plant.jpg )

   10     1967    .  1968  1975      .   2010  21,000   70     .  2018 - 2019     .  [ SMR - SMALL MODULAR REACTOR ] [  ]      .           :  135 / MWh.       /        ,     .

! [ Floating Nclear Power Plant model.jpg ] ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fd/FloatingNclearPowerPlantmodel.jpg/300px-FloatingNclearPowerPlantmodel.jpg )

*Model of the Russian Floating Power Project 20870 ( back ) *

*with a desalination unit ( front ) *

! [ China Floating Nuclear Reactor ACPR50 ] ( https://www.popsci.com/g00/3c-7x78x78x78.qpqtdj.dpn/c-7NPSFQIFVT34x24iuuqtx3ax2fx2fx78x78x78.qpqtdj.dpnx2ftjuftx2fqpqtdj.dpnx2fgjmftx2ftuzmftx2f7662yx2fqvcmjdx2fjnbhftx2f3128x2f19x2fdhobdqs61t-4dhosfbdups.kqhx3fjuplx3dFD4EIXSix26gdx3d61x2c61x26j21d.nbsl.jnbhf.uzqf_$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$/$ )

ACPR50

This China Nuclear Group model for a floating reactor is the competitor to the CNNP design.

China Nuclear Group

! [ Image result for small mudular reactors SMR ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.iaea.org/nuclearenergy/nuclearpower/Downloadable/SMR/images/image3-w238.jpg )

  

++++++++++++++++++++++++++

  ,   

*! [ vver-layout ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2007/06/vver-layout.jpg?w=529&h=475 ) *

“          ,     !         ,    !   ,        .      ,     . ”

      .

“ 2025       , 50       2.8   . ”

 . , ,     .

‘    ,      ,       ‘

* ,    [  22, 1921 ] *

    ! ,     !

   
   !

. 

*! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706141a.jpg ) *

           ,    .  ,           ,       ,      !             .            .  9/11      ,  ,  ,  ,      , ,  .                 ? 21     ,           !

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706141aa.jpg )

,        ,         50     40,000 MWe   ( 30% )  .        ( > 1100 MWe ) 14     .       ,         .

1950   30   435   [    ,   ,       ]   370,000 MWe ( 16% )   .  56  284       .

    220 ,   ( Submarines )  ,   .         20   39%     .      2.6%   20  .       ,    .

        .      ,      .             .              .

    ,  ,            .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706141b.jpg )

       [ International Atomic Energy Agency ( IAEA ) ]         , , , ,  ( Decommissioning )         .    ,        ,        .    : , , , , , , , , , ,  ,             ,  [ Automatic Shutdown Systems ]     .              “   ” [ Containment Structure ]   .            .             ,      .    !      !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/03/fig-5-kudunkulam-vver-site.jpg?w=584 )

,     ,          .               .         .       .           .   ,              ?                ?    .   .                .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706141c.jpg )

      ,  ,               . ,       .      [ CO2, SO2, & Nitrous Gases ]  .         ,           .       .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706141d.jpg )

  ?   ?      .        ,        .                    .             ?            ?           ,      .      .          .    ( 435+284+220 ) 939                ?       .    45            .           .           . ,         .      ,   ,                .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/06/40706141f.jpg )

         .    ,          <<    >> [ National Security Secret ] .   <<   >>     ?               .             .     ,        ,       .             .      ,      ?

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/03/russian-vver-models.jpg?w=584 )

( http://www.thinnai.com/?module=displaystory&story_id=20706073&format=html   ?   ?   . )

      , 

+++++++++

<<    , “     3   ! ” .  “    ’ , “    ’   .             ,           .       . >>

<<   .      .         . ,      .                 .     .       .      ,   . >>

<<       ,         .    , “      ,     ! ”  . >>

<<        (  ) ..  ,     .      .          .        .      .                 >>

+++++++++

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2003/03/sc03230335.jpg )

      

2003  17        14    ,    ..              : “          ,      !        ,    !   ,        .      ,     .    ,   ,     [ BARC, NPCIL, BHEL ]      ,   ,   [ Water & Energy Production through Consortium ]    [ Mission ]   ” .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2006/07/sc0707061g.jpg )

“  [ 2004 ]   6  3         !    33%    , 17%     ! 2025   8  ,         !        !         !            ” .

   

  : “      ,  !     ,      ,          .   . :      !   ,   .     ,   97%    .      7500   !        .  60%    ,        .            ” .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2003/03/sc03230338.jpg )

    ,         . , ,      30,000      .     , 16       [ Demin Water ]  .       [ Reverse Osmosis ]   1,8    . 40         ,       [ Multi Stage Flash ]           .      [ BHEL ]     12        .

2004  13      [ Chairman, Indian Atomic Energy Commission ]          , “     [ Bhabha Atomic Energy Centre ( BARC ) ]           [ 2002-2004 ]  1.8   [ 480,000 gallon/day ]     .     ,            4.8   [  1.27   ]    .    6.3   [  1.66   ]  . ”

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/03/fig-2-inner-steel-containment.jpg?w=584 )

    [ Hybrid Desalination ]  .   [ Multi Stage Flash ( MSF ) ]      170 MWe        .        1.8   .     ,            [ 12-14  litre/day ] !         .   ,      .

2025       , 50       2.8          ,  .  !     2003        .  ‘    ‘      !

! [ Russian VVER & Chernobyl Reactors ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/03/russian-vver-chernobyl-reactors.jpg?w=529&h=782 )

         ,          !   ,           ,              .

  ,          .     ,          .       ,      .      ,      .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/03/fig-6-kudunkulam-demonstration.jpg?w=530&h=344 )

     

          !   ,   ,  , , , , , , ,     !  ,      ,  ,  ,  ,    “    ” [ Risks ]     .       .       .    , ,        ,      .  21            .

       21             !        !         ,     .           ! 2001  11     ,            .     737               .    ,   .       !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/09/40709061ab.jpg )

Pressurized Water Reactor

Schematic

 ( 1780-1850 )             .      , , ,     .                 .                    .      50  900   ,   ,      ,  400        .   ,           1957    ,       [ International Atomic Energy Agency ( IAEA ) ] .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/09/40709061b.jpg )

International Atomic Energy Agency, Vienna

1986           .         .              ,   .   1989         “       ” WANO [ World Association of Nuclear Operation ]        .    WANO        ,        .

+++++++++++++++++

:

      .         .    [ Opaque Envelope ]         .  ,         ,    .

*  [ Emmy Noether Research Group for Massive Star Formation, Germany ] *

! [ protostar-formation ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/9wVtAuaTDLfnpplLnC2NkE5-ASYD6pHuT0vbjvW2X46X6Lm9bQJbGWGYuAfZIIN75I94RIQdzSYHYBMAcsJxNChxwDJDxS8deYkEreq84eCUMZiMb2IMRTiKUAGJ60idbe5q7G935g7A=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/protostar-formation.jpg?w=584&h=423 )

       ,            .    ,      ,     .

*  [    ] *

! [ Life cycle of a Massive Star ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/0cm50JbG9ctZAFJoyUH7Vlv5mRJ3B0MgFAqGWYOKBHQtoCkZD-o2x-xSDOCJeRi6wI8trYgpVQDEzl8JW1myVfr9XpjW4FZjuGXhYVnMshAQfbx1gCSetPRJIjiMbTHUAh_l7rZDgKx3OZablMIIcw=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/life-cycle-of-a-massive-star.jpg?w=595&h=401 )

:               ( New Star Systems ) .                     .  5              ,    ,          !

! [ luminosity-of-stars-1 ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/989a_EM8MqcWm0HC6KFSkyFyyAA68bcOHX3vstRbIM2pCXbjQD8ffqZ6UhFJh4MFTNA08LqAeoPdnqHhDviaQhAJfXa1vwDlGgoFidj7J4A1ze9CONnSFVsudLFrOTg-3JFJR3GNoIH883=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/luminosity-of-stars-1.jpg?w=662&h=606 )

     

  ,     ,  .   :          .          .     ,    [ GRB – German Research Foundation ] [ Emmy Noether Research Group for Massive Star Formation ]     [ Rolf Kuiper ] .

       [ Computer Numerical Simulation ]    .     [ High Performance Computers ]  .          .         [ Accretion Disk ]  .        ,      .

[ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9j1AKzICLts?version=3&rel=1&fs=1&autohide=2&showsearch=0&showinfo=1&ivloadpolicy=1&wmode=transparent ]

[ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0wP5GPFALCg?version=3&rel=1&fs=1&autohide=2&showsearch=0&showinfo=1&ivloadpolicy=1&wmode=transparent ]

! [ Life cycle of a Star ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/-pu9nmzjRe9uNBpuYd7yrfeCf5JwM1nMBzPu485iQEGTD47SSCpABglOe5kOvFZnVInKQdf5nW7sqUZHdSAuK1fV1VMXKeuUyUZ70iQT8I3A1XibnHZzvP7qICjrPqnkVuLKVuR7d2U_k=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/life-cycle-of-a-star.jpg?w=584&h=305 )

     ,           !        ( Density )      ( Muli-colour Bands ) .        !       .       ,        !   “   ” ,   ( Protostars & Protoplanets )    ( Steller System Forerunners ) .

! [ luminosity-of-stars-2 ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/VYHAeDgmtvecq79Gv7V5fErp45CRgr7OaDV1AXl-gMMzUnQTgXFuSKkV2RwsNwQvTm5cH3xz18R8WfOo6LLTo04fuq4NrhsTko4FW6dcAYxTzQUQsa9IVJ51Tz5hXtK0QvxyB-2eTP-N=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/luminosity-of-stars-2.jpg?w=584&h=582 )

       ( 1910-1995 )   ,  ( Black Holes )       .        .      1.4           ( Neutron Star or Black Hole )   .   1.4   “   ” ( Chandrasekher Limit )     .  “  ”  ( White Dwarf Stars )  ,   .

! [ luminosity-of-stars-3 ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/vJJ5m4Mf16F2Z-7Hs1NcEmq3IECzuk6HpRZPXLU_OHFNbDf-JpqHbczNzwmBPrrFPlN7MZQJSE94qm88VaVnsCwSzTMc26dHU03Bte2Ujq2qnflWYUBZz1Pou9jsPY8RewQ7RHe8dfR4UUr4=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/luminosity-of-stars-3.jpg?w=584&h=539 )

    !

    ,          !    [ Stellar Parallaxes ]  , 1838      .        .      ,    !

! [ ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/byRJC1PvQIeolBYxN1nXBabGj1PPjXAn8SG4gcdCdch80OFOGnEyvYzuVu9dPTIUe2G-cKLLW3-iNk9sL5GQxUXqvSOiYvQa3txCfqKHuwS18nXg=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271aa.jpg )

   ,       [ Milky Way Galaxy ] !        !   ,       ,         !          ,  100     !      !   !

! [ luminosity-of-stars ] ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/e9sFmb4pbluZwQGUTgKoHToR0BhcWDNa3BdLR-A7XEeZiDikfmLB8SJJ6l04p4HsWiJ4QuI4-jnUGUhJPjJAJZL4D4uOf0LeHLbcvZj4x9fhZq8MB3DHyxdiSp9KxZ6JoJSea2eAdw=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/luminosity-of-stars.jpg?w=584&h=453 )

  !    !    !     !         ,   ,  ,  ,  ,   [ Light Spectrum ] ,        !

        .      5000-10,000   !    [ Nova Star ]  .  [ Supernova ]         100    .    , , , , ,        ,       !

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/bei3AZ201gHsx8GSm0R9mOIrrYmmn40LE2VujBzCeEUTwyV0T6ypHkgGJsXrxH9wSNWW-YuKI1fCDcPPFQofT92oEZQ2bUWE7DrcQ7tlo7YK9PUQ=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271ab.jpg )

Supernova & White Dwarf

   1.4  [ 1.4 times Solar Mass ]      [ White Dwarf ]     . [     ( Mass ) ,        .   !    [ Density ]   ! ]      ,   [ Supernova Explosion ]      ,    [ Neutron Star ] .   10    ,   ,    [ Black Hole ] .     ,  ,           .

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/LwnhsErP1P2GA6VpIJ8R9vYYfdIIip0dVi1CoX9P-TibcMeMoNpvqFG2LrzpcU2GgCzOQd3UsFIbk6and0zgybko_H5vwbQXvFHisMrPpabfRukA=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271ac.jpg )

   

        1910    19   . 1930          ..   [ Nephew ] ,    !        .         .       ! 1918    ,       [ 1922-1925 ]    .

! [ Star Life cycle ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/OgWWaBTOS5VuxrL1NspwiClISAR88LtGk1DIZfX4PxfH1pJb283Cj-wr1qTT5QwyGtriH4VTyuOGL91pPfCbJpgn-BK9k8leC3EDaVoKwPkoQZgD21INLC1pBlUlUJZcae_mVJ9l=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/star-life-cycle.jpg?w=584&h=407 )

  ..       , 1930     B.Sc.  .     ,       .        1933   Ph.D.  . 1936         .     [ Sir Arthur Eddington ] ,  [ E.A. Milne ]        .

! [ ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/A4-gtou0WdJ5Q9B6hXNAzQJAlIdOYncI-uRcTcjiazkP-tooBwAApRETT-nEHl7nbWDj57Sc7n_2zpBfim1RJSbMQrB66iHKwzv-5E8XnNuw2Wug=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271ad.jpg )

Sun ’ s Evolutionary Tracks

     1937    [ Research Assistant ]   ,  . 1938     [ Astrophysics ]  ,       [ Morton Hull ]   .     ,    [ Yerks Observatory, Williams Bay, Wisconsin ] .  1953    . 1952         ,      1986   .     ,      [ Theory on the Later Stages of Stellar Evolution ]    1983   ,    · [ William Fowler ]  .      [ Neutron Stars ] .  [ Black Holes ]    .

! [ ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/0OUuF37AHIW0zsocMyurrsGLJyF2pd1f667woz2BOjZHp4cqKqPifQgivfjyWukTdkgjb1t5gPvuYKxejZShVGReJ30Osn2M1rRl1uf3OIqeIXj1YA=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271ae.jpg )

H-R Diagram

 ,  

       [ Einjar Hertzsprung ]     [ Henri Russell ]     ,  ,  

    .  - [ Hertzsprung-Russell, H-R Diagram ]             .    [ Luminosity in Y-Axis ] ,    [ Temperature in X-Axis ] ,         .  10%        [ Main Sequence ]  .    ,      .       !     [ Super Giants ] !     [ Giant Stars ] !        [ Red Giants ] !       ,      [ White Dwarfs ] .

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/tb0VI-yXnn1bD6BoU3CswZdUSXJgCWZhswMRbAUUBxkWOrgQxueEVxSBK55yUjBre2q-HYcGGe7b4eLt4GGQ6Uaqumiywpa6QWpCI-XvqTWmcgng=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271af.jpg )

Supergiants & White Dwarfs

    ,       !       [ Red Giant ] ,      ,      ,    ,        ,      !     ,       .     ,     ,    [ Thermonuclear Reaction ]    .     ,     [ Sustained Fusion Reaction ] !

1930   ,          ,         .       [ White Dwarfs ]   .       [ Nuclei ]     [ Extremely High Density ]   ,     100,000-1000,000        !

! [ ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/bnXAYi3KyWNRGHBieGGrTrufEUklGv9uVuGhzMbDmYgYA5vj4JZZZJCk5yfoOxtbdfdLN0-UfzZMOVFT3vK6eCSwgeVgqKS0ts7YJ6i0kkF0V_=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271b.jpg )

Structure of a Star

     

       [ Evolution of Stars ] ,   [ Structure ]      [ Process of Energy Transfer ] ,      .  [ White Dwarfs ]   ,   ·  [ Ralph Fowler ] ,   [ Arthur Eddington ]        .

  [ Degenerate Matter ]    [ Extremely High Density ]  ,     [ Ionized Nuclei ] ,        1926     .

! [ Image result for subramanian chandrasekher ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/eYxp24vUQVtyMZULFYuVVD5rgutKP5CxAdLM1LrWsmADiIhcEIzRRVPYRLZo23lkHQRzL88-Ei1igEy_qWuJS3qIQNLWKq1chR1UcuVDWiXc190JyV4Pr-AJp9KWKhtG5GkK6FPbXEU87E-rMjfFCWg62eTH3Iez=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i2.wp.com/image.slidesharecdn.com/scientists-140222211810-phpapp02/95/scientists-8-638.jpg )

        ,        .   ‘     ‘ [ An Introduction to the Study of Stellar Structure ]  ,           ,           .       [ Mass ]    !  ,    !    [ Gravitational Collapse ] ,     [ Relatively Constant ]     .    ,    [ Highly Compressed Electrons ]  ,   ,    [ White Dwarf ]    !

! [ ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/yn5MMMRf4z1UVo5aHqfrMnYEvuc6vXcsO9sM0xnUtokedMYrC_rb6ByBhiz4m2ph-MtRWcpQzxTawnSslVzPGHDynKsY5bjvER4VJtfKYyhraZ=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271c.jpg )

What is a White Dwarf ?

      ?

1936  1939     [ Theory of White Dwarfs ] .    ,    [ Radius is inversely proportional to Mass ] !    1.4       !        1.4      ,    [ Nova Explosion ]  !          !      ,          !        1.4       !         [ 1.4 ] ‘   ‘ [ Chandrasekar Limit ]    .

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/E_sl-Ub5Q7DpMV3wJZ7qYqxHan5QmrNzL3zYRfnpKGBvR2q473zfBKRsSNZ4Y4upWa9o1n3qNBvP-DZ4EbfhD8TbIUxgYVRluEVSvZl5pmfo5O7H=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271d.jpg )

Red Giant turning to White Dwarf

      [ Special Theory of Relativity ]     [ Principles of Quantum Physics ]    ,   . ‘    1.4      ,          .         [ Thermonuclear fuel ]    ,           ’ .

       ,     [ 1.4 ]    !      ,     [ Nuclear-Burning Lifetime ] ,     [ Neutron Star ] !    [ Black Hole ] !             .           ,    [ Supernovas ]   . [     ( Internal Nuclear Explosion )     ,   ] .

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/zTdrRyZzunGXq4RQ-iY0vJuyAdeXpTWu85emm-4oYgdMABEePGDxppCPStYXvzZyIP-5L-ytdRGUyxWFPjGS8mtbqEm5RjzHv-uXx-iGCvnHIb=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271e.jpg )

Star turning to Black Dwarf

   !

1968      ,     [ Archibald Wheeler ] .          [ John Mitchell ( 1783 ) ] ,        [ Piere Simon de Laplace ( 1796 ) ]       .

 [ Black Hole ]    [ Highly Dense ] ,      !           .  ,   ,    [ Electromagnetic Radiation ]     !

! [ star-formation-cycle ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/VQJaAzefOewmjY5In9xHMTwFZg6f5rXW7wTNcHFTtlZEQ4nva66WyBabB45WUeSeV2NRKX2BiYCdsdVOhcjInQe8_E5IMfLiKyin3xqqido-lct-JhL3Nka-IOU20W5QrqyhpyxTl1g=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/star-formation-cycle.jpg?w=584&h=389 )

  

        ;       !       ,       !     [ X-Rays ] ,     [ Radio Telescopes ]    .        ,   ,  [ Gravitation ]     !       [ Spherical Boundary ]  .      .   !       .   [ Gravitation Collapse ]   !   !                .  ,       ;     .

! [ our-sun ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/Rc7jtArgt_CQhA6JIcEnPg6iSjb1TLJYJlNlqUv2ILQwU3-eNby-nb9kfHcDFWvA3E7eKsoJXp37JsTueiqbXiugzxUWsX2WWw5Ne9QlOAojMHhnY4S6f4f3iGcDPw=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/our-sun.jpg?w=584&h=417 )

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/Cix7kz5IQcZ0mxX62F3HaChTfGgwfpnaf-cprWnIexS9GE4WZryj1NlnO5pCICNmsYbcJLnaspCKB4DjWZBaMArPexsfl4eP4QmUre-X9I9pVycY=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271f.jpg )

Star Structure

    

       !     !   ,     !        !   [ White Dwarfs ]   .              !

    [ Final Collapse ]  ,      [ Heavier Elements ]     !     [ Supernova ]     [ Galaxies ]     !    ,    ,    [ Core ]  !   ,     ,      !     [ Extremely Dense ]  ,    ,    [ Neutron Star ] !

! [ ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/wjm66eepzWd7xLmpFOBQl3MKk7oOLUa79ncoIztb_WQYoWIqehSaCCe92zxvPNDYWq8n0s-zLD-tO6NS3jJz4KHBfInkqrlfoaziW45tbYi2xm=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271g.jpg )

Steller Formation seen By Hubble Telescope

        [ Beams of Radio Waves ] ,          [ Pulses ] !      [ Pulsar ]  .    9 !        !

     !  !

       ,      !    [ Radius ]  ,       !

! [ Star formation process ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/sBhwm3OghtSQO6D6nNiJII2WmcpYxulcsFPcXieNLDDvuwtd3VFgDoX9trFJoBwve-t2EGu7m6AShxgWJqSobUv4DkWeQaffpi4jH4ujn4MYHFcoT8fhyeyxSd6_UamA7niKZKWA=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/star-formation-process.jpg?w=584 )

   ,    ,      !        ,     !

        !      ,   .    [ Galaxy ]   [ Milky Way ] ,   !         !        .         1  [ 1.5 km ]    !     [ Other Galaxies ]    !

The Spinning Black Hole

    

  [ Red Giant ]        !    ,       ,     [ Luminosity ]    .         [ Supernova ]  .    [ 1.4    ]       .      [ Parent Atoms ]    ,   [ Matter ]    [ Degenerate Gas ] !      ,    [ Gas Laws ]  !     !        ,  ,   [ Yellow Dwarf ] ,   [ Red Dwarf ] ,   [ Brown Dwarf ]    [ Black Dwarf ]     !

! [ ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/IqtY0u4wGXeBCKrbO8kKg-xWxHe0Ovna2AN3wbCIEU4TKWf-3-xO8ZP99Bv-CkMVVzNq0tH462F5jR4iOoneQ0kxEFs_g3ke0lRBS-bjxXM8q2=s0-d-e1-fthttps://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271i.jpg )

Supernova turning to a Black Hole

    

1952  1971     [ Astrophysics Journal ]     [ Managing Editor ]  .       [ American Astronomical Society ]   . 1953      [ Royal Astronomical Society ]    . 1955      [ National Academy of Science ]  .    .       [ Energy Transfer By Radiation in Stellar Atmospheres ] ,     [ Convection in Solar Surface ] ,     [ An Introduction to the Study of Stellar Structure ( 1939 ) ] ,    [ Priciples of Stellar Dynamics

( 1942 ) ] ,   [ Radiative Transfer ( 1950 ) ] ,   &    [ Hydrodynamic & Hydromagnetic Stability ( 1961 ) ] ,    [ Mathematical Theory of Black Holes ( 1983 ) ] .   [ Truth & Beauty ] ,    [ Aesthetics & Motivation in Science ( 1987 ) ] .     [ The Polarization of Starlight ] ,      [ Convection of Fluids in Magnetic Fields ] .

! [ Solar Sytem formation ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/WQCNcOjO-ZkQxJuu-ZdV57EfrDFBsW9_kEnTDQbuN72Tt2Qe5XuZIweMQkW7nafVhvOfl1Q5PUk8cNlikK9p9ow5f4qGI8LK8hzNvi24Bkg8QZjp60jOIoq0Mj1OmcT429rPIV9E=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/solar-sytem-formation.jpg?w=584 )

1999       [ Premier Unmanned Scientific Satellite ]    [ X-Ray Observatory ] .         [ Advanced X-Ray Astrophysics Facility ] . “    ”    ,    ,     .          .     ,      [ Pulsar in Crab Nebula ] ,   [ Cassiopeia A Supernova ]  .

! [ Image result for subramanian chandrasekher ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/h3jSHdmaeJDtv0btQXVyBfIldhS1so1MoIyH2YgeVZoyTEQXRUrVSUjiRLkjxk-vhrHdkpHPuSidxCqxjaNO8JrCnXjPW_Iruch82B-EYn0MK3OaqvxJzuQuASpeM37nptbvgwy3CfE7mIoaoQ=s0-d-e1-fthttps://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/2c/a2/9e/2ca29e3494ee7ce5b2d77f359d02c187.jpg )

  84      1995    21   .   1995     : ‘     ’ [ Newton ‘ Principia ’ for the Common Reader ] .       [ Tsung-Dao Lee, Chen Ning Yang ] 1957    [ Particle Physics ]   !     ,              [ Enrico Fermi ] !             . ..  ,             !

++++++++++++++++++

017     :   ,      !

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

     .

++++++++++++

   ,
  
 
  !
  
 
   
 
  !
  ,
 
 
  !
  
 
    !
  
 
  !
  

   

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/10/spinning-comets.jpg?w=584&h=400 )

    

                [ 41P /Tuttle-Giacobini-Kresak ]        .    24    48  ,      .     ,  ,        .

! [ Image result for Comet 41P Tuttle-Giacobini-Kresak Orbit ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.skyandtelescope.com/wp-content/uploads/2017-04-0458e401930039dCometa14plgroi.jpg )

 [ 41P /Tuttl… ]    5.4    .    1858     .  [ H. Tuttle ] .    ,  1907  .  [ M. Giacobini ]   .   ,   1951  .  [ K. Kresac ]   ,       .

2017         .  13   [ 21  .. ]        .   [ Comet Nucleus ]   [ 1.4 . ] .       .

2017               18  [ 30  . ] ,   93   [ 150  . ]  .        4.5     .    ,   ,       ,     .      [ Cyanogen ] .     [ Coma ]    [ Jet Streams ]   .           .     24   ,  48    .       .    ,  49     -     .

! [ Halley's comet -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/halleys-comet-1.jpg?w=866&h=488 )

Comet Halley

https://youtu.be/16z1ZUMnGn0

https://youtu.be/Tp2P4ht2WNM

https://youtu.be/J7I9z6Lcemo

++++++++++++++

! [ Comet Outbursts -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comet-outbursts-2.jpg?w=584&h=646 )

! [ Comet Outbursts -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comet-outbursts-1.jpg?w=584&h=621 )

  [ 2015 ]       ,            .         .

         .          .

  * [ ESA Rosetta Project Scientist ] *

! [ Halley's comet -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/halleys-comet-2.jpg?w=584 )

     ,      [ Atum Region ]  [ Large Lobe ]     .         ,   [ Dust Cone ]      .        ,        .

*  [ Eberhard Grun, Nuclear Physics, Max-Plank Institute, Heidelberg, Germany ] *

! [ Which Instruments saw outbursts ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/which-instruments-saw-outbursts.jpg?w=584&h=646 )

2015       

   2015  19   -  [ Comet Name : 67P/Churyumov-Gerasimenko ]      [ Comet Outburst ]   . 20           [ ,  , ,     ] [ Cameras, Dust Collectors, Gas & Plasma Analysers ]    .         .         [ Royal Astronomical Society ]  ,      .              [ Eberhard Grun, Max-Plank Institute, Heidelberg, Germany ] .

! [ Comet Halley ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/comet-halley.jpg?w=584 )

   2016   9:40  [ GMT ]      [ Comet Dusty Coma ]         .      100      [ ALICE ]   .        [ Ultraviolet Brightness of the Sunlight Reflected by the Comet Nucleus ] .     6   . ,   [ ROSINA & RPC ]   [ 1.5 TO 2.5  ]  ,   .   [ MIRO ]     30.C  .  3  10     [ GIADA ] 200  .        [ Dust Grains ]  .        [ Comet Coma Density ]  .

     ,      [ Atum Region ]  [ Large Lobe ]     .        ,   [ Dust Cone ]      .        ,        .        [ Thermal Stress ]          .               .

++++++++++++++++

! [ Difficult landing ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/difficult-landing.jpg?w=692&h=414 )

    [ Philae Lander ]      .          .     ,     .     .           .

*  [     ] *

240 .. [ 150  ]        ,    180 .. [ 110  ]  .

*  [      ] *

! [ Rosetta probe landing ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/rosetta-probe-landing.jpg?w=622&h=722 )

“             .      ,       .          . ”

*   [ ESA Director General ] [ November 12, 2014 ] *

“   [ 2004 – 2014 ]   ,                 . ”

*  [ ESA Director of Scince & Robotic Exploration ] [ November 12, 2014 ] *

“      ?       ?  ,        !       ,      !    [ Deep Impact ]      .  , ,  ,      ! ”

*  [ Acting Diretor, Solar System Division, NASA ] *

! [ Roetta Probe on comet -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/roetta-probe-on-comet-1.jpg?w=680&h=561 )

Mothership Rosetta Drops Lander on the Comet

     

2014  12          !     * [ ESA -European Space Agency Spaceship Rosetta ] *         * [ Philae Lander ] *     . 1969              . 2004   2       10   , 6.4  ..  [ 3.8   ]     * [ Comet : 67P /Churyumov-Gerasimenko ] * 2014  6    ,    ,    .    30 ..  , 34,000 mph [ 55,000 kmh ]    .      ,  ,     .

! [ First comet image from Philae ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/first-comet-image-from-philae.jpg?w=634&h=670 )

      510  .. [ 300   ]     .      ,         .        :   1 . “ ,          .      ,     , ”    [ ESA Director of Human Spaceflight Operations ] .    : 18 kms [ 3600 mph ] .        .       : 1.6   [ 1.3   ]

   

    ,       .   60   .    12   !         ,       .        .         ,      .   2015       .            .    13          ,      .  [  6, 2014 ]    20 .. [ 12  ]      .     8 .. [ 5  ]      .  [ 2015  13 ]       185  .. [  110   ]   .

   ,          . 4.5           ,      ,           .

! [ Comet chasing probe ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/comet-chasing-probe.jpg?w=692&h=552 )

2014                “  ” [ Orion Spacecraft ]   7  14     [ Asteroid ]      .                .              . ”

*  ,   [ Dr. Paul Abell, NASA Jonson Space Center, Houston ]
*

“       !         !      !       !         ( Porous Organic Mass ) ,        . ”

  ,  ·  , 

! [ Rosetta Mission ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-mission1.jpg?w=658&h=908 )

     ?

                    ,     !     [ 1000  . ]    ,   ,        [ Gravity Assist Swing ]      [ Elliptical Path & Velocity ] .               !            .               !

           .                 !            .  [ Asteroids ]       .      ?            .

! [ Philae Lander parts ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-lander-parts.jpg?w=742&h=450 )

   

    : 1000   [   : 1.325   ]           [ European Space Agency ( ESA ) ]  : , , , , , , ,  .         [ German Aerospace Research Institute ( DLR ) ]     .

    [ 3  x 2  x 2  ] , ,  .  : 100  .    14    [ Solar Panels ]     .     64  .    2.2         .      .

! [ ESA Control Room -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/esa-control-room-2.jpg?w=584 )

* 11   :*

1. “  ”     [ ALlCE: Ultraviolet Imaging Spectrameter ]

2. “  ”    [ CONSERT: Comet Nucleus Sounding ]

3. “  ”       [ COSIMA: Cometary Secondary Ion Mass Analyser ]

4. “  ”   ,   [ GIADIA: Grain Impact Analyser & Dust Accumulator ]

5. “  ”     [ MIDAS: Micro-Imaging Analysing System ]

6. “  ”     [ MICRO: Microwave Instrument for Rosetta Orbiter ]

7. “  ”     [ OSIRIS: Rosetta Orbiter Imaging System ]

! [ Rosetta Program -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/rosetta-program-1.jpg?w=584 )

8. “  ” ,        [ ROSINA: Rosetta Orbiter Spectrometer for Ion & Neutral Analysis ]

9. “  ”     [ RPC: Rosetta Plasma Consortium ]

10 “  ”     [ RSI: Radio Science Investigation ]

11 “  ” ,      [ VIRTIS: Visible & Infrared Mapping Spectrometer ]

    :

   9  :

1. “  ”   -   [ APXS: Alpha Proton X-Ray Spectrometer ]

2. “ / ”      [ CIVA/ROLIS: Rosetta Lander Imaging System ]

3. “  ”    [ CONSERT: Comet Nucleus Sounding ]

Philae Lander

! [ Philae Lander ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/philae-lander.jpg?w=540 )

4. “  ”      [ COSAC: Cometary Sampling & Composition Experiment ]

5. “   ”    [ MODULUS PTOLEMY: Evolved Gas Analyser ]

6. “  ”      [ MUPUS: Multi-Purpose Sensor for Surface & Subsurface Science ]

7. “  ”  ,   [ ROMAP: RoLand Magentometer & Plasma Monitor ]

8. “ 2 ”    [ SD2: Sample & Distribution Device ]

9. “  ”    ,    [ SESAME: Surface Electrical & Acoustic Monitoring Experiment, Dust Impact Collector ]

  :     [ European Space Operation Centre ( ESOC ) , Darmstadt, Germany ]  :  , ,  [ New Norcia, Near Perth, Australia ]

! [ Philae Lander components ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-lander-components.jpg?w=584 )

     

2007  14         2014         ,        [ Asteroid ]          [ Orion Spacecraft ]  .           .       .                   .       ,        .             .        7  14      .           .

Rosetta Spaceship Launching

* [ March 2, 2004 ] *

! [ Rosetta launching ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/rosetta-launching.jpg?w=540 )

2004  2     -5  [ Ariane-5G+ ]  ,  .     [ Earth Gravity Assist ( Earth ’ s Fly-by ) ] 2005  4   . “   ”        [ Sling-shot like Effect ] .        .         22,500    .            20        !          .       20    ,        .      ,          .

! [ Philae touchdown-3 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-touchdown-32.jpg?w=584 )

    

         [ Kourov, French Guiana ]   . 1993           .   ,   ,     “ - ” ( Churyumov-Gerasimenko )   ( 67P ) .    ,        .     .   “  ” [ Name from Rosetta Stone of Black Basalt with Egyptian Scripts about Ptolemy V ]   .   -5 [ Ariane 5 Generic Rocket Engine, Payload 6-9.5 Tons ] 2004  2    ,      .

! [ Rosetta Orbit ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-orbit.jpg?w=584 )

  ,    , , ,   [ Astroids: Lutetia & Steins ]       [ Gravity Assist Maneuvers ]  . 2005  4       ,    .                 .  [ 2007  25 ]       [ Mars Fly-by ]  .       2007 , 2009   .  ,       2008 , 2010   .

! [ Rosetta-comet orbit ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-comet-orbit.jpg?w=697&h=700 )

          ,     ,    2014   . 2014       ,      .               .                 .     2015    .

018 2020   ,        .

A Russian Proton-M rocket carrying the European-Russian ExoMars 2016 spacecraft blasts off from the launch pad at Baikonur cosmodrome

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

[ Image result for erxomars mission 2020 with russia proton-m rocket ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/0GU07iHofaTAaLxS5BJTV2sKLhs2MeoTaLTZ65fss5Cf7ou7SmX91_yVXsZ5sneNJcofDY7qvk0rRf5wdcKxeOzd8OegTXbwnW1ytuFxwuJ0PFD4fL5upVY=s0-d-e1-fthttps://tse2.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.pr802o9ToltxctVpxQdY2QEsDJ&pid=15.1 )

    

! [ Exo-Mars Mission Path ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.vallamai.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/Exo-Mars-Mission-Path.jpg )

2020      

2020  24                   ,   2017  10  .       [ Mars Rover ] ,    [ Landing Platform ] 2020         .      [ Dust Storm ]  2018  2020      .

! [ Image result for erxomars mission 2020 with russia proton-m rocket ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/ix6rphk5zINKlrPbvz8lqyQzlpWQHnfR7fYwg1qvHpkwe6NR2OGYzNF2dgoItr72U34fktbrw-RXWIzwt2sIpbUT4BuTOjLe5M44coEgNVVzIWHj_R3SynyT-c8=s0-d-e1-fthttps://tse1.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.4wYKozf4n9a2ZPMVNwFoIAEsDh&pid=15.1 )

  -M  

! [ Orbiter, Lander Module, Rover ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.vallamai.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/Orbiter-Lander-Module-Rover.jpg )

  & 

   8  10    .     2  [ 7  ]  ,       .    :  &  [ LARA & HABIT ] .    :  .    ,     [ ESA - Euroean Space Agency & Russian Roscosmos Space Corporation ]    .       ,         .

! [ Lander Module -5 ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.vallamai.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/Lander-Module-5.jpg )

! [ Lander Module -6 ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.vallamai.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/Lander-Module-6.jpg )

2017        ,       . 2017  14          ,   [ Mars Orbiter & Landing Modules ]   , 2017  16       .       .

! [ Image result for ESA EXOMARS 2020 ] ( https://3c1703fe8d.site.internapcdn.net/newman/csz/news/800/2016/exomars2016m.jpg )

! [ Image result for erxomars mission 2020 with russia proton-m rocket ] ( https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Rr7fzhu3w2E/hqdefault.jpg )

   &  

++++++++++++++++++++

*! [ olympus-mons-volcano-5 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-5.jpg?w=584&h=385 ) *

     

*! [ mars-volcano-olympus-mons ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/mars-volcano-olympus-mons.jpg?w=584 ) *

      .    100  [ Meteorites ]    .        ,  100     .    [ Meteorites ]   [ North West Africa ( NWA ) 7635 ]  ,     . NWA 7635  1.1     [ Cosmic Rays ]      .  500      .    2       [ Magma ]    .     .

*  [ Marc Caffee, Professor of Astronomy, Purdue University, USA ] *

*! [ olympus-mons-volcano-8 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-8.jpg?w=584 ) *

*! [ olympus-mons-volcano-10 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-10.jpg?w=584 ) *

      

2012       [ Meteorite ]  .          .       . 6.9         ,      2         .

*! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.space.com/images/i/000/026/895/original/OlyMons.jpg ) *

  1000   ,     ,  .        ,      .  100      .    [ North West Africa NWA 7635 ]    . 2012     11        [ Shergottite ]      .

*! [ olympus-mons-volcano-4 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-4.jpg?w=597&h=693 ) *

   

     .      ,    ,      .       .          ,        .

*! [ olympus-mons-meteorite ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-meteorite.jpg?w=584 ) *

    100  30       [ Purdue Rare Isotope Measurement Laboratory ] [ PRIME LAB ]  .           .  11         .  10   500  ,   [ Magma ]      .      [ NWA 7635 ]  ,  2.4       .

        [ Tom Lapen ] 2017       [ Journal Science Advances ]       ,       .

*! [ olympus-mons-volcano ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano.jpg?w=639&h=564 ) *

          .       [ Tectonic Activities ] .   ,       .    “   ” [ Olympus Mons ]   .   “   ” [ Shield Volcano ]  .    16  [ 25 .. ]  .   374  [ 624 .. ] .     .    .  4  [ 6 .. ]   [ Rim ] .    [ Caldera ] 50  [ 80 .. ] .     “   ” [ Mauna Loa ]   100  .

*! [ olympus-mons-volcano-9 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-9.jpg?w=584&h=410 ) *

*! [ Ocean of Mars ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/ocean-of-mars.jpg?w=510&h=796 ) *

                 .            ..

          . ,      .

    ,           ,       ?    [ Craters ]    .

*  [  , ,    ] *

*! [ Mars Ocean ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/mars-ocean1.jpg?w=584 ) *

      [ Mars Science Laboratory Rover ]              .     [ Sedimentary Conglomerates ]          .

*   [     ] *

     ,     ,         .      ,        ,         .

*  [ Linda Kah, Associate Professor of Earth & Planetary Science, University of Tennessee, Knoxville ] *

*! [ Clues for water in Mars ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/clues-for-water-in-mars.jpg?w=584 ) *

1980     [ NASA ’ S Viking Orbiter ]       20          :         !     ,      [   — Oceanus Borealis ]         !

   ,              .      :     [ Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter ] .     .            .

*! [ Water flow in Mars -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/water-flow-in-mars-1.jpg?w=395&h=507 ) *

         .      .        .

*   [   ,  ] *

*,         .            .       .      .   ,    ,  ,     .          : [    ] [  3   ] , [      . ] *

  .

*! [ Pebbles in Mars ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/pebbles-in-mars.jpg?w=450&h=532 ) *

         

  4        [ MSL Curiosity Rover ] [ MSL : Mars Science Laboratory ] 150 ..  ( 90  )   [ Gale Crater ]   ,      [ Rounded Pebbles within Sedimentary Conglomerate ]            .    2012   .       , ,     [ Golf ]   ,     .  ,          .        [ Aileen Yingst ]         .      275  [ 900   ]  ,     .

*! [ Martian water ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/martian-water.jpg?w=451&h=532 ) *

         [ Electrical Discharges over Mars Iced Surfaces ]   .        [ Discharges ]   [ CO2 ]         .

*   [ Arturo Robledo-Martinez, Mexican Geo-physical Team ] *

* “            .      .                . ” *

*  ( Douglas McCuistion, Director of Mars Exploration Program NASA Headquarters ) *

* “               ” .*

*  ( German Astronomer Johannes Kepler ) ( 1571-1630 ) *

*! [ Water flow in Mars -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/water-flow-in-mars-2.jpg?w=448&h=918 ) *

       ( Gale Crater )        ( Sediment Rocks ) .    4          . ,  ,        .

*  ( Mars Science Lab Dy Project Scientist NASA ) *

* ( 2012    )         ( Mound at thecenter of Gale Crater ) MFF   ( Medusae Fossae Formation Exposure ) . ( MFF on Mars is an intensely eroded deposit .. )    ( Grand Canyon )  .          .    MFF    .          .*

*  (   National Air & Space Museum ) *
