  

  !

   !

  !

  !

  



  !

  

  !

  

  !



,  

 ,

 ,

  !

+++++++++++++++++++++

! [ Black Hole -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/05/black-hole-2.jpg?w=584&h=428 )

    -   ,      .        .         .

   ,   .       .          .

*  [ ,   ,   ,   ] *

   

2016            [ Philip Kaaret ]    ,     ,   , [ Tol 1247-232 ]  -   ,   ,   .       .     .      ,         .

          ,      .  ,   .       .        .     .      :        .

  ,     .    ,  , ,      .           .        .    .

+++++++++++++++++++++

! [ A Black Hole ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/05/a-black-hole.jpg?w=520&h=452 )

        .        .       ;    .

*  (    ) *

(   )   1910       . ,    ( An Ideal Platonic or Kantian Reality )              .

*    (   ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/09/black-hole-vanishing-act.jpg?w=584&h=332 )

       !      90%   !  ,              “   ” ( Singularity )  .   ,      ( At the point of Singularity, the Pressure & Density of a Black Hole are Infinite ) !

*   ( Ths Handy Space Answer Book ) *

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712061a.jpg )

Star Blast to form a Black Hole

    

,            2016  74      ,  ,        !    ,  [ The Origin & Fate of the Universe ] ,    [ Quantum Theory of Gravity ] ,   [ The Uncertainty Principle ] ,  , [ Elementary Particles ] ,   [ The Force of Nature ] ,   [ Black Holes ] ,    [ The Arrow of Time ] ,   [ The Unification of Physics ]     ,   .     ,     [ Fundamental Particles ]     “    ” [ Grand Unified Theory, ( GUT ) ]          ,  !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712061b.jpg )

Computer Simulated Image of A Black Hole

     [ Lucasian Professor of Mathematics ]     .        ,     ,    ( 1642-1726 ) ,        [ Paul Dirac ( 1902-1984 ) ]      !

    ?

1916            ( Karl Schwarzschild ) ,       .    ,   1780   ,    ( John Michell & Pierre Simon Laplace )      “   ” ( Dark Stars )  .            !               !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712061c.jpg )

Stephen Hawking

1970-1980           ,       .           ( A Black Hole is a Region of Space-time affected by such a Dense Gravitational Field that nothing, not even Light, can escape it ) .     7  ( 11 ../ ) .     7   ,     ..     :  ( 186000 / ) .           .       ,      .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712061d.jpg )

Medal of Science to Hawking

        ?  ,     , ,              .          ( Stellar Black Holes )   !    ( Mass )    10  !           ( Supernova )  !        ( Neutron Star )        .

       !      90%   !  ,              “   ” ( Singularity )  .   ,      ( At the point of Singularity, the Pressure & Density of a Black Hole are Infinite ) !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712061e.jpg )

Formation of a Black Hole

    

1965-1970   ,  [ Cosmology ]      ,     [ General Theory of Relativity ] “   ” [ Singularities ]  .      [ Roger Penrose ]   . 1970      [ Black Holes ]    .       [ Property ] !     !    !    !    !        [ Quantum Theory ] ,           [ Radiation ]     !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712061f.jpg )

Swallowing in a Black Hole

    

   300  ,    1942  8     .     ,     [ National Institute for Medical Research ]    [ Tropical Diseases ]       [ Research Biologist ] .   ,    , ,   .      .       ,       ,     !

! [ Black Holes ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/05/black-holes.jpg?w=584 )

    ,      !  [ Highgate ]   ,     [ St. Albans ]   . 1958      .     ,  ,     !   ,  ,   [ Thermodynamics, Relativity Theory, Quantum Mechanics ]    . 1961     [ Royal Observatory ] ,        . 1962    B.A.   ,     ,   [ General Relativity, Cosmology ]   .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712061g.jpg )

Black Hole Creation

     [ First Term ]         ,    .     ,  ALS  [ Amyotropic Lateral Sclerosis ]     [ Neuro-muscular Disease ( Motor Neurone Disease ) ] ,   !   “    ” [ Lou Gehrig ’ s Disease ]  !  ,   [ Spinal Cord ]        [ Nerve Cells ]  !     !            !     ,   Ph.D.         !       ,      ,         !

     !

   , 1965    [ Jane Wilde ]     .      !   !      ,         ,     ,    !       ,       ,  ! 1962     [ Lou Gehrig ’ s Disease ]         !  74   [ 2016 ]      !   ,   !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712061h.jpg )

Hawking with His Second Wife

     [ Motor Neurone Disease ]  ,     ,    ,       !      !    , [ Jane Hawking ] ,   ,  ·   ,     !      [ Roger Penrose ] ,   [ Robert Geroch ] ,   [ Brandon Carter ] ,   [ George Ellis ]  ,    ,   !

1985  “     ” [ A Brief History of Time ]      [ Draft ] .      [ CERN Particle Accelerator ]   ,        .   [ Life Support System ]       ,    ,       !     [ Tracheostomy Operation ]   .  !      !      !          !

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712061i.jpg )

Supernova turns into a Black Hole

      [ Brian Whitt ]         “   ” [ Living Center ]     [ Communication Program ]    . “   ”      [ Walt Woltosz of Words Plus Inc. & Speech Plus Inc. Sunnyvale, California ]  !      ;  ;     [ Speech Synthecizer ]    !   [ David Meson ]   ,        .     [ Electronic Voice ] ,      ,  !

(  )

 :

025   , , ,      .

! [ Image result for uranus and neptune ] ( https://i0.wp.com/image.slidesharecdn.com/powerpoint-130421015235-phpapp02/95/the-twin-planets-uranus-and-neptune-1-638.jpg )

Uranus & Neptune

     [ Exoplanets ]     .         [ Cosmic Ice Giants ] ,    .   ,    ,   ,    [ Light or Heavy Elements ]   .

 ,   .

! [ Its raining diamonds ] ( https://i.pinimg.com/564x/c0/76/e8/c076e84dec3b74a43e3f4a7d34a79d12.jpg )

      ,  &   ,     .   ,        .       ,    .                 .

 ,   .

! [ Image result for uranus and neptune ] ( http://cdn.pearltrees.com/s/pic/la/saturn-uranus-neptune-jupiter-72732883 )

     

    ,      ,      , ,  .    - ,  ,    ,              .     [  21, 2017 ]    [ Journal Nature of Astronomy ] [ DOI: 10.1038/S41550-017-0219 ]  .        .        .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/diamonds-on-neptune-uranus.jpg?w=584&h=711 )

! [ Image result for it's rainig diamonds on neptune ] ( https://i2.wp.com/54.208.79.206/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/993998101519996878925181864333119_n.jpg )

     :   [ Dominic Kraus, Head Helmholtz Junior Research Group at HZDR ] [ Helmholtz-Zentrum Drsden-Rossendorf ] .      ,      :            [ Ultra-Strong X-Ray Laser & other Facilities at Stanford Linear Accelerator Center ( SLAC ) in California ]  .

    ,   10,000 .   ,           [ Polysytrene - A mixture of Carbon & Hydrogen ]         .

! [ Image result for Raining Diamonds Neptune Uranus ] ( https://i1.wp.com/9facts.co.uk/data/201307/2819-171fabbae25e17e9916c4ee43a67272d.jpg )

   : 6000 ,   :  150  [ gigapascal ] .     :  .    :   [ nanometer size ] .          ,  ,   .              ,      .  ,  ,  ,        .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/do-you-know.jpg?w=624&h=625 )

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

“        ,         ! ”

   

! [ W Herschel -4 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/w-herschel-4.jpg?w=584 )

*  ( 1738-1822 ) *

**

++++++++++++++++++

**

‘         ,         ‘

*  ( John F. Herschel ) ( 1792-1871 ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/uranus.jpg?w=584&h=389 )

: 1781          .    ,    [ Amateur Astronomer ]    ,              ,      !      ,     ,      !       ,    !

! [ W Herschel -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/w-herschel-1.jpg?w=547&h=692 )

       15         !          ( 1564-1642 ) ,       ,    !    .      !      [ Neptune ]  ,          !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/neptune.jpg?w=539&h=757 )

     

1600             ( Milky Way Galaxy )      .        .   1755      ( Immanuel Kant )       ( Lens-shaped Group of Stars ) ,        .         ( 1738-1822 )        .                  .

, , ,   ,    ,     ,    ,   [ Galaxies ] ,    [ Nebulae ]      .          , .

! [ Neptune Orbit ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/neptune-orbit.jpg?w=519&h=507 )

     

1781  13              .               .     [ Comet ]  .     .        ,          .         ,      !        [ Circular Orbit ]  ,         .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2003/10/sc10100313.jpg )

, 

    90       ,     !         !           .     ,       !   , , , ,             !    ,           !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2003/10/sc10100314.jpg )

1738  15         .     .         . 1757    ,      .     ,      .

    ,  ,     .         ,      !       .  ,    48   40    [ 48 ‘ Reflector, 40 ‘ Focul Length Telescope ] .        [ King George III ] 6600 US    .       20       !

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2003/10/sc10100315.jpg )

    ,  ,     ,    . 1781  13     7       ,      ,         .      ‘   ‘ [ Georgium Sidus ] .      .   [ Astronomical Society ]    ,  ‘  ‘       .

! [ W Herschel -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/w-herschel-2.jpg?w=584 )

     

  ,        320  [ US Dollar Value ]     . 1774      ,    ,          . 1782    [ Saturn Nibula, NGC-7009 ] . 1783  18.7 ‘  [ Aperture ] 20    ,      ,    .       1785  1000   [ Deepsky Objects ] , 1788   1000  , 1802   500       ! 1888      [ New General Catalogue ]  8000    2477    .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2003/10/sc10100317.jpg )

          .   ( 1781 ) ,   [ Titania, Oberon ( 1787 ) ] ,    [ Mimas, Enceladus ( 1789 ) ] ,     ,      [ Model of the Milkyway Galaxy ] ,     [ Common Existence of Binary Stars ] ,      [ Possibility of External Island Universe ( Galaxy ) ] ,        [ Motion of the Solar System towards the Direction of Constellation Hercules ] ,    [ Discovery of Infrared Light ]       .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2003/10/sc10100318.jpg )

   

   ‘  ‘  ,      [ Johann Bode ] .   ‘   ‘ ,     .      , ,      .  1800              .     ,         .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2003/10/sc10100319.jpg )

  32,190 .  22   [ 22 Moons ] , 11   [ 11 Thin Rings ] .   6  !   60   !      11,000  ,   16,000   .     ,    84  .       17.24   .

   [ Axis ]     [ 98  Tilt ]        !     [ Polar Axis ]  ,   [ Orbital Plane ] ,         !   ,    !   21     ,   21   !            .                 !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2003/10/sc101003110.jpg )

     [ 83% ] ,   [ 15% ] ,  [ 2% ]   .        ,   ! ,   ,     [ Lattitude ]     ,    [ Vivid Colour Bands ] ! 1986     -2   [ Voyager-2 Space Probe ]       [ -220  C ]  !        ( 90-360 )  ,      !    [ Radio Science Experiments ]   ,    [ Equator ]  180   ,      !

! [ William Herschel Discovery ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/william-herschel-discovery.jpg?w=584 )

1977    9    ! 1986    -2   2   ,   .   ,      .   [ Epsilon ]        .       .

 ,    ,      60   , -2   .     ,      !

,       [ Dense Molten Core ]    ,     .

! [ Caroline Herschel ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/caroline-herschel.jpg?w=584 )

    

    ,    ,             ,    .    ,   .          ,    .     , ,  [ Physics ] ,   [ Photochemistry ] ,   [ Philosophy of Science ]        .  ,  ·,         7500  ,    [ Archives ]    .

    

        ,     !        !     ,              [ William Herschel Museum ]    [ Patrick Moore ] .

 ,                !      [ King George III ]     [ Copley Medal ] .      [ Fellow of Royal Society ]   .    [ Royal Astronomical Society ]     .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2003/10/sc101003113.jpg )

 

   84   1822  24   !   1819    !               ! 2007      ‘    ‘ [ Herschel Space Observatory ]     [ ESA ]  .

    ,       ,       !               ?

++++++++++++++++++++++

:

1. New Lights on the Solar System – Scientific American [ Oct-Dec 2003 ]

2. The Once & Future Universe By: Rick Gore, National Geographic [ June 1983 ]

3. Coming of Age in the Milky Way By: Timothy Ferris [ 1988 ]

4. Exploration of the Universe By: Abell, Morrison & Wolff [ 1987 ]

5. Uranus: Visit to a Dark Planet By Rich Gore, National Geographic [ Aug 1986 ]

6. Book of the Universe By: Ian Ridpath [ 1991 ]

7. Exploring the Planets By: Brian Jones [ 1991 ]

8. Planets & Moons By: William Kaufmann [ 1978 ]

9. http://www.newworldencyclopedia.org/entry/William_Herschel [ February 20, 2014 ]

10. http://www.britannica.com/biography/William-Herschel

11. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Herschel [ JKune 12, 2016 ]

12. http://www.inquisitr.com/4451725/scientists-recreate-diamond-rains-in-neptune-and-uranus/

13. http://gizmodo.com/scientists-say-its-raining-diamonds-on-neptune-and-uran-1798150640 [ August 21, 2017 ]

14. http://www.inquisitr.com/4451725/scientists-recreate-diamond-rains-in-neptune-and-uranus/ [ August 25, 2017 ]

15. http://nationalpost.com/news/world/it-rains-solid-diamonds-on-uranus-and-neptune [ August 25, 2017 ]

S. Jayabarathan [ jayabarathans@gmail.com ] August 26, 2017 [ R-2 ]

026      !       .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/magnetic-moon.jpg?w=646&h=644 )

    .

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

++++++++++++++

https://www.space.com/37756-moon-magnetic-field-lasted-billion-years-longer.html

+++++++++++++++++++++

 
  !
  
   !
 
  
 
  !
   !
 

  !  !
   !
 
  !
  
,  ?
 
  !   !
  

  ?
 
 ?

++++++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/inner-core-of-moon.jpg?w=579&h=606 )

    [ Mantle ]    [ Solid Rock ]     .          .        .   -   .  -    [ Tidal Gravitational Tug of War ]  ,     .    [  1.5  ]   ,     ,       .

*  [ Chrirstina Dwyer, University of Califonia ] *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/inside-the-moon.jpg?w=702&h=702 )

      

1970              ,     .       ,     !            !

    .      ,       .     ,  ,   [ Planet's Outer Core ] .       [ Convection Heat ] .        .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/moons-magnetic-field.jpg?w=522&h=743 )

       .       .      .    .      ,    .          .

          , 2.7  - 4.2           .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/moon-sample-1.jpg?w=584&h=389 ) Moon Sample, brought by Apollo Astronauts.

“   ,   . ” **

*  ,   ( 1865-1939 ) *

             .

*,    ( 1596-1650 ) *

,      .

*,   “   ” ( 1608-1674 ) *

     .

*     ( 1564-1616 ) *

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802711b.jpg )

    

                ,  ,  ( Liquid, Solid & Vapour )     .              !              !          !   ,              !

++++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/moon-details-1.jpg?w=649&h=551 )

                     .

    , ,  (  ) ,       ( Solid Matter ) .        .    , , ,        ?          .            .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802711c.jpg )

    

   ,    .         .   .    63 ,  62 ,  27 ,  13    .                .  “   ”  ( Co-Accretion )    .                   .   ( Capture Theory )   ,          .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/magnetic-strength.jpg?w=730&h=440 )

  ( Fission Theory ) :          ( Semi-fluid State )         .  “   ” ( Condensation Theory ) .       “  ” ( Nebula )     ,   .

1969-1970        ( Apollo Moon Missions )            .      “    ” ( Oxygen Isotope Materials )   .  ,       ( Same Region of the Solar System )    !          ( Volatile Elemets that melt at high Temperatures )   !           .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802711d.jpg )

         ( Earth ’ s Mantle )  .          .               ! -11        “  ” ( Anorthosite ) .    ,    ( Sodium & Calcium Aluminiuam Silicates )  .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/inside-of-moon.jpg?w=569&h=804 )

     

                :

1.     [ ( Moon ’ s Density 3.3 gram/c.c ) ( Earth ’ s Density 5.5 gram/c.c ) ]   ,    ( Iron Core )      .

2.       ( Volatile Substances ) .         ( Baking of Lunar Surface ) .

3.            ( Relative Abundane of Oxygen Isotopes ) .       ,   .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802712.jpg )

     

              .      ,  “    ” ( The Giant Impact Theory )    .

*1.   ( The Fission Theory ) *

                    .             !          .   .    ( Earth ’ s Mantle )     .   ,          .          “    ” ( Fossil Evidences )   ?        .       ( Baked Rock Substances )       .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/moons-orbit.jpg?w=586&h=632 )

*2.   ( The Capture Theory ) *

   :       ,           .           ,        .                  .       ( Baked Rock Substances )       .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802713.jpg )

*3.   ( The Condensation Theory ) *

    “  ” ( Nebula ) ,                !          “    ” ( Same Dense Iron Core )     .       ( Composition of Materials )  .       ( Baked Rock Substances )       .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/apollo-17-astronaut-on-moon.jpg?w=584&h=458 )

    

4.        * ( The Giant Impact Theory or The Ejected Ring Theory ) *

       .        ,      ,            .     .       .         !      ,          .          .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802717.jpg )

     

1970            ( The Giant Impact Theory ) .       , “ -  ” ( Off-center Impact )   .         ( Fast Inititial Spin )   ,         .             .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/grail-mission-details-2.jpg?w=672&h=1135 )

   “    ”   . 1984        ,         .

50                     !     ,       ( Robin Canup, Southwest Research Institute ) ,  ·     ( Erik Asphaug )    “    ” ( Computer Simulation )  .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802716.jpg )

[  ]

:

* ( : 1 ) *

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

++++++++++++++++

 

 

  ,
 
  
 
 ,
  !

   !
  
  
 
 
  
 

 

  ?

+++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/FSb8q15o8Fzx8KGkaTnwh-ilwsv3y-xm4qggnQRReW3YPMEwEx3VDjvhwQ7ZpDLUUxH14E-Hzylfu9EANTUtFl0S4l2X4fLlOp9vMaIzb9FqO2uOZrrkaBWprKgiVBcsjrsmrrhDEAwxUV9xc9lEPQ=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-1-the-atomic-hydrogen-bombs.jpg?w=584 )

        !

*  (   ) *

“            ,             ! ”

 

“        ,     ,      !      !         !   ,      .          !       ,        ” .

*  (  16, 1955 ) *

! [ ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/oOUsnVX0cPyempWxOwXI3B9tYWS0Dm-MVVCt0t3cwhng4OF8P0ke0EUSsOHAtE-9-ioZdAjFQXF3NZjNFvBBEEZtrf5z0CuVvP33M6mYrpY5vOXkjgdd1VgQxq5MazKrlzs=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-1b-hiroshima-now.jpg?w=584 ) *      !*

           ,    !   [ Radioactivity ]    !    [ Artificial Radioactivity ]     !   ,   [ Nuclear Chain Reaction ]   !    ,   ,        !                 !            !

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/eYineEfGat_HCcdpZFWF91rE23ISMi9jVojwfX7X2wg-TH2vunHrn7zMwIcIqycc9mPG0OFd-iLa5DWOgFqvKgCrKEKp7BmCjms9XOKgjJP2jTjun2zWAi-YqWds8KZsWQQX6vWHPFiG6GvV1CU=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-1c-atomic-bomb-capacities.jpg?w=584 )

          ,         ! 1945   ,    , 1949       !   1952  , 1960  , 1964  , 1974  , 1998          !  ,              !   115       [ Non Proliferation Treaty, NPT ]    !  , , , , , , , ,             !

! [ Image result for albert einstein ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/tRUrBZ1F0ZOORSDS-Fmo1Th2ewsh-JRxL7Z9ZzC7cvv1b23ge4wsVTGTvYMJmZX_B3o40x9rwYaYlwBrkrKn5Fmozy9EwuuDi0tgrpyUa0ZNEGzSVpCBlhWy72U=s0-d-e1-fthttps://tse4.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.wacGivu-WiL54iAnYisWmQEsEU&pid=15.1 )

    

        1939          ,  !           !   ,        ,     ,       .

     1955  16   ,   ( Bertrand Russell )  “     ”        ! “        ,     ,     !      !        !   ,      .          !       ,        ” .

         ,          !

! [ ] ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/wTb0XrXRh5OafbwStVJ81cRH2dUwlJ0EX1rT1cSBAKQ6SfixwcHxNuXPmk417CMbMg3OtFSUOss0z23ZxMQ-CqBogDaqCwVolMv1tvXhptzQ6TWRab4L8yPDxL9NyDBlkLSbIL2MsZEBPzEinhv4zMD7BVHyY-oUs=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-1a-explosion-of-atomic-hydrogen-bombs.jpg?w=584 )

    ?    ?

1942            [ Fission Bomb ]      [ Fusion Bomb ]     !           ,   [ Edward Teller ] !        ,   [ Enrico Fermi ] !                        !      ,     ,    [ Thermo Nuclear Bomb ]    ,     !       !   [ Super Bomb ] ,   [ H Bomb ]  !  1947-1952        [ Chairman, Atomic Energy Commission ]           !

! [ ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/3HIk8yR38jBfNhVPi8fWHsZl6dgFvVSQ33S0OEYR82w5fY3XeUVX1o4qyLFGkTiofY8hoewfpEY2EltDlI7C7CV1VdZB3Syd1NfUvSYcRW2MWpp080uloxv42JFzOGIVpWFUYxk9jV66_GSojmdA=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-1e-einstein-oppenheimer-teller.jpg?w=584 )

    ,        [ Cold War ]     ! 1949         ,    ,  !        ,        ,     !     ,       ,          !     1952         [ Enewetak Atoll ]        !

      , 1953  12       [ Peter Kapitsa ]  ,          !      1957  , 1967  , 1968        , ,        !  , , (  ) , , , , ,             .

! [ ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/eroGswvWaXslIxPJNqDN-mG2WUMdiKJ4sm76LM67ha8oRrhHyTgUvKb3lj3PjWWoQc6LjG48zYOgF45V49-IusuP63PEeNGvptXxRS4irtQZc78-rTGcHB-qpAefLp4ckENeU3FCsJSVfubsHkM=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-1d-little-boy-fat-man-bombs1.jpg?w=584 ) *
       ?*

1945           .       .        !                   , ,   .       .               .        , , ,   .                 !                      .

! [ ] ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/jIQWhcLA-WTpNrxzzxGfOckVeZY6cPJVlbS0FSk71OLOSwyWOg-y0rQkLOGfQhshRk4tFylNLeMKw8jKOHMYwmKsokOzQ49Wy0BzgHUVDYUJvN40STxtyNazIyGcCVjlGktq2np1qVplU=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-2-atomic-bunker-buster.jpg?w=584 )

     ?

       .   ( Neutron Bombs )      .   ( Fission Weapons ) ,   ( Fusion Weapons )              !                 !        !           .
                       !

! [ ] ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/IhXkA8CRQtiOv0lIyhw4ZPH0mFUFd1l-W1YuI7a41ZQLN4nn3IA5BTjogPMLRrexsiVv92gLmiZ88u1SqlO6FLtb3cyNhsnDKAWtPexfdm5ULSBQLsD1WA2M99MExuy8P_D-mIQ=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-3-range-of-warheads.jpg?w=584 )

* [ Click to Enlarge ] *

  (  )   -235,  -239    .    (   )   ,  (   ) ( Deuterium & Tritium -Hydrogen Isotopes )  .             .            .                .             !          .

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/fJzcBSK0EMwuJPiYvZEhnI4IwVJKQ4J3YnC2tfqCoJHOJK8YJRqHTNVBWKEQcNMwH3LM7Yuyo9TgRoyqYscKKCkkPbsBM1c2h1vepdJUPLqKHmRfLxpYZmk43pqHbCd8SEO6kHk6ItZH=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-4-radiation-exposure.jpg?w=584 )

      .

     15    ,     21     .       [ ( TNT ) -Trinitrotoluene -CH3C6H2 ( NO2 ) 3 ( A Powerful High Explosive ) ]         !  ,                    .      1000     .            .     ( Thermonuclear Weapon OR Hydrogen Bomb )  25       .   50         .         ( Guided Missiles )   ( Nuclear Strategic Weapons )       ,  ,      .

Target | Hiroshima | Nagasaki | Tokyo Fire Raid | Average of 93
Attacks on Cities
-|-|-|-|-
Dead/Missing | 70,000-80,000 | 35,000-40,000 | 83,000 | 1,850
Wounded | 70,000 | 40,000 | 102,000 | 1,830
Population Density | 35,000 per sq mile | 65,000 per sq mile | 130,000 per sq mile | ?
Total Casualties | 140,000-150,000 | 75,000-80,000 | 185,000 | 3,680
Area Destroyed | 4.7 sq mile | 1.8 sq mile | 15.8 sq mile | 1.8 sq mile
Attacking Platform | 1 B-29 | 1 B-29 | 334 B-29s | B-29s
Weapon ( s ) | ‘ Little Boy ’ 15 kT

( 15,000 tons of TNT ) ’ Fat Man ’ 21 kT

( 21,000 tons of TNT ) 1,667 tons1,129 tons

! [ ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/-5z8HkLTMphXKDAExPRF-E6xfwh0oPd2SVbxPKvq44ILzGYEPP6l9jO2k92YYMa8qo481PG6BgmvPbbL8Ps8SkkqQcew15-BryFC4ewUY5AZAr3Usll3gykQrLvjK1d6PJq1E=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-5-sick-survivers.jpg?w=584 )

     

1945    “   ”     .   “ ·  ”     .    ,  , ,   ,          .    ,           .

1.    ( Bomb Blast ) :

           .         .      .                 !     .

2.    ( Heat Wave Spread ) :

          .     ,   .         .         ( Huge Mushroom Cloud )   .

! [ ] ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/7w7j3ckVLVqkysI0oCEFjC3JlMOJiTP7hvPcDRPPpk5EQz8bHNcfh0xaiKr2iV_I3ixWQEUkUjIYvTk-W5aK-vSfpPdaCpCQ1G17ODT5FMZTqFUbwwvrKo5hAJyKao63K3EBfQ7-YHrqosBmyA=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-7-from-uraniuam-to-bombs.jpg?w=584 )

3.  &  ( Direct Radiation Dose ) :

        .    ,   “   ” ( Prompt Radiation – Mostly Neutrons & Gamma Rays )   .   ( High Amount of Radiation Dose ) ,       !        .     ( Cancer ) .

*4.    ( Delayed Radiation Effects ) * :

         .     “   ” ( Half Life ) .         ( Unstable Elements due to Radioactive Decay )      .        .         .            .

5.   ( Radioactive Fallouts ) :

              .             .  , ,      .

! [ ] ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/biRyqm82pTY0lB6Wv4Xu78yJJzjY0JnVvIhEiQn-X20BqSJTWAhEPCwVuAY8V7v7zyFELAixhsh7TNsiVwTSRIhOwFLZ1CYd9jPLHwUD6Ho8bLvruWp9Cj-l0fMfqEZzoeMP66fQUlOq=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/12/fig-6-hiroshima-nagasaki.jpg?w=584 )

6.   ( Effects in Space ) :

            .           .        .  ,    .

*7.    ( Electromagnetic Pulse Burst ) * :

      :     ( Production of an Electromagnetic Pulse – A Powerful Burst of Electric Current )  !              !   ,   – ,  ,   ,      .

(  )

 :

4. National Geographic Magazine : Living With the Bomb By : Richard Rhodes ( August 2005 )

5. Scientific American Magazine : Do We Need New Nukes ? A Special Report on the Nuclear Arsenals & Replacing Warheads ( November 2007 )

6. Nuclear Weapons – Wikipedia Report ( December 6, 2009 )

7. Neutron Bombs – Wikipedia Report ( December 9, 2009 )

028          

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/soho-findings-2.jpg?w=584&h=720 )

*
.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 
*

“         !       .         .    ,        . ”

*  ( 1879-1955 ) *

+++++++++++++++++++++

   
   !
   
 !
  
   !
   !
  
    !
  
 !
   !
   !
   
 !
 
  !
 
   !
   !

 !
  
 !
   
 
 
  !

++++++++++++++++

    ,           . 40     ,       [ Seismic Wave ]    .

*  [ ESA 's SOHO Solar Project Scientist ] *

    [ Solar Oscillations ]      [ Sound Waves ] .   ,        [ Gravity Waves, ( G-Waves ) ] . 40        .          .

*  [ Astronomer Cote d ' Azur Observatory ] *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/soho-findings-1.jpg?w=584&h=720 )

     

          [ Solar Seismic Waves ]     [ SOHO Solar Probe ]   .  2017        ,     .     [ Low Frequency Waves ]   [ G - Modes ]   .  -   ,        .     ,  ,        .

! [ Image result for suns core rotates faster than surface ] ( https://i0.wp.com/i1-news.softpedia-static.com/images/fitted/620x348/Sun-039-s-Core-Rotates-Slower-Than-Previously-Thought.jpg )

   [ Sound Waves ]    .      [ Constant Convection ]   .         16.5       .

 -  [ Imprint of G -Waves ]       .    25  ,  35   .  -  [ G -modes ]  ,   .  ,    [ Solar Science ]      .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/soho-findings-3.jpg?w=584&h=621 )

! [ Image result for suns core rotates faster than surface ] ( https://tse3.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.IheYe2V9vpUgtNXhiVHWEwEsDF&pid=15.1 )

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/08/solar-storm-after-effect.jpg?w=450&h=612 )

“         !       .          .    ,        . ”

*  ( 1879-1955 ) *

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141aa.jpg )

“       .      .            . ”

*...  ( J.B.S. Haldane, British-born Indian Geneticist & Evolutionary Biologist ) ( 1892-1964 ) *

1859           !       .                ( Ionosphere )   !          !

*  ( Bruce Tsurutani, NASA Plasma Physicist, JET Propulsion Lab ) *

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141a.jpg )

“          ( Magnetically-charged Plasma called Coronal Mass Ejections )    ,.     .        .      17  40     . ”
*
  ( NASA Plasma Physicist )
*
“       ,              !        . ”

*   , ( Southwest Research Institute, Boulder, Colarado, USA, ) *

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141ac.jpg )

1859     !

1.4  . (  869000  )          99.86 %  !           !      : 383     ( 10^21 kws ) !       100    ( TNT )    !         !              !       ,     ( Boiling Arc-Shaped Clouds of Hot Plasma, dappled with Dark, Roving Sunspots ) .    ,      “   ”    ( Solar Flares or Coronal Mass Ejection ) .      ( Explosive Burst of Hot Electrified Gases )     !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141ad.jpg )

1859        150  .. ( 93   )        28       ( Sunspots ) .          ( Extremely Intense Magnetic Fields )  !            ( Violent Release of Energy – A Solar Flare )  .  28   2        !          !          !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141ae.jpg )

    

“ 1859            ( Magnetically-charged Plasma called Coronal Mass Ejections )    , ”    . “     .       .     17  40     . ”   . “      :          ?     :    .  1859           ! ”   .

 150                 !       ,    ( Telegraph Wires )     ( Short Circuit )   .       ( Northern Colour Lights )     , ,     !          !

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141b.jpg )

    ( Coronal Mass Ejection )            !  1859          ( Charged Particles )       !      ,   ,   &   ( Electrical Grids & Communication Networks )   !  140,000          .              !

1994          ,  , ,    ,  ·  ,      ( TV Signals to Global Positioning Sytems – GPS Systems )    ( Electrical Power Grids )  . 1989         -   ( Hydro-Quebec Power Grid )  9      !         .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141c.jpg )

   

  863,400 ,   109   !     333,000  .   [ Volume ]   1.3  !      ‘   ’ [ Photosphere ]   .    ‘   ’ [ Dark Patches ] ,   50,000    !  ‘   ’ [ Sunspots ]  .    [ 4000  C ] ,   [ 6000  C ]    .     ‘   ’ [ Chromosphere ]      , ‘   ’ [ Corona ] .  ,  ,   [ ,      ]    !  ,            [ Flares of Luminous Gas ]  !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141d.jpg )

   ? .       !    ,     .    ,       .    !  !      .     ,     25 ,   34  .      [ Solid ]  ,   ,   ,   .     ,    ,   .          ,     ,       [ Intersteller Galaxy ]     !

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141e.jpg )

    

     [ Black Spots ] , 2200       !   [ Sunspots ]   .     [ Umbra ] ,     [ Penumbra ] !    ,       .    [ Lattitude ]    [ Equator ] 35  ,      !    ,    8      .    6000  C  ,   1500-2000  C ,    .     !     ,    !     . ,          .  20     .     ,  .         .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141h.jpg )

2010-2012      !

1859          2010-2012     .       300    ( GEO – Geosynchronous Earth Orbiting Satellites )   !        30       !     97   ( 2006   ) !   30%      !  100        ( International Space Station )    ,           !

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/08/40808141g.jpg )

(  )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++

. , 

  
 
  ,
 
  
 ,
 !
  

 !
 
 
  

  
 ,
   !

 ,
 !
  ! !
 
  
  !
   ,
  ,

 !
 ,  
 !  !
 ,

  

030             .

  

  
  
  !
  
  !
  

 

   !
 ,
 ,
   !
  

  !
   
 
  , 
  
  !

+++++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/voyager-1.jpg?w=584&h=329 )

 40               .        ,        .

*  [ NASA Science Mission Associate Administrator ] *

 ,    

1977  /    1 & 2  40    ,    ,   ,  ,  ,    ,      .  -1   13     .   -1      [ Circular Time Capsule ]   .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/location-of-voyager-1.jpg?w=584&h=346 )

 1 & 2    ?      "  " [ Lo ]     !   "  " [ Europa ]    !   "  "   .     [ Miranda ]  .        [ Triton ] .  13      -1   ,    ,  .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/edging-into-the-unknown1.jpg?w=772&h=606 )

 11      -2     ,  ,  -  ,    [ Solar Wind Plasma ]     . ,      1 & 2    -238      -  [ Plutonium -238 Radio-isotope thermoelectric Generators ]    88    .    2030    .  30,000 mph [ 48280 kmh ]     1 & 2      .        :  230    ;       ;      ;       .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/voyager-full-picture.jpg?w=584&h=460 ) ! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/voyager-crosses-solar-region.jpg?w=584 )

“   -1     [ Transition Zone ]  [ 2012 ] .      [ Heliopause ]      [ Interstellar Medium ]    . ”

*  [ John Hopkins University in Maryland ] *

         .

*  [    ] *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/where-is-voyager-now.jpg?w=525&h=830 )

“ ,        -2    35       !       ,        . ”

*  (    ) ( C.I.T. Pasadena ) *

“              !   ,         . ”

* , (     ) ( 1975-1977 ) *

*
! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1a-voyager-probes.jpg?w=613&h=559 )
*

“           ! 175        ( Planetary Alignment of Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus & Neptune )      .  , , ,          .

*  ( Harris Schurmeier, Voyager Project Manager ) ( 1970 -1976 ) *

“        !             .              . ”

*   (   &    ) ( 2004-2010 ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1c-voyager-launch.jpg?w=559&h=745 ) ! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/voyager-1-and-2.jpg?w=584&h=399 )

  1 & 2   ,  ,     ( Time Capsule )  .  12  ,      .    ( Aliens )        .

  

      

35   10    ,           1 & 2      .           . 10            .      ,   , ,             .     38,000    .     12    ,      .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/2017-august-report.jpg?w=594&h=1002 )

2004   -1   [ Termination Shock ]     ,        .     [ Turbulent Zone, called Heliosheath ]  .        [ Heliopause ]   .      [ Interstellar Space ] .

         [ Long Life Nuclear Batteries ] .  2025      .  -1       16:30  .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/08/deep-space-network.jpg?w=498&h=848 )

     

2010   17       ( NASA ’ s Jet Propulsion Lab )   8.6           2        .         .           .

 22   -2   ( Data Packets )  .         .  30       .     13  ,          ( NASA ’ s Deep Space Network on Earth )   13   .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1b-voyager-1-2-trajectories.jpg?w=540 )

 2   1977  20    ,             .     1     .

     , , ,           ( Heliosphere )        ( Interstellar Space )    !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-3-voyager-2-location-may-2010.jpg?w=540 )

“ ,        -2    33       !       ,        . ”       .

     , 175       .                 .

   

1986   2  , 1989     .          ( Great Dark Spot )        .       ( Geysers from Pinkish Nitrogen Ice )      ( Polar Cap on Triton )     .  1    “  ”  ( Jupiter ’ s Satellite Lo )      !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/voyager-1-and-2-locations.jpg?w=584 )

     , ,    ! 2010    2  8.6   ( 13.8  .. )   1  10.5   ( 16.9  .. )    !

         ( Flyby Gravity Swing Assist )     ( Two Third Cost Reduction )   .      12     865  .       2    30      !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-1d-voyager-1-details.jpg?w=540 )

      !

      ( Intersteller Mission )     1  40 AU  ( AU -Astronomical Unit ) ( AU = Distance Between Earth & Sun ) ,  2  31 AU  .     1   :  3.5 AU .  2   :  3.1 AU .         ( Termination Shock Phase )   !          .    -1      ( Heliosheath )   .   ,      ( Between Termination Shock Phase and Heliopause )  .    ( Heliosphere )         !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/outer-planets.jpg?w=540 )

      33        ,      ( Use of Available Electric Power & Attitude Control Propellant )    !        :   -  ( Radioisotope Thermo-electric Generators – RTG ) .     : 470 . 1997      335   . 2001   315 ,        .       2020        !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/05/fig-5-voyager-time-capsule.jpg?w=540 )

      

     1 & 2     . 2010  15                       .           ( Time Capsule )   .     ,  ,         .     ,      .     .    ‘   ’       .

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 
