! [ Image result for npcil ] ( https://www.npcilcareers.co.in/MainSite/images/logoplant.JPG )

       .

2017  31         1000 MWe    .  ,   ,         2016  10      [ First Criticality ] .         245 MWe   2016  29 , , , ,     .      ,         .           [ Atomic Energy Regulatory Board ( AERB ) ]   )  . ,     ,     [ VVER-1000 ]      ,  , ,  ,      ,     .

! [ Image result for Power Plant in India ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.indiaspend.com/wp-content/uploads/1_desktop.jpg )

*       1000 MWe       6780  .  1000     ,        .   VVER -1000     .       4000             . 2016 - 2017    189   100%        [ Nuclear Power Corporation of India, Limited ] [ NPCIL ] .   , 2013    11269    .     . 3.89   . *

! [ Image result for www.npcil ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.world-nuclear-news.org/uploadedImages/wnn/Images/Kudankulam%20460%20\ ( AtomStroyExport\ ) .jpg )

       .

2014  7        1000 MWe          .         ,    : 2013  14.    400       , .    2001  ,   ,           .          ,  1000 MW    ..

! [ Image result for www.npcil ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/06/0860a-knpp.png?w=745&h=563 )

 :   ?   ?      .        ,        .                    .             ?            ?           ,      .      .   ,           .           .

! [ Image result for npcil ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.topnews.in/files/Bharatiya-Nabhikiya-Nigam.JPG )

    ( 435+284+220 ) 939                ?       .    45            .           .           . ,         .     ,   ,                .

! [ Schematic Pressurized Reactor ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/06/schematic-pressurized-reactor.jpg?w=584 )

             .               .. ,       !     !         ,    .      ,      ,     ?

2012          ,  1757  20           .       .  ,  . ( 1809-1882 ) .    1831-1835            .        . 1757          .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/opposing-udhayakumar.jpg?w=795&h=443 )

       

////      (   )  , 12  2011 ///
*
*http://www.keetru.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=16513

/////   1, 2   , ,     . 1, 2       .    . 1, 2          ,   ( site Evaluation Study )  .   ( Safety Analysis Report ) ,  ,   .     ,  ,      .

kudankulam_323   . 828 ( 29.4.1991 –  )   2 .        , 2  5 .       ( Sterilization Zone )    . ,     ,    .      .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/reactor-building-cutaway1.jpg?w=530&h=1006 )

i ) AERB       5 ..  20,000   .   10 .    20,000 ,   12,000 ,   450  .

ii ) 10 .            .           .

! [ Image result for npcil ] ( https://lh5.ggpht.com/-xmMgwNsrSmY/UgKKggKwG1I/AAAAAAAAKSI/eJLyPO-sS6k/s0/India-PHWR-NPCIL-JPG.jpg )

iii ) 30 .  1,00,000-     .  2,00,000     28 .  .

iv ) 20 .   ,       AERB      15 .  .

    30 .  10        ,   ,     ,    ,   ,        . 2004          .////

! [ VVER cutout ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/06/vver-cutout.jpg?w=584 )

  :         . 2001           .   40     12     (      ) .     (  2011 )    .      .       .           .

/// ,   ,      ,   ,      ,  ,      ,    . 26.9.2006          .                     .      ,   ? /////

! [ Image result for Power Plant in India ] ( https://i0.wp.com/media.indiatimes.in/media/content/2017/Feb/kudankulamnuclearpowerplantpti_1487761226.jpg )

  :       .   40    20          .         .

/////     ,      , ,   ,      .   .    ,    . ,            , , ,     .///

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/indian-nuclear-safety.jpg?w=810&h=1124 )

  :   40     430      , ,    .     .        .   .         ?   ,  ,        .

//// , ,      . 2003  9   9.45    ,      . 2006  19   6.50    , , , ,      .  ,  ,  .     21     1.30 , 5.00    . 2011     7   .  11, 2011               .    2004               . /////

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/vver-1000-reactor-systems1.jpg?w=530&h=490 )

  : 9            .       .          ,      , ( Shutdown Cooling Systems )    ( Passive / Gravity Cooling Systems )      .    .

1979                 ..             ( Hydrogen Recombiners )   .             2011    .        .

////          .  18, 2011                 .////

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/fig-6-kudunkulam-demonstration.jpg?w=530&h=344 )

  :  9/11       5000     .    430        .             .

////2007                    .  1     ,              .      ,      ,     ,              . 2 008        13-       .      25     ,       ,  .////

  :       .   .   .           .        ( Atomic Energy Act )   /   .           &   .      ,           ( NPCIL )  .    ,    .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/anti-nuke-showdowns-1.jpg?w=810&h=405 )

////    .           .       ,      .      30   .  30    900   .       24,000  ,  ,        .      ,     ,  .   , ,  .///

  :        .     .      .        .        .      .     .

///   , ,    .                  .   ,  .             .       ,  ,     131, 132, 133,  134, 136, 137 , , , ,     , , ,     .  ,    ,     ,        ,    .////

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/opposing-crowd.jpg?w=810&h=540 )

  :           .     131, 132, 133,  134, 136, 137 , , , ,     .

////1988     (    ) 6,000    .  1997       17,000    . 1998      2006   , 15,500     . 2001          13,171  ,   6,755   ,    4%    .    ,  5    2,129   .         . 10          .       .///

  :    15,00        ,          100,000  ( 50   ) .   ,  ,        .          .

! [ Image result for www.npcil ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/npcil-links.jpg )

//      ,    2022      .              .         90%       . ,        .        10    . 28   ////.

  :        50      .      .       .    ( , ,   )     . , ,         . ,           .     .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/kudungulam-opposition-picture.jpg?w=530&h=399 )

///                     ,         .              .////

  :    .    .        /    .

///, ,         ,  ?////

  : 21    1000         , , ,    .   ,  , ,              ,    50    .

! [ ] ( https://makanaka.files.wordpress.com/2012/02/atomicenergyin_india-dae.png )

   !
  
   !
   .
 .
  
 
  
 ?
   
  .
   ?
  .
   -9
 ,
  ?
  ?

++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/06/planet-9-location-1.jpg?w=584&h=301 )

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/06/new-planet-orbit.jpg?w=584&h=574 )

        - 10

      2006      ,     .     , *  &   *      -9      2016   .       ,   ,    [ 2017  ]           ,   &   * [ Kathryn Volk & Renu Malhotra ] *     .                 .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/06/f33b9-nibiru_planetx.jpg )

      -     ,     [ Kuiper Belt ]         . 2016      ,    10  ,    .   .        .          8   .        [ The Astronomical Journal ]  .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/in5d.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/hrahdfz.jpg )

   -10 ;    500 - 700 AU [ Astronomical Unit ] [ One AU = distance between the Sun & Earth ] [ 93    150  .. ] ,       .          .       50 AU  .      100 AU.

! [ Batygin Shows Planet 9 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/batygin-shows-planet-9.jpg?w=584 )

    - 9 

* [  2016 ] *

++++++++++++++++++

! [ planet-9 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/10/planet-9.jpg?w=584&h=557 )

  -9    .          .

*  [ Professor, Planetary Science Caltech Researcher ] *

          -9    !          .

*  [  -9      ] *

! [ Earth's Planet -9 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/earths-planet-9.jpg?w=575&h=509 )

   -9   

2016       ,         -9.  ,  ,   .      , *  &   * * [ Konstantin Batygin & Michael Brown ] * 2016  18      [ American Astronomical Society Annual Meeting ] ,       -9     [ Tilt ]   .      -9     [ Wobble ]   .       .

! [ New Planet 9 orbit ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/new-planet-9-orbit.jpg?w=584&h=346 )

           .      6   .       !         .     .  -9   10  .   :       20  .  -9         30    .  -9   ,   [ Kuiper Belt ]      .

! [ New Planet System 2016 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/new-planet-system-2016.jpg?w=584&h=278 )

 -9  “   ” [ Angular Momentum ] ,   ,        [ Outsized Impact ] . [ Angular Momentum = Mass of the Planet X Its Distance from the Sun ] .   -9           [ A Multi-billion-year Wobble ]  !   6        .

    ,  -9       10  .      ,   ,    .      10,000 – 20,000    .       5000  .

*  &   [ Caltech Researchers ] *

! [ New Planet System ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/new-planet-system.jpg?w=644&h=489 )

      

         ,           .   -9         .     10,000 – 20,000     .   ,      * [ Computer Simulation Model ] * ,   :    [ California Institute of Technology – ( Caltech ) ]    :   &  . * [ Konstantin Batygin & Michael Brown ] *

! [ Batygin & Brown ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/batygin-brown.jpg?w=602&h=455 )

                  .   ,       .   2.8     .   -9   20   [ 5.6   ]     .

! [ New planet Nine ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/new-planet-nine.jpg?w=646&h=497 )

    -9       . 2014         [ Chad Trujillo ] &   [ Scott Sheppard ]     13    .          [ Kuiper Belt ]   .            .

! [ Hypergiant Star with disks of dust. ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/hypergiant-star-with-disks-of-dust.jpg?w=584 )

              .       30      .            .          ,    .   -9    10    ,      10,000 – 20,000    . 2003      [ Dwarf Planet Sedena ]    .   -9   .        -9    .

! [ Oigins of Solar System ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/oigins-of-solar-system.jpg?w=584 )

 [ Meteors ]        .         ,     [ Building Blocks ] .            .              .

*  [ Post doctorate, MIT Dept of Earth ] *

        ,  ,   ,        . . . .   (  1990 )     !

* ,       ( European Space Agency ) [  15, 2008 ] *

! [ Meteorite impacts on Planets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/meteorite-impacts-on-planets.jpg?w=584 )

     

         [ Asteroids ]    [ 2015  15 ]       .         .        [ Building Blocks ]       ;   [ Purdue ]    ,   , ”          [ Planetary Embryos ]   , ” .

! [ Violant beginning ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/violant-beginning.jpg?w=467&h=943 )

      [ Meteorites ] .  100       [ Beads like Chondrules ]  .       .     [ Computer Impact Model ]    .

  :

1.   [ Asteroids ]      .       .

2.   [ chondrules ]   .     .       .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/solar-family.jpg?w=586&h=462 )

     ?

 ,  ( Astronomers & Geologists )            .       “     ”  ( Radiometric Dating of Rocks )     4.6      .         3.9      !    ( Plate Tectonics )               !

     , ,               .        4.6      ,          .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172c.jpg )

     ?

     ,        250   . 1755       ( Immanuel Kant ) ( 1724-1804 )     ( Nebular Hypothesis ) :       ,   ,       ! 1796        ( Pierre Simon Laplace ) ( 1749-1827 )     .           !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172d.jpg )

       :         ( Mass Gravity )    .            ( Gravitational Contraction )  ,  .

      .        ( Molecular Gas Cloud )     100 AU ( Astronomical Unit ) [ 1 AU = Average distance between Sun & Earth ( 93   /150  .. ) ] ,     2  3   .      ( Cloud ’ s Gravitational Collapse )      ( Supernova )         .         .       .        .     ( Gravitational Potential Energy )      ( Density ) .       .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172a.jpg )

     ?

    ( Conservation of Angular Momentum )        .    ,        ( Proto-Planetary Disk )      “  ”  ( Pancake ) .                  ?               !            .               ( Tropical Hurricanes )   !

       ( Infant Proto-Star )     .   50                 .                .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/ulysses-orbit.jpg?w=584 )

             .        .      ,       ,  ( Silicates & Metals ) . ,           .

       .          .       .      “   ”  ( Oort Cloud of Comets ) .       .      .     250       .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172g.jpg )

      !

         ?        ? ,         ?               ?              ?        .         .       “   ”   .

     !

 15, 2008      1990         “    ” ( Ulysses Solar Probe )       2013      !        !                  !   125           ( Helio Centric Orbit )         .        250   2010   .

++++++++++++++++++++++

[  ]

Cosmic Inflation After the Big Bang

+++++++++++++++++

  
   .
  
    ?
  
  ?
  
 
   ?
   
  ?
   
  ?
  
  ?
 
  
 
 
  
 
  
  ?

+++++++++++++++++++++++

*       [ Cosmic Inflation Mystery ] *

     ,             !        [ New Particle Inflation ]    [ Primordial Force Field ] .     "  " [ Inflaton ] .   ,     [  ] [ Graviton ]  . [ In speculative theories of quantum gravity, the *graviton is a hypothetical elementary particle that mediates the force of gravitation in the framework of quantum field theory ] .    ,          .*

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/03/esa-planck-space-probe.jpg )

! [ Big bang to big rip ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/05/big-bang-to-big-rip.jpg?w=584&h=452 )

*     [ CERN ATOM SMASHER ]  LHCb       [ Analysis of the Decay of Mesons ]  ,      &  [ Cracow & Zurich ] .     "   " [ Higgs Boson ] ,     "   " [ Light Inflaton Particle ]      .         . *

       [ Inflaton Particle ]       .    ,   [ Inflation on Universe ]          .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/06/history-of-the-universe-1.jpg?w=584&h=451 )

! [ Baby universe picture ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/03/baby-universe-picture.jpg?w=584 )

       ,     .            .              . ”

*   [ Jean Jacques Dordain, ESA Director General ] *

     ,    .       [ Data ]     . ”

*  [   , Berkeley Lab ] *

“  “    ” [ Microwave Background Maps ]       [ Gravitationally-Lensed Microwave Photons ]  [ Dark Matter ]    .             . ”

*  [ Physics Professor, University of California ] *

! [ Baby universe picture -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/03/baby-universe-picture-2.jpg?w=584 )

      .

2010          [ Roger Penrose ]             .    300,000    “   ” [ Microwave Background ]   WMAP ( Wilkinson Microwave Anistropy Probe )   .

2013  21    [ ESA European Space Agency ]   [ Plank Space Probe ]             .           .         .           .

! [ Earlist Universe by Pen Rose ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/03/earlist-universe-by-pen-rose1.jpg?w=500&h=350 )

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/11/40711151ad.jpg )

       :

 800,000            .    15.5  .

1. ,    .      26.8% [  24%  ] .  : 68.3% [  71.4%  ] .   : 4.9% [  4.6%  ] .     [ Standard Model ]  “      .     [ Two halves Sky ]    [ Light Patterns are asymmetrical ]    .         .

2.        CMB [ Cosmic Microwave Background ]       .        .

3.           .

! [ Relative Details of three space probes ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/03/relative-details-of-three-space-probes.jpg?w=584 )

4.            .           .

5.      13.82  .   : 13.7  .

6.       :  380,000  . [       8.5   ] .

7.     2700  C   [ Protons ] ,  [ Electrons ] ,  [ Photons :  ]       .

! [ fig-1-before-the-big-bang ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1-before-the-big-bang.jpg?w=450&h=577 )

“     ( Big Bounce )     ( Big Bang )  !             ( An Implosion Triggering an Explosion ) . ”

* , ( Martin Bojowald, Asst Professor of Physics, Penn. State, USA ) ( Authour of Big Bounce Theory ) ( July 2007 ) *

“         .   ( Quantum State ) “   ”  ( Big Bounce )        ,                .        .             ( Extreme Quantum Forces )   “   ” ( Cosmic Forgetfulness )  !

 

*! [ fig-1a-cosmic-history ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1a-cosmic-history.jpg?w=450&h=869 ) *

“  ,   ( Stephen Hawking & Neil Turok )        20     ( Matter Density )     .           .     . . . .     .       .      !         .

*  ( Andrei Linde Pysics Professor, Stanford University ) *

“              . ”

 

*! [ fig-1b-hubble-telescopes-ultra-deep-view ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1b-hubble-telescopes-ultra-deep-view.jpg?w=450&h=406 ) * “          ( Cosmic Inflation Concept )       .       ( Multiverse )     .    ( A Universe of the Universes )  ”

*  ( Astronomy Magazine Editor, Physicist ) *

“     ( Cosmic Inflation Theories )        10^50     ( Blows up By a Factor of p {margin:0;line-height: 1.5;unicode-bidi: embed;} body { line-height: 1.5;unicode-bidi: embed;}1050 ) . ”

*  ( Mario Livio ) *

“        ( Well Synchronized in Temperature ) ,      . ”

*  ( Sean Carroll ) *

! [ Big bang ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/05/big-bang.jpg?w=584&h=546 )

*
* “        ( Choice )   ? ”

 

        ,        .

*    [ 1792-1871 ] *

         !       !       ,   !         !

* (    ) *

! [ After glow of the big bang -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/03/after-glow-of-the-big-bang-1.jpg?w=584 )

     

      .         .   ,           .     ?      ?     ( Matter & Energy )  ?         !        !                !     ,    ( Speculations ) .

! [ fig-1e-cosmic-microwave-background ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1e-cosmic-microwave-background.jpg?w=450&h=534 )

    ?   ;       ( Infinite )       ! ,               !       “    ” ( Big Bang Theory )      20        .               .      .          !

! [ fig-1f-content-of-the-universe ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1f-content-of-the-universe.jpg?w=450&h=782 )

 14    (  13.7   )        .             .                 !                       !          !

       ( Bib Bounce )                       .

! [ fig-5-cobe-cosmic-background-explorer ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-5-cobe-cosmic-background-explorer.jpg?w=450&h=805 )

    

   “   ” ( COBE Cosmic Background Explorer )     “   ” ( Cosmic Microwaves )  .         ( Homogenity )      .            .      .             !

! [ ESA Planck Space Probe-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/03/esa-planck-space-probe-11.jpg?w=584 )

     ( NASA Goddard Space Fight Center )    .       &   ( Diffuse Infrared & Microwave Radiation )         1989  18   .     .

1. DIRBE – Diffuse Infrared Background Experiment :      .

2. DMR – Differential Microwave Radiometer :      .

3. FIRAS – Far Infrared Absolute Spectro-Photometer :      

! [ fig-1g-cobe-space-probe1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1g-cobe-space-probe1.jpg?w=500&h=897 )

      ?

              “     ” ( Loop Quantum Gravity Theory )    .       ( Relativity Theory & Quantum Mechanics ) .       ( Time T=0 )         .     ( Density of the Universe is NOT Infinite )  .           .

! [ fig-4-dark-matter-the-elementary-particle ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-4-dark-matter-the-elementary-particle.jpg?w=450&h=584 )

         .           .           .    .            .           .      .       ,        ( Ultra-dense, Ultra-Hot & Ultra-Small Ball of Space Time )  !         “   ” ( Quantum Gravity )    .

! [ fig-3-in-search-of-gods-particle ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-3-in-search-of-gods-particle.jpg?w=450&h=565 )

            ( Time T=0 )        .      “   ” ( Big Bounce )  .             ,      .           .     “   ” ( Uncertain Speculations )     .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/06/712ec-1efm01igegzwz4kmoc0i3qa.jpeg )

   (    )   ?

-       ( One Dimensional Quantum Threads )  “   ” ( Atomic Geometry )  “    ” .            .     “   ” ( Big Bounce )    -  ( Space-Time Geometry )  .

     .             ( One of the Parameters )    !                .           “   ” ( Cosmic Forgetfulness )   .

(  )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/06/gslv-mk-iii-testing.jpg?w=400&h=1084 )

ISRO ROCKET GSLV MK III TESTING

* [ June 5, 2017 ] *

        -3 [ GSLV MK III ( Geosynchronous Satellite Launch Vehicle - Mark III ) ]  .         .            .       ;    .

*  [     ] *

            .     ,      [ Propellants ]     .

*. .  [    ,  ] *

! [ ] ( http://media5.picsearch.com/is?QC1OVBe4kBWf7jqCaJrcd69pgPpOTcHZSEHCrLYlEs4&height=341 )

GSLV MK III ROCKET READY FOR LAUNCHING

      .

2017  5          ,           . 140  [ 43  ] , 640         ஶ்  .      ,        .      .           ,    .   2      .

  2014 ,  ,                .      [ NASA's MAVEN MARS ]  671   .      73  . , 4        ,   ,            .             .   7   2024 ,         .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/79c55-im2012-07-15alas22-38-12.png?w=584 )

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://i1.wp.com/i67.servimg.com/u/f67/11/87/45/28/slide410.jpg )

“  , ,          .   .      .       -3   . ”

*  ,    ( International Conference on Aerospace Science & Technologies ) [  26, 2008 ] *

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/31ecf-chandrayaan-ii-krishna-matte-2012-580.jpg?w=584 )

    -2     .    [ 2018   ] .     -2 , [ Mother Ship ]          .     [ Moon Craters ]       ,    ,   [ Lander Descent & Ascent ] .   [ Rover ]    .

*  [      ] *

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/560a9-chandryaan_ii.jpg?w=584 )

      [ JSC Isotope Sources ]  -2   ,  * -244 [ Curium -244 ( Cm-244 ) ] *   .    ,        [ Alpha Proton X-Ray Spectrometer ] .

* [ Rosatom State Atomic Energy Corporation ] *

      .      .    [ Lunar Artificial Craters ]       .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.spaceflightinsider.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/Chandrayaan-2-Mission-Profile.jpg )

* [ Click to Enlarge ] *

        [ Lunar Terrain Test Facility for Lander Drop ]  .     [ Rover Mobility Tests ]  .

 ,    

 GSLV      50% .              .     .

*  ( Space Expert, Institute of Defense & Security Analysis, New Delhi ) *

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.chandrayaan-i.com/images/chandrayaan2-how.jpg )

* [ Click to Enlarge ] *

2018       -2 

2008    12   -1            .         -2  .  -2          [ Lunar Lander ] ,         [ Lunar Rover ]  .   -2   -1     ,    .              .   ,     .  ,        ,  -2  [ Return Trip ]   .        ,   . 2013      -2,    2018         .  -2         .          .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/cb436-ch-2rover.jpg?w=511&h=292 )

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/215e4-isroch2rover_update.jpg?w=584 )

2017  15      104     .  -2       ,  ,   [ One Orbiter, One Lander, One Rover ]     .  -2   60  [ 100 . ]    .         [ Retro Rockets ]   [ Lunar Craters ]   .          .        ,  .      -2       :  91    [ 450   ] 2017  . 2018            ..

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-3-chandrayaan-2-mission.jpg?w=500&h=1007 )

“               !        .  ,  ,              !          ,         !           ! ”

  .     ( 1919-1971 ) .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-5-chandrayaan-2-mission.jpg?w=584 )

“      .       .    41%    . -1         . ”

*. . .  (       ) *

“  -1          .         . ”

* ,    ( Chandrayaan Project Director ) [  13, 2008 ] *

! [ Fig 1G Indian Rockets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-1g-indian-rockets.jpg?w=500&h=1211&h=1211 )

“    ( Unique Bi-Static Experiment )     ( -1 &  LRO    )        .         .            .         .        . ”

    ,  D.C.

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-8-indian-cryogenic-engine1.jpg?w=584 )

“    ( Remote Sensing )    (   )  .            .    ( Bi-Static Experiment )   .          . ”

*  ( Srewart Nozette NASA Mini-RF Principal Investigator, LRO ) *

“  -1         .               . ”

*, ,      ,  [  9, 2008 ] *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/indian-space-program-2020.jpg?w=584 )

 -2     

  GSLV -III ( Geosynchronous Satellite Launching Vehicle III )           2014   -2   .      -2          .      .          .    2014        .              /     ! 2010         1.1   ( 58   ) .  GSLV -III     500     !     “     ” ( Russian Cryogenic Engine )  .             .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://c2.staticflickr.com/4/3821/11426587573d31c908130z.jpg )

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/d9764-chandrayaan_2.jpg?w=584 )

 -1      ,         .  -1     PSLV ( Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle )   .  PSLV ( Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle )     .    -2  .    ,      .    ( Cryogenic Engine )         . ,              .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://i0.wp.com/image.slidesharecdn.com/goswamich-2-payloads-120105002826-phpapp02/95/chandrayaan-2-second-moon-mission-by-india-payloads-1-728.jpg )

     

GSLV -III   4      .     ( Geosynchronous Transfer Orbit ) 10    .   : 629 ,  : 51  ( 167  ) ,    : 10 ,     5 .       10       .      500       .        GSLV -III        . 2010  15            .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/f452a-ch2-lander252brover.png?w=584 )

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.sciencecitychennai.in/photogallery/chandrayan2.jpg )

2010         GSLV -III    .   47 ,       .  16     ,    .       . ,      39   ( 1.75   )     .  10  ( 2010  ) GSLV -III    ( Boosters :  )     .    16   GSLV         .             .        .  2014   -2        . .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/rocket-performance.jpg?w=584 )

     !

2008  12    -1   100 . ( 60   )   ( Polar Orbit )   .       8  ,    440       ( 367 metre/Sec )        .                     .      ,           .          .     “    ” ( Geosynchronous Orbit )         !               .   , , ,    .         [ European Space Agency ( ESA ) ] )   .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-3-geosynchronous-satellites.jpg?w=584 )

   ,     

2009  20                  .       -1,    ( Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter -LRO )                  !            “  ”    ( Lunar Crater Erlanger in the Polar Region )  !       ,         .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/22115-15111125804813553632571224928042_n.jpg?w=584 )

    ‘    ’ ( Bi-Static Experiment ) .       “     ” ( Miniature Radio Frequency Instrument: Mini-RF )        .                 !        ‘   ’   .              .            !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/chandrayaan-1-pathu-details.jpg?w=584 )
  -1  

 28 2008   2009  -1  3000    .     60  ( 100 .. )      70,000            .        .          .   19, 2009  -1   60  120    ( 100 . –> 200 . )  .     2009   18    .  26, 2009  -1      “   ” ( Star Sensor )    .        ( Sensors of Gyroscopes & Antenna )     .           .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-1-indias-space-missions.jpg?w=584 )

    ( Bi-Static Experiment )     .          .  20, 2009        ( Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter -LRO ) 20   ( 12  )             .     ( Mini Radio Frequency Instrument -Mini-RF )      ( Synthetic Aperture Radars -SAR )      .           .             .

     .        .    -3   ( Helium-3 -An Isotope of Helium-4 Gas )  .     -3      .      78   ( 3800   ) ( 2008    )   !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/gslv-ready-to-be-launched.jpg?w=497&h=513 )

    

   ( ISRO )   ( Chandrayaan -2 )  2011-2012      .   -1    .    -2      .    ,  ( A Lander & Rover )      .            . ,  ( Lunar Lander & Rover )      .   4.25         . 16,000    ISRO  2008               !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/09/fig-2-discovery-of-water.jpg?w=584 )

2015               .    242   ( 1240   ) .       250    7   .      95     .     1000        .

    ,         . “  , ,          .   .       .       -3   , ”       ,  26, 2008          ( International Conference on Aerospace Science & Technologies ) . “  50   ,  ,          -1    , ”         .

++++++++++++++++++++++

 ,  
 ,    !
  
   !
 ,
   !
   
   !
    !
   !
 
   !
 
   !
    !
  ,
 
  
 
  
   !
   !
 
  
   !

+++++++++++++++++

! [ Earth's Axial Tilt ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/12/earths-axial-tilt1.jpg?w=510&h=557 )

*  &     *

    ,       [ Elliptical Orbit ] .   : [ Low Eccentricity ] 0.0034 &   : [ High Eccentricity ] 0.058.     /       100,000  .      ,          ,  .   [ 2017 ] : 0.0167.         .

         [ Earth's Axis Tilt ]   .    ,    ,      .    , 41,000      .   22.1   24.5    .   : [ 2017 ] 23.5 .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/06/earths-orbital-change.jpg?w=533&h=657 )

   ,      [ Precession ] .    ,  .   [ 21,000 - 26,000 ]   -    .   ,  ,       ,    ,  .

  ,  ,      .

    ,         .    ,  ,       .   ,            .       ,   ,    .      2017   29    .       ,       ,    ,   ,   [ Great Rift Valley in East Africa ]        .            ,      ,      .   ,     ,         .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/06/the-origins-of-life.jpg?w=528&h=473 )

! [ ] ( https://media.mnn.com/assets/images/2012/05/Precessionandseasons.jpg )

 282,000     [ Data ] ,     ,   ,       [ Inter-tropical Convergence Zone -ITCZ ]    .      [ Mathematical Prism ]   [ Pattern ]  41,000          .

* ,    [ University of Science & Technology of China & National Taiwan University Research Collaborators ] *

! [ What we can do ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/what-we-can-do.jpg?w=534&h=601 )

  
   !
   
  !
   
   !
  
     !
  
 ,    !
  
   !
   , 
     !
  
 
  !
  
, 
    !
   !
 
    ,
  ,
   ,
  
 
   !
    !
    !
    !
  
  
 
   !

+++++++++++++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/five-extinctions.jpg?w=584&h=405 )

   ,   /    .

    41,000     .    : 24.5 .   : 21.5 .   : 23.5 .     23,000      .  100,000        * "   " [ Precession ] *   .    [ Tropics ]      [ Earth's Orbit ] .        .     * "   " [ Milankovitch Cycle ] *   .

               [ Kristine DeLong ] *  .   282,000       ,     ,   ,     .   2015  25  * "   " [ Nature Communications ] *   . *

! [ Seasonal variations ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/12/seasonal-variations.jpg?w=537&h=406 )

 ,  ,   ,      .     ,         .    ,   ,  ,    ,        .

*  [  ,    ] *

! [ Global ocean mean temperature ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/global-ocean-mean-temperature.jpg?w=534&h=544 )

2013         *400 ppm [ parts per million ] *        [ Mauna Loa Observatory ]      .      400 ppm     [ Concentration ]    –     “  ”  [ Pliocene Epoch ]   .    : 3.5  9  F [ 2 to 5  C ]     .        [ Arctic Tundra ] .    65   80     !

*  [ Director, CU-Boulder ’ s Institute of Arctic and Alpine Research ] *

      ,       ,  * [ Blanket of water vapour and clouds ] * ,       .

 .

! [ World sharing of gas emiissions ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/world-sharing-of-gas-emiissions.jpg?w=500&h=421 )

“    2050   9.1   !  , , ,        . 15    [ Mount Kilimanjaro, Tanzania, Africa ]     !         20    .       !       !         !     ,        !       ?       ?   ,          . ”

*     [ Al Gore, American Former Senator/Vice President ( June 5, 2005 ) ] *

! [ Arctic Ice Retreat ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/arctic-ice-retreat.jpg?w=492&h=466 )

! [ Antarctica ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/antarctica.jpg?w=680 )

“          20   .      129,000           . ”

*  [ Richard Harris National Public Radio ( March 26, 2006 ) ] *

“        .  5     .                  !       . ”

*  [ Christopher Joyce, National Public Radio ( March 24, 2006 ) ] *

! [ Pollution groups ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/pollution-groups.jpg?w=680 )

“ 55                 ,          (  19, 1999 )    .     “     ” ( Latest Paleocene Thermal Maximum )  .  10,000 – 20,000    . ”

*  [ John Roach, Environmental News Network ( Nov 19, 1999 ) ] *

“   ,        [ Ocean Floor Sediments ]      .       .         [ Hydrated Soild Methane ( CH4 ) ]    .         [ Carbon ]    [ Global Exogenic Carbon Cycle ] . ”

 , , ·  

! [ Global Warming Effects ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/global-warming-effects.jpg?w=680 )

“    2050   9.1   !  , , ,        . 15    [ Mount Kilimanjaro, Tanzania, Africa ]     !         20    .       !       !         !     ,        !       ?       ?   ,          . ”

*      [ Al Gore, American Former Vice President ( June 5, 2005 ) ] *

! [ Impacts of Global Warming ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/impacts-of-global-warming.jpg?w=680 )

! [ What Global Warming does ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/what-global-warming-does.jpg?w=518&h=725 )

    ,          !             ,       !           .   ( 1979-1989 )        ,    !      ,             .    “    ” [ Chloro Fluro Carbons ( CFC ) ]

    

! [ Global warming family tree ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/global-warming-family-tree.jpg?w=680 )

     ?

    ,             ,        [ Temperature Range ]      .        ,    ,            .     , ,   ,     , ,      !     (  ,    )      .      .  ,  ,   “   ” [ Fossil Fuel ]           .

! [ Deaths due to Natural Disasters ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/deaths-due-to-natural-disasters.jpg?w=476&h=637 ) ! [ Fig 3 Gore's Presentation ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/fig-3-gores-presentation.jpg?w=680 )

     , 40,000             .        100    .           23  .         ,   ,   .      ,              .

! [ Earth's Orbit change ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/earths-orbit-change1.jpg?w=584 )

  , ,  !

            .       .    , ,   ,          .          .           !

1.  30     4 & 5  [ Hurricane Category: 4 & 5 ]  .

2.  10         .

3.   279 ,   [ Species of Plants & Animals ]        .

4. 7000                .

! [ Fig 2 Milankovitch Cycles ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/gkWk5MxTO7RD2DUfEUrE2wnrVJLORVtUMIzfYEPqxjdL2B9MI59PKRWE4CmVwA5VpCC_DQ7KsS1cY63AHDdDXFyX1skCwVnxCRmRi3LSVW4TF8xZzeDWcHLP0U9YgnReWk0i=s0-d-e1-fthttp://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/fig-2-milankovitch-cycles.jpg )

3.   279 ,   [ Species of Plants & Animals ]        .

4. 7000                .

     ,      .

1.  25          300,000  .

2. ,       20   ,      .

3. 2050          .

! [ Earth'a Axis wobbles ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/eartha-axis-wobbles.jpg?w=450&h=874 )

Earth ’ s Axis Wobbles

4. 2050        [ Species ]    .

5.   [ Intensive Heat Waves ]     .

6.   ,   ,    .

          .        .      ,          .             ?  !

! [ Impacts ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/impacts.jpg?w=680 )

(  )

2 ( a ) The Assault on Reason By Al Gore ( July 2007 )

3. BBC News “ China Unveils Climate Change Plan ” [ June 4, 2007 )

4. BBC News “ China Builds More ( Coal Fired ) Power Plants ( June 20, 2007 )

5. BBC News “ Humans Blamed for Climate Change. ” ( June 1, 2007 )

6. The Big Thaw, Ice on the Run, Seas on the Rise << National Geographic >> By Tim Appenzeller ( June 2007 )

8. Historic Global Warming Linked to Methane Release, Environmental News Network By: John Roach ( Nov 19 1999 )

14. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Effectsofglobal_warming [ August 9, 2013 ]

16. http://www.terradaily.com/reports/Greenlandiceismeltingalsofrombelow_999.html [ August 14, 2013 ]

17. http://www.planetseed.com/relatedarticle/sun-and-earth-and-temperature-change

18. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solaractivityand_climate [ October 1, 2015 ]

 
 ,  
 ,    !
  
   !
 
   !
  
  
   !
   !
 
   !
 
   !
   !
