     

2017   24   [ ? ]    .   [ 15 .. ]   [ Asteroid ]             [ Yucattan Peninsula ]     ,    .    [ Fossils ] 10 .. [ 4  ]   .         .      ,   .        [ Sulphur from the mineral Gypsum ]       "   " [ Global Winter ]  .    ,  , ,     .          :   [ Alice Roberts ] .

! [ Image result for Permian Period Mass Extinction Timeline ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.zo.utexas.edu/faculty/sjasper/images/25.5.jpg )

     ,     .    ,   ,     [ Deadly Gypsum ]  .     ]     ,    .     .      ,    .          .

  1300  [ 4300  ]         &   .      ,  ,   .       [ Outer Rim Crater ]   ,   [ Inner Peak Ring Crater ]    . 15 .. [ 9  ]     , 30 .. [ 18  ] , 100 .. [ 60  ]   ,   200 .. [ 120  ] ,   ..  .

! [ Image result for chicxulub crater Asteroid impact ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.21stcentech.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/Chicxulub-Crater-Yucatan.jpg )

       600  [ 2000  ]  ,   [  Limestone ] .  25,000    [ Fossil Fragments ]  .

+++++++++++++++++++++

   ,   [ Chicxulub ]  ,       .   [ Cretaceous Era ]  ,               .

*  [  ,     ] *

 [ Asteroids ]   ,         ,   .      26    .    27  C  5  .    30  .       .

  [  

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/five-extinctions.jpg?w=584&h=405 )

Five Global Extinctions

+++++++++++++++++

! [ Image result for dinosars extinction ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.earthmagazine.org/sites/earthmagazine.org/files/1324689388/i-269-7d9-9-2.jpg )

65        

65        ,     ,        .       ,      [ Computer Simulation Models ] ,               ,      .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/dinosars-death-2.jpg?w=584&h=345 )

   .    .          ,    .  [  2017 ]       ,   [ Droplets ]       .          .         ,   ,   ,    [ Marine Ecosystems ]    .

! [ Image result for fossil dinosaurs ] ( https://i0.wp.com/media-cache-ec0.pinimg.com/736x/86/23/01/8623012235ac37e5ed4cd2d3e2220f53.jpg )

    [ Sulphate Aerosols ]     .  3     ,     .      30        .      ,   ,   ,       [ Food Nutrients ]  .     [ Toxic Algae ] ,    [ Like Ammonites ] .     ,   [ Mammals ]   .       ,     .

! [ Asteroid Impact-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/asteroid-impact-1.jpg?w=810&h=956 )

   * [ Chicxulub, Yucatan, Mexico ] *   ,        100    * [ megatons TNT ] *      .       “   * [ Heat Pulse ] *   , ,  ,       .   “   ” * [ Kinetic Energy* ]   ,  ,      !

*  [  ,    ] *

! [ Asteroid impact -3 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/asteroid-impact-3.jpg?w=538&h=897 )

65       

65    6          ,             .    [ Cosmic Impact ]          ,         .       ,       ,  [ Chicxulub, Yucatan, Mexico ] .  .    6  [ 10 . ]   .  12       .     : 100    [ trillion TNT Power ]   .         -    !        110  [ 180 . ]

! [ Chicxulub Seismic Expt ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/chicxulub-seismic-expt.jpg?w=584 )

65             .       ,     .  ,         .      300,000    180,000         .       :     “   ” [ Shiva Crater ]  . 2013     [ Radiometric Dating ]   ,  11,000              .

! [ A miracle event ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/02/a-miracle-event.jpg?w=669&h=815 )

* [ Asteroid 2012 DA14 is about half the width of a football field ( 150 feet, or 45 meters ) , and will fly within 17,200 miles ( 27,700 kilometers ) of our planet on Friday, Feb. 15, 2013, zooming closer to the planet than the ring of satellites in geosynchronous orbit. ] *

! [ Path of Asteroid ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/02/path-of-asteroid.jpg?w=768&h=441 )

        . 6                      ,  ,   .     ,      .      ,   [ New Ecosytem ]   .   ,   ,     .

! [ Impact Evidence ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/impact-evidence.jpg?w=584 )

       ,              .

*   (    ) ( Major Tim Peake, ESA, European Space Agency ) *

      .       .         ( Earth ’ s Geostationary Orbit )      .   ,    ( Robotic Impact Spacecraft )        ,       .        .     2025      ( ESA )      .

*   ( ESA   ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/05/asteroids-1.jpg?w=750&h=776 )

 ( Galaxy )            !

 .

“ (    )        ( Asteroid Belt )       .               .           . ”

 ,    

“          .  2  ( Asteroid 2 Pallas ) ,  10  ( Asteroid 10 ) ( Hygiea )    ,      . ”

  ( Dy Principal Investigator, NASA Dawn Mission

! [ Arizona Crater ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/arizona-crater.jpg?w=584 )

       

2013  15     [ Asteroid : 2012 DA14 ]     17,000            6   .       * [ WISE ( Wide-field Infrared Survey Explorer ) Spacecraft ] *   . 2011    [ NASA Orbiter ]    100  ( 300  )    20,500      .   100        .    [ 2012 DA14 ]    17,000         .   239,000     .     ,      22,200  [ 35,800 .. ]      [ Geosychronous Orbit ]  .  17,000       , ,         .     .     .

! [ WISE Spacecraft ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/02/wise-spacecraft.jpg?w=591&h=654 )    [ 2012 DA14 ]    

 [ 2012 DA14 ] 2.7     , 2012  23          .   150  , 130,000    .       2013  15  .     :   5  [  8 .. ]    ,         .     17,200  [ 27,700 .. ]   .     17,180  [ 27,650 .. ]           .         33      .  16         .   , ,    “   ”  “  ” [ Eclipse ]       .

! [ Asteriods -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/02/asteriods-1.jpg?w=768&h=1118 )     [ Asteroid 2012 DA14 ]       500,000   .  1%         .       40           .    1200          . , , ,          240    .     17,000        .         ,     2.5    . 1908         [  100- 130   ]  750       .    “   ” [ Tunguska Event ]   .     [ NEOO – NASA Near Earth Object Observation Program ]        .

! [ Asteroid Impact -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/asteroid-impact-2.jpg?w=584 )

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear )  **

  
 
  ?
  

  ?
  
 ?
  
 
  
  ?
 
  ?
  
, 
  ? 
   
  ?
 
  
 
  
 ?
   
,   
  
  ?

++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/polar-auroras.jpg?w=528&h=839 )

   MMS [ Magnetospheric Multiscale ]      [ Magnetic Connection ]       .       [ Electrons ]       .   , ,   , ,          .

*-  [ Li-Jen Chen ] [  , MMS Scientist At NASA Goddard Space Center, in Greenbelt, Maryland ] *

! [ Image result for Magnetospheric Multiscale MMS Mission ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.universetoday.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/5313363804044320024331896998963_n.jpg )

     

             .      , ,   [ Spin & Spiral ]    .     ,  ,  .     [ Speiser Motion ]  . 2017   19      ,        .        [ Journal of Geophysical Research ] .

! [ Solar Rays and cosmic rays ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/solar-rays-and-cosmic-rays.jpg?w=581&h=435 )

    “   ” * [ Cosmics Leaving Out door Droplets, called as “ CLOUD Chamber ” ] *     .                 .             .

*  [    ] *

! [ Solar Rays and cosmic rays -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/solar-rays-and-cosmic-rays-1.jpg?w=584 )

“                     .               !           !                 . ”

*  ( Fangqun Yu ) ( State University of New York & Albany ) ( July 2002 ) *

      &  

2011        ,       .        ,   [ Cosmic Rays ]       .  1996            .       .   1996        .          ,   “   ” * [ Cosmics Leaving Out door Droplets, called as “ CLOUD Chamber ” ] *     .

! [ fig-1-cosmic-rays-cause-the-global-warming1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/02/fig-1-cosmic-rays-cause-the-global-warming1.jpg?w=450&h=488 )

    “   ” * [ Cosmics Leaving Out door Droplets, called as “ CLOUD Chamber ” ] *     .                 .                 .

     !

      . :     ! : , , ,         !               !         7%-10% ( Background Radiation Dose ) .        ,      .     / -,  , , , ,  , ,   .

! [ Primary Rays ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/primary-rays.jpg?w=527&h=672 )

      ( High Energy Particles )      .          !     , ,        100     ( Muons ) .       ,         .              .               !

       ( Computer Forecasts )    !   “    , ” “    ” ( Cosmo-Climatoloy & Galactic Physics )     !  -   “   ” ( Climate Science )            !

*  ( Co-Author – The Chilling Stars – A New Theory of Climate Change ) *

! [ Primary Rays -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/primary-rays-1.jpg?w=584 )

*     [ Cosmic Rays ] *

         .   ,       ( Solar Corona )  ,    ( Acceleration ) .       10  100 MeV ( Million Electron Volt Energy )   .     1-10 GeV ( Gega Electron Volt Energy )    !

          !             ( Solar Wind with Plasma & Electrons )  ( 240 / ) 400 ./   .          !             !

! [ Solar Rays ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/solar-rays.jpg?w=584 )

“ 2500                .           ,  ,          !           !         . ”

*    [ Intergovernmental Panel for Climate Change ( IPCC ) April 2, 2001 ] *

“  2000       ,       !      ,              . ”

*  [ Ian Sample, “ Not Just Warmer: It ’ s the Hottest for 2000 Years ” Guardian Unlimited ( Sep 1, 2003 ) ] * “

! [ Cosmic Rays Shielding ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/cosmic-rays-shielding.jpg?w=584 )

3000          ,           .           ,      , 1960           ! ”

*  [ Andrew Revkin, The New York Times ( 23 September 2003 ) ] * “

          !       . ”

*  [      (  23, 1999 ) ] *

! [ fig-3-intergalactic-cosmic-rays-effects ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/02/fig-3-intergalactic-cosmic-rays-effects.jpg?w=450&h=520 )

     !

21        ( Global Warming ) .          .     ,      “    ” (     )    .  “     ”    ( Hockey Stick Temperature Chart )         ( Michael Mann )    .           .       ,      .    :      ( Stellar Origin )     ,   ( Dr. Soon & Dr. Baliunas )  2003    “    ”    .

! [ How cosmic rays make clouds ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/how-cosmic-rays-make-clouds.jpg?w=584 )

            ( Nir Shaviv )         ( Jan Veiser )          ( Cosmic Rays )  .     ,    ( Atomic Nuclei ) .       .           .       !           !

    

  :

  “    ” ( Cosmic Ray flux )  ,    !         .         .     !    “   ” ( Solar Wind )      .             .         .      !

! [ Fig 6 Cloudy Outlook of Global Warming ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/fig-6-cloudy-outlook-of-global-warming.jpg?w=584 )

     ,       .                   ( Cloud Cover in the Lower Atmosphere )  .                !       .               .           “    ” ( Earth ’ s Albedo )  !          (   )     .          .      .    ( CO2 )         CO2   .

! [ Fig 9 Voyager Findings ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/fig-9-voyager-findings.jpg?w=584 )

 CO2      .      ( Phanerozoic Temperature Measurements )  CO2    ?      . CO2       . -  CO2           !

       !

“   ”      (  2007 )        !               .   &          .     :    .         ,   ,   ,           !    “   ”      . “            .           !

! [ Galactic cosmic rays ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/galactic-cosmic-rays.jpg?w=584 )

         “  ”     ( Ions or Charged Particles ) !         !                !    ,     .        ,        .               .        :        ( Computer Forecasts )    !   “   , ” “   ”  ( Cosmo-Climatoloy & Galactic Physics )    !  -   “   ” ( Climate Science )                 !

      !

             .                 2008  17       !          “      ”         !

! [ fig-7-causes-of-global-warming ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/02/fig-7-causes-of-global-warming.jpg?w=450&h=570 )

      !

    ,        !         ! 4.6          ,           .   23.5  ,     90   ,         !        .    ,     20       !        ,  ,    ,    ,  ,   [ Eccentricity, Axial Tilt, Precession ]      20      .      “   ” [ Milankovitch Cycles ]   .   ,         [ Serbian Astronomer ] .            100,000  ,     25,800   ,   21.5   24.5        41,000      .

! [ Fig 8 Earth Rotating Axis Tilt ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/fig-8-earth-rotating-axis-tilt.jpg?w=450&h=976 )

*   [ Earth ’ s Axial Tilt ] *

 ,        [ Tilt Angle ] .    22.5   24.5   41,000  ,     .        .     ,       .       .   ,      [ Moisture ] ,    .      ,    .    [ 23.5 ]   .    ,      [ Pole Star & Vega Star ]  .   23,000   .       !   ,  ,         .

(  )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++

:

  
   
    !
  
    !
   
  !
  
 
  
   !
    ,
,   
  !
  
  !
  
 
 
   !
 

   ! 
 
  
  
  !

+++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/trappist-1-system-relative-size.jpg?w=584&h=405 )

       , ,     . -1 [ TRAPPIST-1 ] .             

  * [ Canadian Institute for Theoretical Astrophysics ( CITA ) ] *

       

    2017    40    -1 [ TRAPPIST-1 ]     ,   . :                   .            ,   "  "    .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/trappist-1-system-1.jpg?w=584&h=414 )

           ,             .      ,        !    [ TRAPPIST-1 ]        .      .               [ Stable Synchronizing Paths ]  . -1    [ Resonant Chain ] ,     .   [ Resonant configurations ]       [ Planets' Orbital Periods form Ratios of whole numbers ] .

+++++++++++++++

! [ Quadruple Star System -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/quadruple-star-system-11.jpg?w=584 )

           

! [ Quadruple Star System ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/quadruple-star-system1.jpg?w=584 )

    4 ,     [ Four Star Systems ] .           .          30  [ 30 Ari ] .  136       [ Constellation of Aries ] .

*  [ Cerro Tololo Inter-American Observatory, Chile ] *

     .   ,  , ,     .     .      ,      .

*  [ Jet Propulsion Lab, California ] *

! [ Four star system -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/four-star-system-1.jpg?w=584 )

     

               ,  4%   , ,       .              .           .            “   ” [ Palomar Observatory, San Diego ] .    “  ”   [ Robo-AO Adaptive Optics System ] .       .

      .      ,       .      [ KIC 4862625 ] 2013       .         30  [ 30 Ari ]  .  136       [ Constellation Aries ] .          10   !          335  .

! [ Solar Sytem formation ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/solar-sytem-formation.jpg?w=584 )

“       ,    [ Binary Star System ]     .    ,    ,      ,      . (   )   * [ HD 106906 System ] *            .         [ Planet ’ s Progenitor Clump ]    ,        . ”

*  [  ,    ] *

“     [ Binary System Stars ]  10:1    .       –   100:1      !             .   ,           . ”

*  [  ,    ] *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/trappist-1-system-3.jpg?w=584&h=812 )

      –   .

2013  4          –  [ Binary System Star – Planet ]  .   * [ HD 106906 B ] *   .           11          .    :   –    650    !   ,          !     –        :  .        .           .

      ,    [ Binary Star System ]     .    ,    ,      ,      .     * [ HD 106906 System ] *            .         [ Planet ’ s Progenitor Clump ]    ,        .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/trappist-1-system-4.jpg?w=584&h=329 )

    [ Binary System Stars ]  10:1    .       –   100:1      !             .   ,           .

 13   ,           !  :      1500    [ 2700  F ]  ,  .    4.5     ,       .       ,     .        [ HD 106906 B ] 350  .    -      .

! [ Hunt for Earth like planets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/hunt-for-earth-like-planets1.jpg?w=507&h=688 )

“         .  ,   .   .         .    , , ,   ,   .     ,        .          . ”

*  [       ] *

    -62e, -62f [ Kepler -62e & Kepler -62f ]   .   -62 [ Kepler -62 ]    .   -62e    .         [ Warm and Humid ] .     -62f      “   ”    .        . ”

*  [    ] [ Dimitar Sasselov ] *

! [ Two Water Planets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/two-water-planets.jpg?w=507&h=848 ) “        . ”

*  &   ( Ray Villard & Adolf Schaller ) *

“          ,          . ”

*  ( Ray Jayawardhana, Associate Professor of Astronomy, University of Toronto ) ( 2007 ) *

! [ Kepler -62 System ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/kepler-62-system.jpg?w=540&h=381 )

       

2013  6            .     -62 [ Kepler -62 ] .   -62    .  .      :  -62e,  -62f [ Kepler -62e and Kepler -62f ] .   -62e,      122 ;   -62f    267 .          .   -62e,    60% ,   -62f 40%    .        ,    .  -62      -62e,  ,     .     -62f  CO2   , “    ” ,         .       .

! [ Blue Gaseous Planet -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/blue-gaseous-planet-1.jpg?w=451&h=522 )

     .

2013  11      63             .   : HD 189733b. 2005             . 2013     .      2.9     .       ,     ,     [ Gravitationally locked ] ,       .      : 2000  F.   : 4500 mph.    [ Cobalt Blue Colour ]          .        [ Silicate Particles ]      . 2007    [ Spitzer Space Telescope ]  ,  -   500  F   .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/08/fig-2-planets-gravitational-lensing.jpg?w=503&h=439 )

       ( Epsilon Eridani )       .      ,     !   ,       ( Brown Dwarf )   .

*   ( Barbara McArthur, Project Leader, University of Texas ) * ”

       [ 12,000  ] .      20       -581   .    0  40    .        .         . ”

*  [ Stephane Udry, Geneva Observatory ] *

! [ Hubble Space Telescope ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/hubble-space-telescope.jpg?w=536&h=720 )

“      ,           .  20   ,    .     ,      .              . ”

*  [ Alison Boyle, Curator of Astronomy, London ’ s Science Museum ] *

“                  .   .       . ”

   * [ Dr. Charles Beichman, Director Caltech ’ s Michelson Science Center ] *

! [ Total exoplanets 2012 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/12/total-exoplanets-20121.jpg?w=584 )

“       .        .    ?     ?      [ Water Vapour ] ?        ?           . ”

*   [ Member, Terrestrial Planet Finder, NASA ] *

“             !      876 ( Gliese 876 )    !   !          450    !         ! ”

*  ( Michio Kakau, Professor Theoretical Physicist, City College of New York ) ( 2007 ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/08/fig-3-two-images-in-gravitational-lensing1.jpg?w=529&h=875 )

     !

250            1755             !  [  3, 2008 ] 307               !         .   &  ( NASA & ESA )          . 1991             .     [ 2008 ]  307     !     “  ” ( Methusela ) . 7200            !            !

! [ Size of Planets 2013 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/12/size-of-planets-2013.jpg?w=584 )

2006     ( American Astronomical Journal )      ( Epsilon Eridani Star )      .            . 4.5         !            !     .    – 800   !        !       30    !         ( Planet Jupiter )    !         ( Extra-Solar or Exo-Planet ) !       7   !          , 2007        .

! [ Image result for TRAPPIST-1 ] ( https://www.thestar.com/content/dam/thestar/news/world/2017/02/22/what-to-know-about-the-newly-discovered-trappist-1-solar-system/exoplanets5.jpg.size.custom.crop.1086x611.jpg )

     

     (  25, 2007 ) ,            ,      .          [ Atacama European Science Observatory, ( ESO ) La Silla, Chille, South America ] 3.6  ( 12   )  , ,    .         “ -  ” [ Back-and-Forth Wobble of Stars, caused by the gravitational effect of the unseen Planets ]     .        ;   12,000 .      5 .     :  581 c [ Gliese 581 c ] .  ,     13  .       20.5   .    .     [  186,000   ]    .    ,        !

    [  10, 2013 ] 1051, 797   ]   ( Exoplanets )  ,               .        .           .             .          ,       ·      .

! [ Einstein Planet ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/12/einstein-planet.jpg?w=584 )

   

2005  17         [ Andrzej Udalski ]       [ Optical Gravitational Lensing Experiment ( OGLE ) ]          ,        .           .     100   .      .        :        !         !            .       1.3  [ 4   ]   600     [ Micro-lensing Experiments ]  .

     ?

                [  400  ]   .       1% .      . 1936        ,        .       .         .      :         ,      [   ]     .      .  “   ” [ Einstein Ring ]   .     ,        .

! [ CHIO Observatory, Chile ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/12/chio-observatory-chile.jpg?w=584 )

     

          .               .      ( Glare )  ,    .      ?   ,   ,   ,   ,  ,    ,    ,   ,   ,    ( Astrometry, Radial Velocity or Doppler Method, Pulsar Timing, Tansit Method, Gravitational Micro-Lensing, Circumsteller Discs, Eclipsing Binary, Orbital Phase, Polarimerty ) .               ( Ground-Based Telescopes )  .             .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/08/fig-1e-new-planet-details.jpg?w=530&h=813 )

1. 2006         ( COROT )  .

2.        .   &   :

3.    ( Kepler Space Telescope )  2009    .

4.     ( New Worlds Mission )     .

5.  :      ( ESA ’ s Darwin Space Mission ) (   : 2015 )

6.     ( Space Interferomerty Mission ) ( SIM ) (  : 2015 or 2016 )

7.    ( Terrestrial Planet Finder ) ( TRF ) (     . )

8.  (   ) : ( PEGASE ) PEGASE is a proposed space mission to build a double-aperture interferometer composed of three free-flying satellites. The goal of the mission is the study of Hot Jupiters ( pegasids ) , brown dwarfs and the interior of protoplanetary disks The mission would be performed by the Centre National d ’ tudes Spatiales and is currently being studied for launch around 2010-2012.

(  )

56. http://www.dailygalaxy.com/my_weblog/2017/05/newly-discovered-trappist-1-solar-system-all-seven-planets-synchronize-in-nearly-perfect-time-with-t.html [ May 10, 2017 ]

57.http://www.spacedaily.com/reports/AstronomersConfirmOrbitalDetailsofTRAPPIST1h_999.html {May 22, 2017 ]

S. Jayabarathan ( jayabarathans@gmail.com ) May 22, 2017 [ R-2 ]

https://jayabarathan.wordpress.com/

044         

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/solar-probe-close-to-venus.jpg?w=584&h=454 )

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

++++++++++++++++

  
  
  !
  
  !
  
  !
  

  !
   
  !
   
   !

  
  
 !
  
 !
   
 
 
   !
 
 

 .

++++++++++++

! [ Image result for space travel to venus ] ( https://i0.wp.com/static.guim.co.uk/sys-images/Guardian/Pix/pictures/2005/11/09/venus3.jpg )

  

         

2019  27                     . ,       ,            .

   ,   1960  . 2017         : , ,   ,  .   290           [ Robot Explorers ] .

! [ Image result for space travel to venus ] ( https://i0.wp.com/farm9.staticflickr.com/8149/7158560211a06963fe61z.jpg )

  [  ]  

     .   , ,  [ Density ] ,   [ Bulk Composition ] ,    .   4.5       .   :   ,   30%   .         .       [ Payload ] 175 ..    500 .       : 60,000 ..  : 500 ..           .     ,      .

+++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/nasa-image-venus-transit-2012.jpg?w=584 )

              .

*   ( ESA European Space Astronomy Centre ESAC ) *

          ( Venus Express Spacecraft )   ,        .

*  ( ESA Venus Express Project Scientist ) *

“             .       ( Transport of Momentum )   .       ( Origin of the Super-Rotation of Atmosphere )     .           ( Mismatch )     . ”
*
  ( Dmitriy Totov, Max Plank Institute for Solar Research in Germany ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/venus-transit-2012-12.jpg?w=544&h=671 )

“          ,  ( Energy Budget )        . ”

*  ( Scientist IFSI-INAF, Rome ) *

“ (    )  ‘   ’        .      ( 2010 International Venus Conference at Aussois, France )    . ”

  ( Hakan Svedhem )    

“    ( Extrasolar Planet ) , , ,   ,        .           . ”

*      ( Mark Swain, NASA Jet Propulsion Lab, USA ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/venus-transit-2004-2012.jpg?w=584 )

“           ,         . ”
*
 ,   *

“     ( Titan ) (   )      ( Super-Rotating Atmospheric Cloud ) .            .             . ”
*
 ,   *

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-1b-the-phases-of-venus.jpg?w=529&h=773 )
*

     

2012  5 /6  100-130         .        (   )          .         .     5    6  . 120        8     . 2004  8       . 2012  6        .       130   8   1874  9 , 1882  6   .    113   2117  2125     .

     ,    , , ,  ,      .      ,     .        ( Griffith Observatory )          .    .   8           .

36,000 . ( 22,000  )   ( NASA ’ s Solar Dynamics Observatory – SDO )   10   . 2012            .              .         .  11            .

     

1.        ,      .    ( Exoplanets )     .

2.  ,     ( ESA, Venus Express Spacecraft )         ,        .

3.           .           .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-1k-esa-control-room.jpg?w=584 )

ESA Venus Express Control Room

   2010    

    ,  ,      ,        ,       .     225   .

    :

1.   243          ?

2.         4    ?

3.       460       ?

, ,   1965          .            ( Venus Express ) . 2005         2006      !   ( 2012  )        .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1c-venus-earth-comparision.jpg?w=604&h=546 )

 2005   ‘   ’ ( Venus Express )   2003       ‘   ’ ( Mars Express ) .               .     :           &   ( Multi-Wavelength Imaging & Spectroscopic Observations of the Planet ’ s Atmosphere & Clouds ) .         , ,   .   2010   VMC  ( Venus Monitoring Camera )    .     ‘    ’ ( General Circulation Model -GCM )   .    ( Titan )   ,       .    2010  21       .  2010        .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1a-venus-express-instruments.jpg?w=540 ) *

     

    960  (  1600 .. )  .    ,           .        (   ,   ) 100,000    2.2   .    ,        !     243  (   24   ) .             ‘   ’ ( Super-rotation of Venus Atmosphere ) 4    !           !

         ‘   ’ . 1960              .     .       .                       .

    243  .          200  (  100 mph )   4   .      ( Titan Moon )          .        - ( Hector Javier Durand-Manterola ) 150–800 . ( 90–480  )         ( Supersonic-Speed Winds in the Ionosphere ) . ‘   ’   ( Trans-terminator Flow )     ..  .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1-earth-venus.jpg?w=540 ) *

 ‘    ’ ( Pioneer Venus Orbiter ) 1980        . -  · ( Cryosphere )  -     ( Momentum )      .  ,         .                 !

      

    (   : 450 C / -30 C )  !    .            !         !    !      95% !     81% !       93  .       30   55   .  5        .          !           ,         ?

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/fig-1g-runaway-greenhouse-effect1.jpg?w=540 )

      ,   ( C02 – 65% Nitrogen – 3% )    .        ,  ,  .  C02       .        .      250,000  C02          !             “   ”   !      ,    .                ·    .             !

     (   = 243   ) ,   (   = 224   )   .               !           !    24          !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-3-venus-earth-comparion.jpg?w=577&h=998 )

      243   .          !          ( Ionosphere )    !         !

     

   100  [ Earth atmosphere ] ,   462  C  -6     . [ 1  =14.7 psi.    100×14.7=  1500 psi ] .      [ Carbon dioxide ] 97%,  2%,   [ Inert Gases ] 1%,   0.4%,  [ Water Vapour ] 0.4%.        .     ,  78%,   21%  2%.    ;    .           !        225 .      365 .    24       ,      243  .    [ Spin ] ,    [ Orbital Periods ]     [ Synchronized ]          .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/07/cover-image-new.jpg?w=479&h=492 ) *

     

2005  9     [ European Spce Agency ( ESA ) ]       ( Venus Express ) 153    2006  9         !        : 250 ..   : 66,000 ..

   :

1.   ,  ,  .

2.     ?

3.          ?

4.       ?

5.        ?

     

       :

1. Mag ( Magnetometer ) :  –      .

2. Virtis ( Visible & Infra-red Thermal Imaging Spectrometer ) :  –        

3. PFS ( Planetary Fourier Spectrometer ) : · –    ,    /    .

4. Spicav / Soir ( Spectrocopy for Investigation of Characteristics of the Atmosphere of Venus ) :  – ,     . / Soir ( Solar Occultation at Infra-red ) :  –          .

5. VMC ( Wide Angle Camera ) :  – ,     .

6. VeRa ( Venus Radio Science ) :  –      ,   ,        ( Radio-Sounding Experiment ) .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-1f-venus-atmosphere-2.jpg?w=584 )

7. Aspera ( Analyser of Space Plasma & Energitic Atoms ) :  –      ‘     ’ ( Energetic Neutral Atoms ) , ,  ( Ions & Electrons )   .

2009           ,    2012      . 2010  21     ‘  ’   ( Akatsuki Venus Probe ) 2010       .       .

* [  ] *

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

:

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

+++++++++

  
  
   !
  
   

   !
 
  
  !
  
  
  
 !
  
 ,

  .
  
   
   !
  
 
  
  .
2025 
  
  
   !

++++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/a/aa/Phobos.jpg )

  

2017  10   &       .     . 2024           [ Pobos ] .    .    ,       ,   .    .         .

* -   [ Jean-Yves Le Gall, President France National Centre for Space Studies ( CNES ) ] *

! [ Image result for Mars and its moons ] ( https://i1.wp.com/msl-curiosity.requio.com/images/phobos_deimos.png )

  :  & 

**

**

     ,   .

2017  10    ,         [ Phobos ]      .   2017     .     2024  .     ,  &  [ Phomos & Deimos ] .   .   6000 .. [ 3700  ]   .     27 .. [ 17  ]  .       ,       .    [ Asteroid ]   .         .

! [ Image result for Mars and its moons ] ( https://i2.wp.com/howmanyarethere.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/MarsPhobosDeimos.jpg )

, , 

       [ Graveyard ] .        .        .     &     [ France National Centre for Space Studies ( CNES ) ] & [ Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency ( JAXA ) ]      .

! [ Image result for Mars Has Moons ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.seasky.org/solar-system/assets/animations/systemmenumars.jpg )

     ,      .  100   2  [ 6.5  ]    .  30  50          . 2011             . 2020   -          .     10  15           .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/hayabusa-2.jpg?w=400&h=408 )

    

 -2  500    30 ..   ,         .         .         .         [ Amino Acids ]    .

*  [  -2     ] *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/explorer-hayabusa-2.jpg?w=462&h=600 )

“    ,          .       .            . ”

*     ( JAXA ) *

“          ,         .           ( Batteries )    . ”

*  ( JAXA Associate Executive Director ) *

“       .      .            .        .

   ( JAXA ) 

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/orbital-diagram.jpg?w=525&h=500 )

* 2014      -2     
*

      2014    [ Asteroid : 1999 JU3 ]               .   2018        .       2020      .     4 ,   2       ,      .       2  .  -2       1999 JU -3.     [    ] .       [ Organic Molecules ]     .

 -2  500    30 ..   ,         .           .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/rocket-for-hayabusa-21.jpg?w=584 )

            .        [ Amino Acids ]    .

    [ Stardust Comet Mission ]    [ Comet : Wild 2 ]    .    [ Thermal Imaging ]   [ Carbon Compounds ]     .

 -2   

     .              .        .        .            .        .

. ! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/cover-image-asteriod-sample.jpg?w=540 )

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1-asteroid-sample-capsule-arrives-1.jpg?w=540 ) *

   -1    

2010  14         ( Space Capsule )   .     ( Asteroid )        .     :  ( Asteroid 25143- Itokawa ) .       ‘    ( Woomera Military Zone )      ‘  ” ( Hayabusa ) .     ‘  ’  .     ( Heat-Resistant Capsule )         .                      !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1a-asteroid-sample-capsule-arrival-path.jpg?w=540 )

“  ,          .       .            . ”       ( JAXA ) .

“         ,         .           ( Batteries )    . ”    ( JAXA Associate Executive Director ) .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1b-probe-sampling-asteroid-soil.jpg?w=540 )

    

   ( 5  . )                  2003   9  .    ( M.V. Rocket )   ( Kagoshima )     .          .    : ( 540 X270 X210 . ) ( 1800′X900′X700′ ) .      : 2005   .    , ,  , ,  ,  ( Composition & Density ) ,   2005      .                      .        .        .       13, 2010.

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1c-asteroid-that-was-sampled.jpg?w=540 )

 ‘  ’  ( Mini-Lander MINERVA -Micro Nano Experimental Robot Vehicle for Asteroid )     .           .    ,    ( Spaceships : Galileo & NEAR Shoemaker )   ,           . 2000       433  ( Astroid : 433 Eros )    .      ,    .          “    ” ( Guinness World Record )      ( JAXA )   .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1d-sample-returns-to-earth2.jpg?w=540 )

 -1     ?

           ( Xenon Ion Engine, Powered By Sun )     (  6   )  .        .               ( Heliocentric Orbit )   .

    ‘    ’ ( Robotic Vehicle )   .          .    590  ( 10 .. , 12 ..  ) .      ‘    ’ ( A Rotating Flywheel )               .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1e-solar-ion-engine.jpg?w=540 )

2005  12           .        ‘  ’ ( Altimeter )    44  ( 150  )   ‘    ’ ( Auto Alitude Keeping Sequence )   .           .           !              ( Space Hopper )  .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1f-details-of-ion-propulsion-engine.jpg?w=540 )

         ( Meteorite Samples )   .   .           .                   ( Hajime Yano ) .

   ( JAXA )          .                 .   ,   ,   ,      ( Autonomus & Optical Navigation, Deep Space Cumminication & Command, Close Movements on Space Objects with Low Gravity )         .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1g-ion-rocket-principle.jpg?w=540 )

     

       ,     !  30      ,      . 100            .   .            .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-3-esa-lunar-plasma-thruster.jpg?w=526&h=678&h=678 )

Rocket Engines | Type | Thrust ( Pound Force ) * | *Specific Impulse ( Seconds ) * | *Lifetime Fuel Usage
-|-|-|-|-
Saturn V F-1 ( 1x ) * * ( 1960 years ) * | *Chemical | 1,700,000 | 298 | minutes
Space Shuttle Main Engine ( 1x ) ( 1980 years ) * | *Chemical | 500,000 | 440 | minutes
NSTAR Ion Engine ( 1 ) * | *Electric | 0.02 | 3300 | years
NEXT Ion Engine ( 2 ) * | *Electric | 0.07 | 4300 | years
VASIMR ® VX-200 * ( New Plasma Rocket ) * * ( 2005 ) * | Electric | 1 | 5000 | > years

          .            .  ,                 .              .     .       ,  ,         .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-2-japans-falcon-probe.jpg?w=540 )

       ?

 ,   ,           “   ” ( Specific Impulse )     .        -5     300 .       1,700,000    .    ( Space Shuttle Rockets ) 500,000     .    : 440 .       4300 .     0.07 .     : 5000 .   : 1 .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-3-space-probe-returns-to-earth.jpg?w=540 )

        .           .  ( Xenon Gas )            .           ( Positive Ions )      .        ( Equal but Opposite Reaction ) .        .       ‘   ’ ( Inert Gas & Easily Ionized ) .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-4-hayabusa-ready-to-pick-the-asteroid-soil.jpg?w=540 )

      !

                       .           .       12 ..  ( 7 mps )    39,000       ( DC-8 Airborne Laboratory ) .   510 .. ( 1120  )     .          ( Woomera Prohibited Area ) .       ( Geocentric Positioning System -GPS )        .            ( JAXA )    .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-5-xenon-ion-engines-under-testing.jpg?w=540 )

 
   ?
  
     ?
  
    ?
 
, , 
 
   ?
   
 
   ?
   
   ?
 
 


   ?
