 

  ?

++++++++++++++

! [ Image result for NASAselectsCubeSatSmallSatmission ] ( https://www.jpl.nasa.gov/cubesat/images/cove2.jpg )

     

          .         .         .

  ,     

! [ Image result for NASAselectsCubeSatSmallSatmission ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.nasa.gov/images/content/745985mainCPODdiagram_full.jpg )

     

    [ CubeSat & SmallSat ]   

    ,    ,     * [ Planetary Science Deep Space SmallSat Studies ( PSDS3 ) ] *  .       ,  ,  , ,   [ Astroids ]  .

! [ Image result for NASAselectsCubeSatSmallSatmission ] ( https://i1.wp.com/images.techtimes.com/data/images/full/121622/cubesat.jpg )

   

     .  400  [ 180 .. ]  .   * [ CubeSat ] *     [ One Unit : 10 X 10 X 10 cm ( 4 x 4 x 4 inch ) ] .   ,    [ Auxiliary Payloads ] .     .   ,      .     3.6  .    2017  20   48   &    * [ 48th Lunar & Planetary Society Conferrence ] *    .

! [ Image result for NASA CubeSat Launch Initiative ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.geek.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/NASA_cubesat.jpg )

     .

  1.  
  2.  
  3. * [ Asteroids ] *
  4.  
  5. * [ , , , ,  [ ? ] *

! [ Image result for NASAselectsCubeSatSmallSatmission ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.coloradospacenews.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/m15-146lunarorbiter_cubesat.jpg )

   

  1.   :

  :  ,    ,    : 30 ..  ,      ?  ,   [ Noble Gases & their Isotopes ]     .  :   [ Cupid's Arrow ]

  :  ;   . 12   . :   .     . : [ CUVE ]

! [ Image result for NASAselectsCubeSatSmallSatmission ] ( https://i0.wp.com/images.spaceref.com/news/2013/smallsatcubesat945.jpg )

   

2.   :

 :   :    , , .  : CUBEX, 12   .    .

:http://www.spacedaily.com/reports/NASAselectsCubeSatSmallSatmissionconceptstudies_999.html?

! [ Oigins of Solar System ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/JQd8P1UkXUyjGQm6NEovb1ujh39vprWdwRzuoZoPhmz1oOg2RPJAorle7gZuyrCmJhzIY3qV2l2NAxTl_1j-y65fH1ZsYIENxLkXbaPZ1z7y3ZpzvedX7moffm145i8pkw=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/oigins-of-solar-system.jpg )

 [ Meteors ]        .         ,     [ Building Blocks ] .            .              .

*  [ Post doctorate, MIT Dept of Earth ] *

        ,  ,   ,        . . . .   (  1990 )     !

* ,       ( European Space Agency ) [  15, 2008 ] *

! [ Image result for NASAselectsCubeSatSmallSatmission ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/04/0afea-outerplanetssmallsat.jpg?w=636&h=483 )

  

     

         [ Asteroids ]    [ 2015  15 ]       .         .        [ Building Blocks ]       ;   [ Purdue ]    ,   , ”          [ Planetary Embryos ]   , ” .

! [ Image result for NASAselectsCubeSatSmallSatmission ] ( https://i1.wp.com/cdn.parabolicarc.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/CubeSatLaunchInitiativeSelectees2017.jpg )

! [ Hypergiant Star with disks of dust. ] ( https://ci5.googleusercontent.com/proxy/buarx-sVyfS2-f0ZYlxeV5LyWzlAWeoyNAn85oUsJuORdVEp0VYZXQ1hzP-Qrs8C4bAPh08JrEPXVzOQ8fIWP6K3O99IoZyMXQZ4xnF1ogiIJwXbv0NDylIkiYDHXlHi0sWpHkEKciCKQO3Scw=s0-d-e1-fthttps://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/hypergiant-star-with-disks-of-dust.jpg )

      [ Meteorites ] .  100       [ Beads like Chondrules ]  .       .     [ Computer Impact Model ]    .

  :

1.   [ Asteroids ]      .       .

2.   [ chondrules ]   .     .       .

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/QDOX3Y5Fslfu-mbPVPF6fyJ8i-i908xDTnAn0ZbnWLYgEn4uLm-ibrlu4rIwrSp3NIAzqsygKyG-N_-cSUsPt2RcKoY8Q5aeyi-ixZJAB92W3jH0PHI=s0-d-e1-fthttp://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/solar-family.jpg )

     ?

 ,  ( Astronomers & Geologists )            .       “     ”  ( Radiometric Dating of Rocks )     4.6      .         3.9      !    ( Plate Tectonics )               !

     , ,               .        4.6      ,          .

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/yhE9ozQL6OvkCChaB3wNvKvJD7_oZZXH9GTe6m-drzA8bQzOotaz1MVv6dkRVTOuhPho4YN23p-4uS6iSGhLXDqvxR3D8Mfiyw=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172c.jpg )

     ?

     ,        250   . 1755       ( Immanuel Kant ) ( 1724-1804 )     ( Nebular Hypothesis ) :       ,   ,       ! 1796        ( Pierre Simon Laplace ) ( 1749-1827 )     .           !

! [ ] ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/n3LFznnf6Q91hlfrzKu1o5gufmfwWSKV-jm66ftavQLUVNOZm5nfuNp9vFH6qx2N0fMwpFFhv3GJgfKvICTzX2Z3K71Baxcg=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172d.jpg )

       :         ( Mass Gravity )    .            ( Gravitational Contraction )  ,  .

      .        ( Molecular Gas Cloud )     100 AU ( Astronomical Unit ) [ 1 AU = Average distance between Sun & Earth ( 93   /150  .. ) ] ,     2  3   .      ( Cloud ’ s Gravitational Collapse )      ( Supernova )         .         .       .        .     ( Gravitational Potential Energy )      ( Density ) .       .

! [ ] ( https://ci3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/dIdq1EqboUxq4xm8ZOTaYMm8eC7mHVLFEJxQ9eJSacfvwSfI1brnJus2osQqC9x9N3bGneUdZnXOWvFlj-cEnZRbheC9a5b-JA=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172a.jpg )

     ?

    ( Conservation of Angular Momentum )        .    ,        ( Proto-Planetary Disk )      “  ”  ( Pancake ) .                  ?               !            .               ( Tropical Hurricanes )   !

       ( Infant Proto-Star )     .   50                 .                .

! [ ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/4OyLvutB7CXQVRViOYJeVtQtPX3cnGlG7g-wmiaFPn_OJccwEu8ibPxSEPWmrq8k7psvO4fjRwqF1am6sd8sHiZR1h7hXNm8e-f3jw3WoKNn9VqwTv7x=s0-d-e1-fthttp://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/ulysses-orbit.jpg )

             .        .      ,       ,  ( Silicates & Metals ) . ,           .

       .          .       .      “   ”  ( Oort Cloud of Comets ) .       .      .     250       .

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/n4AWtIk82B-cyuVAhP9TJw9GWLACXlHzh2CIk_9FpnZpJpgGlPrGN3G62PjhFdSuO2oXxPwQlZJN-CQ6YVZiGQ3c2ykAHNDw=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172g.jpg )

      !

         ?        ? ,         ?               ?              ?        .         .       “   ”   .

! [ ] ( https://ci4.googleusercontent.com/proxy/0ITOX25tpx7mxyGyaWZCN2doIv8QRTMyW_bGeiHNqJeoZ2agITmHhu1xKOYmpv3Nf9zdHgZqtufrF7Yvj71PqeCOUXnpzRBw=s0-d-e1-fthttp://www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172h.jpg )

     !

 15, 2008      1990         “    ” ( Ulysses Solar Probe )       2013      !        !                  !  125           ( Helio Centric Orbit )         .        250   2010   .

! [ ] ( https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/cJAK120kerQFWifzVMXoY2fyKfdvWybNpqfXE8a-l3frRXhsEf5rNfkXpnJA1Et1LudxuTczTqTd9uWcHfvxdV9Tc3gPqaBzN9ffQ6GKnyxlNNIn-3VX1JY8GPR4eqjnXeKzyA=s0-d-e1-fthttp://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/fig-1-the-thermonuclear-furnace1.jpg )

[  ]

:

047   ,       

! [ Image result for technology to observe supermassive black hole ] ( http://www.dailygalaxy.com/.a/6a00d8341bf7f753ef01bb098fe619970d-800wi )

 

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

+++++++++++++++

   
 
  
 
   !
  
,  .
  
 .
 , 
 
  
  !
 
 
 !
   !
 
  !
 
   !
 
  
  
  !
  

  
  !
  
 
   :
, , ,
, 
 !

++++++++++

! [ Image result for first image of dark matter filaments ] ( https://stardustinacosmicteacup.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/universe.jpg )

*  [ Dark Matter Filaments ] *

        * [ Dark Matter Filaments ] *      .          ,  ,   . 23,000   [  ]    ,      ,       .

* , [ , ,   ,  ] *

! [ Image result for dark matter filaments image ] ( https://i0.wp.com/newswatch.nationalgeographic.com/files/2014/01/cosmic-web1.jpg )

  

    

     [ Dark Matter Web Filaments ]    ,    ,     .  2017  12          .       .        .

       ,      .      .    ,    .  25%      ,   .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/04/galaxy-pair-connection.jpg?w=584&h=836 )

! [ Eagle_Project-1024x576 ] ( http://www.dailygalaxy.com/.a/6a00d8341bf7f753ef01b7c8ecba30970b-800wi )

*  [ Dark Matter Fliments ] *

 ,  ,  .       .        [ Mike Hudson ] ,      [ Seth Epps ] ,   ,     [ Weak Gravitational Lensing ] .         [ Canada-France-Hawaii Telescope ] .

4.5     23,000      ,      .    : 40              .    * "    "    [ EAGLE Project ( Evalution & Assembly of GaLaxies and their Environment ) ] . * ,  300         .

! [ Image result for For First Time We Have the Technology to Observe Milky Way's Supermassive Black Hole ] ( https://i1.wp.com/cdn.zmescience.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/black-hole-milky-way.jpg )

    .

      ,      . 2017  12    ,          ,            .          .  ,      ,         .

       ,       [ Observatories ]          .    10,000 .. [ 6200  ]   .    ,  26,000  , *   [ Sagittarius Constellation ] *      .      [ Director, Event Horizon Telescope ] .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/en.es-static.us/upl/2014/09/dark-matter-energy-atoms-pie-chart-NASA-e1411130628194.png )

“        99%  .       90%  .           .    ,       ( Numerical Simulations of Galaxy Formation )  .     ( Local Dark Matter Density )   “   ” ( Dark Matter Halo of our Galaxy )     . ”

*  ( Silvia Garbari, Scientist, University of Zurich, Switzerland ) *

“    ,         .        .     ,      . ”

*   ( ,    ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/dark-matter-in-galaxy.jpg?w=584 )

“      .    .            !

    

“        !     “  ”   !   1/2 ( Spin 1/2 )     .    ,    . ( No Interactions with Matter or Photons ) ”

*   :   ( Wolfgang Pauli ) ( 1930 ) *

! [ fig-1c-gravitational-lensing ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1c-gravitational-lensing.jpg?w=540 )

“         .             .           ! ”

*  (  ,    ) *

“               .        .        ( Cosmologists )      . ”

     

*! [ fig-1d-composition-of-the-cosmos ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1d-composition-of-the-cosmos.jpg?w=515&h=674 )
*

      .

2012  15      ,     ,         .   ,             .       .       ( High Quality Computer Simulations )     .          ( A New Dark Matter Component ) .

1930       [ Fritz Zwicky ]      .     [ Clusters of Galaxy ] ,     .        ( Jan Oort )      [ Density of Dark Matter ]           .

*! [ fig-1c-dark-energy-dark-matter ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1c-dark-energy-dark-matter.jpg?w=531&h=580 ) *

     

           .      .          !         3 –6      .     ,       .            !        ( Testing the method on a Simulated Milky Way )    .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/fig-3-dark-matter-defined.jpg?w=584 )

  :   !   !

         .              .              .         “   ” “   ”     ( Mixed Dark Matter or Cold & Hot Dark Matter ) .        ,      .       ,     30%    .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/fig-1-cold-dark-matter-located-by-hubble-telescope.jpg?w=584 )

       ?

          !      ( Massless Neutrino Particles )  .     ( Special Theory of Relativity )       .             ( As per the Kinetic Theory of Gases )  .

! [ fig-1a-cold-dark-matter ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1a-cold-dark-matter.jpg?w=555&h=668 )

       ?

      !           .      .                 .           .

! [ fig-1e-particles-zoo ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1e-particles-zoo.jpg?w=473&h=822 )

    

            .          . 1931       ( Wolfgang Pauli )     .            ( Enrico Fermi ) .  ·  ( 1934 )     .     1942          ( Nuclear Chain Reaction )       .

! [ fig-1f-matter-energy ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1f-matter-energy.jpg?w=540 )

             , , ,      “   ” ( Neutrino Astronomy )    .      “   ”  ( Nucleosynthesis ) , , , ,                 .              .

! [ fig-1f-power-spectrum ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1f-power-spectrum.jpg?w=540 )

    ( CMB ~ Cosmic Microwave Background )    “   ” ( Radiation Field )        .          !        “     ” ( Predicted Cosmic Neutrino Background )  · ( Photon ~  )  CMB ( Cosmic Microwave Background )     .

! [ fig-1g-neutrinos-in-the-universe ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1g-neutrinos-in-the-universe.jpg?w=511&h=799 )

   &  

              .      ( Pattern of Galaxies )     .         ,        ( Smoothen the Fluctuations in Matter Density )  !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/dark-matter-near-the-sun-1.jpg?w=475&h=837 )

   “   ” ( Neutrino Density )   .         .          ( Overdense Regions ) –        !          “    ” ( Density Fluctuations )  .             .

! [ fig-1h-ordinary-matter-inside-dark-matter ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1h-ordinary-matter-inside-dark-matter.jpg?w=578&h=701 )

    75%   ( Dark Energy ) , 21%   ( Dark Matter ) 4%       ( Named as Normal Matter ) .      65%,   30%,  0.5% [ Stars ] ,  ,   4% [ Free Hydrogen & Helium ] ,   0.03% [ Heavy Elements ] ,   0.3% [ Ghostly Neutrinos ] .

     !

       ( Dark Energy )       “   ” ( Heavenly Mystery )    !         “   ” ( Dark Matter ) !            !        ( Particle Accelerators ) , ,     .     ( Super Symmetric Particles )       ( Prime Candidates for the very weakly interacting Particles )     .       ,    ( Mass )  .  “   ” ( Neutrino Particle Physics )      !

! [ fig-1j-gravitational-lensing-dark-matter ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-1j-gravitational-lensing-dark-matter.jpg?w=522&h=880 )

    ?

1930       ( Jan Oort )     ,       .    .    ,   , ( Galaxies )         .                  .      ,           .

   ,    ,             ( Dark Matter Existed 3 times as much Bright Matter )    .       ( Luminous Disks ) ,      ( Halos )       .

! [ fig-5-visible-dark-matter ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/fig-5-visible-dark-matter.jpg?w=540 )

   

        .                 .      .             . 2006     ( Update )    ( Cosmologists )       ( Shown by Cosmic Microwave Background Radiation )           ( Lumpy Distribution of Galaxies & their Clusters )      .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/fig-dark-matter-in-galaxies.jpg?w=511&h=882 )

              .       ( WIMPs – Weakly Interacting Massive Particles )     .             ( Cern Accelerator )    .

    ( MACHO -Massive Compact Halo Objects , ,  ,  ,        ( Non-Luminous Objects )    ( Condensed Objects ) .        ( Gravitational Lensing ) .

(  )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++
:

  
  !
  
  !
  
   !
  
 
 
   !
  
  
 
 
  !
  

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/04/new-exoplanet-with-atmosphere.jpg?w=584&h=708 )

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/04/super-earths.jpg?w=584&h=365 )

* [ click to Enlarge ] *

*The rocky exoplanet GJ 1132b was first pinpointed in 2015 ( Dana Berry ) *

++++++++

    

2017  6          [ Super-Earth GJ 1132b ]         .         ,   .            .        [ GJ 1132 ]  ,   2.2   [ ESO/MPG Telescope ]  .      1.6 .    1.4 .    :          ,      .   [ GJ 1132b ]    [ GJ 1132 ]  ,   39  ,     [ Southern Constellation Vela ] .

! [ Water vapour in Large Planet ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/water-vapour-in-large-planet.jpg?w=502&h=720 )

Gliese 1132 b Exoplanet | List of exoplanets
-|-
! [ Exoplanet Comparison GJ 1132 b.png ] ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/41/ExoplanetComparisonGJ1132b.png/300px-ExoplanetComparisonGJ1132b.png )
Size comparison of Gliese 1132 b with Earth.
Parent star
Star | Gliese 1132
Right ascension | ( α ) | 10h 14m 51.1s
Declination | ( δ ) | −47° 09′ 12″
Apparent magnitude | ( m V ) | 14.7
Distance | 39 ly
( 12 pc )
Spectral type | M3.5D
Orbital elements
Orbital period | ( P ) | 1.6 d
Physical characteristics
Mass | ( m ) | 1.6 M ⊕
Radius | ( r ) | 1.2 R ⊕
Stellar flux | ( F ⊙ ) | 19 ⊕
Temperature | ( T ) | 410 K ( 137 °C; 278 °F ) K
Discovery information
Discovery date | May 10, 2015 ( announced ) [ 1 ] November 12, 2015 ( confirmed ) [ 2 ]
Discoverer ( s ) * | MEarth-South Array Team
*Discovery method | Transit
Discovery site | Chile
Discovery status | Confirmed
Other designations

Gliese 1132 b, Gl 1132 b, GJ 1132 b

! [ Water vapor discovery ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/water-vapor-discovery.jpg?w=526&h=620 )

       ,    [ Radial Velocity Technique ]   ,       .     ,     .

*  [     ] *

       .     [ James Webb Space Telescope ] & 30   [ Thirty Meter Telescope ]   ,      .

*  [    &   ] *

! [ Water found in exoplanet ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/water-found-in-exoplanet.jpg?w=459&h=865 )

      

2014  26          715     ,      .  715    305    .   1700 [ 2014  ]  .    ,     .   ,    .      ,      [ Habitable Zones ] . 2009           715  .

! [ Hunt for Earth like planets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/hunt-for-earth-like-planets1.jpg?w=507&h=688 )

        .

            [ Water Vapour ]    .     ,     ,     ,    .       [ Alexandra Lockwood ]      .         .

! [ CHIO Observatory, Chile ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/chio-observatory-chile.jpg?w=584 )

“         .  ,   .   .          .    , , ,   ,   .     ,        .          . ”

*  [       ] *

    -62e, -62f [ Kepler -62e & Kepler -62f ]   .   -62 [ Kepler -62 ]    .   -62e    .         [ Warm and Humid ] .     -62f       “   ”    .        . ”

*  [    ] [ Dimitar Sasselov ] *

! [ Two Water Planets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/two-water-planets.jpg?w=507&h=848 ) “        . ”

*  &   ( Ray Villard & Adolf Schaller ) *

“          ,          . ”

*  ( Ray Jayawardhana, Associate Professor of Astronomy, University of Toronto ) ( 2007 ) *

! [ Kepler -62 System ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/kepler-62-system.jpg?w=540&h=381 )

       

2013  6            .     -62 [ Kepler -62 ] .   -62    .  .      :  -62e,  -62f [ Kepler -62e and Kepler -62f ] .   -62e,      122 ;   -62f    267 .          .   -62e,    60% ,   -62f 40%    .        ,    .  -62      -62e,  ,     .     -62f  CO2   , “    ” ,         .       .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311h.jpg )

     .

2013  11      63             .   : HD 189733b. 2005             . 2013     .       2.9     .       ,     ,     [ Gravitationally locked ] ,      .       : 2000  F.   : 4500 mph.    [ Cobalt Blue Colour ]          .        [ Silicate Particles ]      . 2007    [ Spitzer Space Telescope ]  ,  -   500  F   .

! [ Einstein Planet ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/einstein-planet.jpg?w=469&h=901 )

       ( Epsilon Eridani )       .      ,     !   ,       ( Brown Dwarf )   .

*   ( Barbara McArthur, Project Leader, University of Texas ) * ”

       [ 12,000  ] .      20       -581   .    0  40    .        .         . ”

*  [ Stephane Udry, Geneva Observatory ] *

! [ Hubble Space Telescope ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/hubble-space-telescope.jpg?w=536&h=720 )

“      ,            .  20   ,    .     ,      .              . ”

*  [ Alison Boyle, Curator of Astronomy, London ’ s Science Museum ] *

“                  .   .       . ”

   * [ Dr. Charles Beichman, Director Caltech ’ s Michelson Science Center ] *

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311aa.jpg )

“       .        .    ?     ?      [ Water Vapour ] ?        ?           . ”

*   [ Member, Terrestrial Planet Finder, NASA ] *

“             !      876 ( Gliese 876 )    !           450    !       ! ”

*  ( Michio Kakau, Professor Theoretical Physicist, City College of New York ) ( 2007 ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/08/fig-3-two-images-in-gravitational-lensing1.jpg?w=529&h=875 )

     !

250            1755             !  [  3, 2008 ] 307               !         .   &  ( NASA & ESA )          . 1991             .     [ 2008 ]  307     !     “  ” ( Methusela ) . 7200            !            !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311ac.jpg ) 2006     ( American Astronomical Journal )      ( Epsilon Eridani Star )       .            . 4.5         !            !     .    – 800   !        !       30    !         ( Planet Jupiter )    !         ( Extra-Solar or Exo-Planet ) !       7   !           , 2007        .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311ab.jpg )

     

     (  25, 2007 ) ,            ,      .          [ Atacama European Science Observatory, ( ESO ) La Silla, Chille, South America ] 3.6  ( 12   )  , ,    .         “ -  ” [ Back-and-Forth Wobble of Stars, caused by the gravitational effect of the unseen Planets ]      .        ;   12,000 .      5 .     :  581 c [ Gliese 581 c ] .  ,     13  .       20.5   .    .     [  186,000   ]    .    ,        !

! [ Exoplanets 2012 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/exoplanets-2012.jpg?w=527&h=808 )

    [  10, 2013 ] [ 1051, 797   ]   ( Exoplanets )  ,               .        .           .             .          ,       ·      .

   

2005  17         [ Andrzej Udalski ]       [ Optical Gravitational Lensing Experiment ( OGLE ) ]          ,        .           .     100   .      .        :        !         !            .       1.3  [ 4   ]   600     [ Micro-lensing Experiments ]  .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311e.jpg )

     ?

                [  400  ]   .       1% .      . 1936       ,        .       .         .      :          ,      [   ]     .      .  “   ” [ Einstein Ring ]   .     ,        .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311g.jpg )

     

          .               .      ( Glare )  ,    .      ?   ,   ,   ,   ,  ,    ,    ,   ,   ,    ( Astrometry, Radial Velocity or Doppler Method, Pulsar Timing, Tansit Method, Gravitational Micro-Lensing, Circumsteller Discs, Eclipsing Binary, Orbital Phase, Polarimerty ) .               ( Ground-Based Telescopes )  .             .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/08/fig-1e-new-planet-details.jpg?w=530&h=813 )

1. 2006         ( COROT )  . 2.        .   &    : 3.    ( Kepler Space Telescope )  2009    . 4.     ( New Worlds Mission )     . 5.   :      ( ESA ’ s Darwin Space Mission ) (   : 2015 ) 6.     ( Space Interferomerty Mission ) ( SIM ) (   : 2015 or 2016 ) 7.    ( Terrestrial Planet Finder ) ( TRF ) (     . ) 8.  (   )  ( PEGASE ) PEGASE is a proposed space mission to build a double-aperture interferometer composed of three free-flying satellites. The goal of the mission is the study of Hot Jupiters ( pegasids ) , brown dwarfs and the interior of protoplanetary disks The mission would be performed by the Centre National d ’ tudes Spatiales and is currently being studied for launch around 2010-2012.

(  )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++

049          

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

  
  !
   !
  !
  
  
  !
 
 
 ,
  !
​  ​
   
 
 !
  ​
 
 !
  ,
  !

​+++++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/04/runaway-black-hole.jpg?w=584&h=627 )

https://youtu.be/dNXWvJoN_sw

https://youtu.be/bAZgDn8QL3A

         !

2017  23           .    [ Black Hole ]   [  ( Galaxy ) ]     [ Gravitational Waves ] .    .          !     100   [ Supernovas (   ) ]      .

! [ Image result for gravitational wave kicks out black hole from galactic core ] ( https://i2.wp.com/stech3.firstpost.com/tech2images/640x359/proportional/jpeg/2017/03/black-hole-collissions-624x351.jpg )

           ,    .         .      :  , ,       .   2017  30     [ Journal of Astronomy & Astrophysics ] .      [ Quasar 3C 186 ] ,     8      .         .        4.7      !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-1-when-black-holes-collide.jpg?w=574&h=613 )

       ,        .        (  )  .

*   ( Stefanie Komossa, Max Plank Institute of Extraterrestrial Physics, Germany ) ( Nov 19, 2002 ) *

! [ Image result for gravitational wave kicks out black hole from galactic core ] ( https://i1.wp.com/i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2016/06/30/11/35D0D08200000578-3667677-image-a-1_1467284033336.jpg )

“           !             ! ”

* , ( Astronomy Science Editor ) *

“    “   ” ( Event Horizon )  .      . ”

* , ( Astronomy Science Editor ) *

“       !      ( Quantum Glow of Thermal Radiation ) .

*  ( 1970 ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-1b-simulation-when-black-holes-collide.jpg?w=584 )

   ( Star Cluster )  ( Medium Size )   ,        .

  Jet Propulsion Lab ( JPL ) , California

       !      90%   !  ,               “   ” ( Singularity )   .    ,     . ( At the point of Singularity, the Pressure & Density of a Black Hole are Infinite ) !

*   ( Ths Handy Space Answer Book ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-1c-a-black-hole-simulation.jpg?w=505&h=592 )

*      !
*
2002    4                         -  ( Chandra X-Ray Observatory )  .        .     ( Black Holes Merger )      .    NGC-6240     .      ,             -  .   14.7           .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-1d-kerrs-black-hole.jpg?w=507&h=881 )

“        ,        , ”    ( Dr. Hasinger, Chandra X-Ray Observatory ) . “        (  )  . ”    ( Stefanie Komassa, Max Plank Institute of Extraterrestrial Physics, Germany )  .

          -     ( Harvey Tananbaum ) .              .         .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-1e-best-collision-simulation.jpg?w=530&h=816 )

*     
*
     ( Densest Objects )  .       .       .               ,     ( Computer Simulation Models )   .

        “ - ”    ( Gravitational Waves ) .         ( Space-Time Ripples )   “   ” ( Computer Simulations )       .     -      ,      ,         ( Waveform Signatures )        .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-1f-smaller-bigger-black-holes.jpg?w=527&h=558 )

  !   !

  ·  ( Felix Marabel )         .    3.5-15       .               .     :     ,                !

          .      .              .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-7-black-hole-sucks-the-star.jpg?w=509&h=574 )

          10-100    !        .    3000 .          !       100      !     ,             . 4     ( Andromeda Galaxy )              .

    ?

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-2-cosmic-explosions.jpg?w=567&h=773 )

1916            ( Karl Schwarzschild ) ,       .    ,   1780   ,    ( John Michell & Pierre Simon Laplace )      “   ” ( Dark Stars )  .           !               !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-3-when-galaxies-smash.jpg?w=559&h=575 )

1970-1980           ,       .           ( A Black Hole is a Region of Space-time affected by such a Dense Gravitational Field that nothing, not even Light, can escape it ) .     7  ( 11 ../ ) .     7   ,     ..     :  ( 186000 / ) .           .       ,      .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/black-hole-formation.jpg?w=540&h=1172 )

        ?  ,     , ,              .          ( Stellar Black Holes )   !    ( Mass )    10  !           ( Supernova )  !        ( Neutron Star )        .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-1a-formation-of-black-hole.jpg?w=573&h=487 )

*    “  ” *

2012        ( Gravity Wave Detector )    .   &       “  ” ( ESA & NASA Space Probe – LISA -Laser Interferometry Space Antenna ) .            .     5  .  ( 3   )      “     ” ( Michelson Interferometer )      .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/fig-6-gravity-wave-detector-lisa.jpg?w=577&h=749 )

(  )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++

*:  
*

* [ Geffrey Whitney ] *

 : . , 

++++++++++

  

    *!*

  ,

   ,

  ,

  ,

   ,

   ,

  ,



  

 

   *!*

  **

   *?*

  *!*

 , ** , ** 



  *!*

   *?*



  *?*

   ,

  •  

  !

**  

  !

+++++++++++++++

* Pepper Spray

** Electroshock Weapon

051           

! [ ] ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/91/Plutoanimiert200px.gif )

 

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

++++++++

  
    !
   
   !
   
 ,  
   !
   
  
   
  !
  
   !
  
  !
   

  
  
  
  !

+++++++++++++++

“    : (  )          ? (  )     . . ! ”

*  ( 1571-1630 ) *

   .       ,       .     ,   .

*  [ Scientist, Johns Hopkins University ] *

! [ ] ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0a/Plutoorbit1.5sideview.gif/225px-Plutoorbit1.5sideview.gif )

   

* [   ] *

2006      [ International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) ]    ,        ,       .   ,   ,   [  21, 2017 ]     .

*  [ Scientist, Johns Hopkins University ] *

      .     .         .     .

*  [ Scientist, Johns Hopkins University ] *

http://www.bing.com/videos/search?q=Pluto+Planet+Status+2015&&view=detail&mid=CAF6063430E9798AA3B7CAF6063430E9798AA3B7&FORM=VRDGAR

+++++++++++++

      

2006       [ International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) ]   ,        ,  2017   .     ,       , .                ,         [ Kirby Runyon ] .      ,       ,    ,     100       ,  .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/09/fig-1-dwarf-planets-pluto-sedana-quaoar.jpg?w=575&h=484 )

    [ New Horizon Space Probe ]  8000       .      4.67    .     ,     .              .

  1. *  &   [ Southwest Research Institute, Boulder, Colarado ] *
  2. *  [ National Optical Astronomy Observatory, Tucson, Arizona ] *
  3. *  [ Lowell Observatory, Flagstaff, Arizona ] *
  4. *  [ George Mason University, Fairfax, Virginia ] *

  2017  21    &    [ Lunar & Planetary Science Conference ]  .      .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/09/fig-1d-relative-size-of-pluto.jpg?w=566&h=394 )

++++++++++++++

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/09/fig-1c-relative-position-of-planets.jpg?w=584 )

         ,            !

* ( .. 382-322 ) *

“      ( Dwarf Planet Pluto )    ”

*,      ( 2006 ) *

     ,       .     ,  ,   ,    !

*     ( 1882-1945 ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/dwarf-planet-pluto-1.jpg?w=584&h=584 )

     !

1930                    ! 2006         ,     “   ” ( Dwarf Planet )    !          ( Clyde Tombaugh )  90   ( 1997 ) .    “    ” ( New Horizon Space Probe )      . 2015       ,             93      ( Patricia ) ! “         ”         !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/09/fig-1b-new-definition-of-planets.jpg?w=584 )

     ?

2006      [ International Astronomical Union ( IAU ) ]  ( Prague ) ,               .       “   ” ( Dwarf Planet )     ! 1992     ( Kuiper Belt Object )   ,  ,   ( David Jewitt & Jame Luu )    ,         ( 70,000 Small Planet Bodies ) .    ,      2.8-4.5      !             .

       ? 2006           ( Definition of a Planet ) .

*! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/09/40809111aa.jpg ) *

   :

 :       .   .     .

 :           .

 :         .

    !

          .  “      ( New Horizon Space Probe Mission Leader )   ( Alan Stern ) IAU       .     .  ? , ,  ,       .                        .  IAU      .

*! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/09/40809111ae.jpg ) *

  :

1.     .

2.     .

3.    ( Brown Dwarf )    . 13-75        “   ( Failed Star )  .

        . 21         ,   ,     ( Small Bodies )   !

    !

            17   .             !         . ,                 .       ,     !             !

*! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/09/40809111b.jpg ) *

   [ Spectroscopic Analysis ]        .       . ,     [ -230  C ] ,       ;   [ Liquefied or Frozen ]  !     ,     !       ,    [ Runaway Satellite ]         !

    ?

 ,  ( Astronomers & Geologists )            .       “     ”  ( Radiometric Dating of Rocks )     4.6      .         3.9      !   ( Plate Tectonics )               !

*! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/09/40809111c.jpg ) *

     , ,               .        4.6      ,          .

     !

      [ Outer Planets ] , .      ,  ( Charon ) .        .     ,   ,   [ Clyde Tombaugh ] 1930    .  ‘   ’ [ God of the Underworld ]  ,    .

*! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/09/40809111d.jpg ) *

  ,          !    ,      !    [ 1905-1916 ]   ,   [ Percival Lowell ] ,   [ William Pickering ] ,        [ Straying from the Path ]  ,   !      [ Observatory Mandeville, Jamaica ] ,    ,      .   , ,   [ Observatory Flagstaff, Arizona ] .   ,      !

*! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/09/40809111e.jpg ) *

  , 1930           [ Clyde Tombaugh ] ,     ,        [ Feb 18, 1930 ]    .       , 1930  13       .

   

   [ Charon ] 1977    .  12,000     .      ! 1994          [ Hubble Space Telescope ]  [ 1410  ] ,  [ 790  ]        .    ,    3030 ,    2100 .

*! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/09/40809111f.jpg ) *

 3.7        ,   ,   248      .       6  .          [ Elongated Elliptical Orbital Plane ] ,        17  ,   !          ,    [ Transit ] ,   ,   ! 1989         ,    [ Perihelion ]  .  124  [ 248/2=124 ]  2113     , [   Aphelion ]   ,  124   . 2237     !

*! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/09/40809111g.jpg ) *

      !

         ?        ? ,           ?               ?              ?        ?        ?       “   ”   .

*! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/09/40809111h.jpg ) *

(  )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++
