052 -       

! [ Image result for Indian BrahMos Extended Range missiles ] ( https://i1.wp.com/topnews.in/law/files/brahmos-missile01.jpg )

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

    .
   
   
   
    
   
    ,
   
    ,
   
    ,
    
, , .

 ,  .

* [   ] [ John Lennon, Song India ( 1940-1980 ) ] *

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/05/40705031a.jpg )
  -1
BrahMos Missile -1

“       .       [ Sharp Manoeuvers ]      .          . ”

  ,   .

“  !    .     .       . ”

  ,  

! [ Image result for Indian BrahMos Extended Range missiles ] ( https://i0.wp.com/ssbcrack.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/BrahMos.jpg )

! [ Image result for india test fires brahmos extented range missile ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/c4cdf-india2bsuccessfully2btest2bfires2blong2brange2bsurface-to-air2bmissile.jpg )

“      .    ,     .  ,     ,     . ”

  .

“  ,  ,  ,      .     .     .          .      . ”

*   (   ) *

! [ Image result for india test fires brahmos extented range missile ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/29c36-screenshot-7bdomain7d2b7bdate7d2b7btime7d2b1.png?w=553&h=576 )

! [ Image result for balasore, odisha ] ( https://poojasphere.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/balasore-page-0011.jpg?w=908 )

*,  [ Balasore, Odisha ] *

“      ,    !    !    .  ,     .     . ”

  ,   

    .
   ,
,    
    !

  .

! [ Image result for Indian BrahMos Extended Range missiles ] ( https://i2.wp.com/image.slidesharecdn.com/brahmos-12797033661048-phpapp02/95/brahmos-4-728.jpg )

! [ Image result for india test fires brahmos extented range missile ] ( https://seeker401.files.wordpress.com/2013/04/agni_missiles1.jpg )

  

“ 3000       ,  ,      ?   , , , ,          .      .    .  , ,        . ”

  ,   

 !   !
 !   ! ……
 !   !
   !

*  (   ) *

! [ Image result for Indian BrahMos Extended Range missiles ] ( https://i1.wp.com/static.navaltoday.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/Russian-Indian-Joint-Venture-BrahMos-Develops-New-Cruise-Missile.jpg )

“              !        .  ,  ,             !          ,        !          ! ”

  ,     ( 1919-1971 ) .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/05/40705031ab.jpg )

  ,    

      , 248       ,      .           .

*   [ CEO, BrahMos Aerospace ] *

     

   , ,    ,       [ BrahMos Supersonic Cruise Missile ]   [  -2.8 ( Mach -2.8 ) ]    180  ,  248    .       :    &   [ Defense Research & Development Organization ( DRDO ) & Russia - Owned NPO ]     .            ,     2017  14  .    : *,  [ Balasore, Odisha ] *

! [ Image result for Indian BrahMos Extended Range missiles ] ( https://i2.wp.com/media2.intoday.in/indiatoday/images/stories/brahmos-647_061915020425.jpg )

    

2007  14   , -III      9  ,     [ The Defence Research & Development Organization ( DRDO ) ]    .         [ Long Range Missile Capability ]  . -III       .           . -III    3500 . [ 2100  ] .  -I  [ Single Stage Missile ]    : 700 . [ 420  ] ,  -II  [ Two Stage Missile ] : 2500 . [ 1500  ] .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/05/40705031b.jpg ) BrahMos Weapon Missiles

     -III     SLV-3       DRDO   .   ,     , ,        . 1980        SLV-3  [ Solid Propellant Four Stage Rocket ]    ,     ,    [ Ballistic Military Missiles ]  . 1994       [ Indian Space Research Organization ( ISRO ) ] ,         [ Polar Satellite Lauch Vehicle ( PSLV ) ]  .  SLV-3          .

! [ Image result for india test fires brahmos extented range missile ] ( https://i0.wp.com/lh3.ggpht.com/-0Ub0PUNgyQM/TwHouqjvFI/AAAAAAAADh4/ZDI-XRvjHlw/Akash-Missile-01thumb.jpg )

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/05/40705031ba.jpg ) BrahMos Truck Missiles

,        .  13000 . [ 7800  ]       DF-5   .                  .    [ Submarine-borne Missile ]  JL-2   .        .  M-11      [ Ghaznavi ]   .   -I, [ Shaheen-I ]  -II [ Shaheen-II ]     . 2004      -II 1100 . [ 660  ]   .

! [ Image result for india test fires brahmos extented range missile ] ( https://i0.wp.com/topyaps.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/unnamed3.png )

,    

2007  4      “     -  ”  [ A Supersonic Russian-Indian Built BrahMos Missile ]          .    [ 27  ]          290 . [ 180  ]  !    [ Ground-to-ground Missile ]    2.8    [ 2.8 Mac Speed ] << S >>      !      [ Head, BrahMos Air Space Ltd. ]  ,        . “       [ Sharp Manoeuvers ]      .           , ”  .

! [ Image result for Indian BrahMos Extended Range missiles ] ( https://i0.wp.com/i1094.photobucket.com/albums/i441/somnath30/DF21dvsBRA2GUIDANCESYSTEM.jpg )

-    ,   1998     .       -  [ Sea-Based Anti-Ship Missile ]   .  ,    [ Submarine, Air Launch Versions ]    .  - , -  [ Surface-Based & Air-Based ] 10  [ 30  ]  2.8     .    300 .    .    200 .    .   , , 360      .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/05/40705031d.jpg )

  

BrahMos Large Missiles

     ,           !      !        ,    !      [ Russia ’ s Moskit ]    [ Counter Missiles ]  .         ,       !        ,  ,      !

2001  2003   ,  ,   ,        . 2004     - , - , - [ Sea-to-Sea ]   ,    .   [ Su-30 ]   -    2007   .

! [ Image result for Indian BrahMos Extended Range missiles ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/b8307-brahmos.jpg )

   

1974                     .         .         .                   . 1994     1500 .. [ 900  ]            .  2007  12   5000 .. ( 3000  )      -3     .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/05/40705031e.jpg )

      

1982         [ Director of Defence Research & Development Organization ( DRDO ) ]      , 1993       [ Integrated Guided Missile Development Program ( IGMDP ) ]    .        .              .          .        .

! [ Image result for Indian BrahMos Extended Range missiles ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thehindubusinessline.com/multimedia/dynamic/01058/Agnigraph_1058415g.jpg )

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/05/40705241b.jpg )

1.   –        [ NAG – An Anti-Tank Guided Missile ( ATGM ) ]     : 4 . ( 2.5  ) .        .    .

2.   –       [ Prithvi -A Tactical Surface-to-Surface Battle Field Missile ( TSSM ) ,       .           : 250 .. [ 90  ] . 1983      .    : 150-300 .. ( 90-180  ) .       .

! [ Image result for india test fires brahmos extented range missile ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/81369-agniv0a.jpg )

! [ Image result for Indian BrahMos Extended Range missiles ] ( https://i1.wp.com/i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2012/04/18/article-2131628-12A74E83000005DC-716_634x787.jpg )

-1   150 .. : 1000 .. 1994     . -2   250 .. : 500 ..   1996  , 2004    . -3   350 .. : 1000 ..   500 .  600 ..   .  250 ..  750 ..   .

3.   –      ( Akash – A swift Medium Range Surface-to-Air-Missile ) .       .   ,  2.5    [ 2.5 Mach Number ]  .   25 .. [ 15  ]             .     1990  ,    1997  .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/05/40705241aa.jpg )

4.   –        [ Trishul ( Trident ) – A Quick Reaction Surface-to-Air Missile ( SAM ) with a Shorter Range ]  , ,       .      .     : 5-9 .. ( 3  5  )

5.   –       ( Agni – An Intermediate Range Ballistic Missile, The Mightiest ) ,      : 2500 .. [ 1500  ] .         ( , , ,  )  . 1989          . 2007  12   5000 .. ( 3000  )   -3     ,      ..

! [ Image result for india test fires brahmos extented range missile ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/5af09-submarine-launchedbrahmos-1.jpg )

     

  “      ”  [ Intercontinental Ballistic Missile, ( ICBM ) Surya ]      -1   2005  .       2008   . 2015         . -1    : 10,000 .. (  6000  ) , -2     20,000 .. (  12000  ) . -1   40   [ 130   ] , 80  , -      .     ,       .    -2,     [ Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle ( PSLV ) ]   .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/05/40705241c.jpg )

(  )

+++++++++++++++++++

  
   !
  

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://i1.wp.com/i67.servimg.com/u/f67/11/87/45/28/slide410.jpg )

“  , ,          .   .      .       -3   . ”

*  ,    ( International Conference on Aerospace Science & Technologies ) [  26, 2008 ] *

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/31ecf-chandrayaan-ii-krishna-matte-2012-580.jpg )

    -2     .    [ 2018   ] .     -2 , [ Mother Ship ]          .     [ Moon Craters ]       ,    ,   [ Lander Descent & Ascent ] .   [ Rover ]    .

*  [      ] *

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/560a9-chandryaan_ii.jpg )

      [ JSC Isotope Sources ]  -2   ,  * -244 [ Curium -244 ( Cm-244 ) ] *   .    ,        [ Alpha Proton X-Ray Spectrometer ] .

* [ Rosatom State Atomic Energy Corporation ] *

      .      .    [ Lunar Artificial Craters ]       .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.spaceflightinsider.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/Chandrayaan-2-Mission-Profile.jpg )

* [ Click to Enlarge ] *

        [ Lunar Terrain Test Facility for Lander Drop ]  .     [ Rover Mobility Tests ]  .

 ,    

 GSLV      50% .              .     .

*  ( Space Expert, Institute of Defense & Security Analysis, New Delhi ) *

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.chandrayaan-i.com/images/chandrayaan2-how.jpg )

* [ Click to Enlarge ] *

2018       -2 

2008    12   -1            .         -2  .  -2          [ Lunar Lander ] ,         [ Lunar Rover ]  .   -2   -1     ,    .              .   ,     .  ,        ,  -2  [ Return Trip ]   .        ,   . 2013      -2,    2018         .  -2         .          .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/cb436-ch-2rover.jpg?w=511&h=292 )

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/215e4-isroch2rover_update.jpg )

2017  15      104     .  -2       ,  ,   [ One Orbiter, One Lander, One Rover ]     .  -2   60  [ 100 . ]    .         [ Retro Rockets ]   [ Lunar Craters ]   .          .        ,  .      -2       :  91    [ 450   ] 2017  . 2018            ..

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-3-chandrayaan-2-mission.jpg?w=500&h=1007 )

“               !        .  ,  ,              !          ,         !           ! ”

  .     ( 1919-1971 ) .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-5-chandrayaan-2-mission.jpg?w=584 )

“      .       .    41%    . -1         . ”

*. . .  (       ) *

“  -1          .         . ”

* ,    ( Chandrayaan Project Director ) [  13, 2008 ] *

! [ Fig 1G Indian Rockets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/fig-1g-indian-rockets.jpg?w=500&h=1211&h=1211 )

“    ( Unique Bi-Static Experiment )     ( -1 &  LRO    )        .         .            .         .        . ”

    ,  D.C.

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-8-indian-cryogenic-engine1.jpg?w=584 )

“    ( Remote Sensing )    (   )  .            .    ( Bi-Static Experiment )   .          . ”

*  ( Srewart Nozette NASA Mini-RF Principal Investigator, LRO ) *

“  -1         .               . ”

*, ,      ,  [  9, 2008 ] *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/indian-space-program-2020.jpg?w=584 )

 -2     

  GSLV -III ( Geosynchronous Satellite Launching Vehicle III )           2014   -2   .      -2          .      .          .    2014        .              /     ! 2010         1.1   ( 58   ) .  GSLV -III     500     !     “     ” ( Russian Cryogenic Engine )  .             .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://c2.staticflickr.com/4/3821/11426587573d31c908130z.jpg )

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/d9764-chandrayaan_2.jpg )

 -1      ,         .  -1     PSLV ( Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle )   .  PSLV ( Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle )     .    -2  .    ,      .    ( Cryogenic Engine )         . ,              .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://i1.wp.com/image.slidesharecdn.com/goswamich-2-payloads-120105002826-phpapp02/95/chandrayaan-2-second-moon-mission-by-india-payloads-1-728.jpg )

     

GSLV -III   4      .     ( Geosynchronous Transfer Orbit ) 10    .   : 629 ,  : 51  ( 167  ) ,    : 10 ,     5 .       10       .      500       .        GSLV -III        . 2010  15            .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/f452a-ch2-lander252brover.png )

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.sciencecitychennai.in/photogallery/chandrayan2.jpg )

2010         GSLV -III    .   47 ,       .  16     ,    .       . ,      39   ( 1.75   )     .  10  ( 2010  ) GSLV -III    ( Boosters :  )     .    16   GSLV         .             .        .  2014   -2        . .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/rocket-performance.jpg?w=584 )

     !

2008  12    -1   100 . ( 60   )   ( Polar Orbit )   .       8  ,    440       ( 367 metre/Sec )        .                     .      ,           .          .     “    ” ( Geosynchronous Orbit )         !               .   , , ,    .         [ European Space Agency ( ESA ) ] )   .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-3-geosynchronous-satellites.jpg?w=584 )

   ,     

2009  20                  .       -1,    ( Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter -LRO )                  !            “  ”    ( Lunar Crater Erlanger in the Polar Region )  !       ,         .

! [ Image result for Chandrayaan 2 Rover ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/22115-15111125804813553632571224928042_n.jpg )

    ‘    ’ ( Bi-Static Experiment ) .       “     ” ( Miniature Radio Frequency Instrument: Mini-RF )        .                 !        ‘   ’   .              .            !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/chandrayaan-1-pathu-details.jpg?w=584 )
  -1  

 28 2008   2009  -1  3000    .     60  ( 100 .. )      70,000            .        .          .   19, 2009  -1   60  120    ( 100 . –> 200 . )  .     2009   18    .  26, 2009  -1      “   ” ( Star Sensor )    .        ( Sensors of Gyroscopes & Antenna )     .           .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/fig-1-indias-space-missions.jpg?w=584 )

    ( Bi-Static Experiment )     .          .  20, 2009        ( Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter -LRO ) 20   ( 12  )             .     ( Mini Radio Frequency Instrument -Mini-RF )      ( Synthetic Aperture Radars -SAR )      .           .             .

     .        .    -3   ( Helium-3 -An Isotope of Helium-4 Gas )  .     -3      .      78   ( 3800   ) ( 2008    )   !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2012/06/gslv-ready-to-be-launched.jpg?w=497&h=513 )

    

   ( ISRO )   ( Chandrayaan -2 )  2011-2012      .   -1    .    -2      .    ,  ( A Lander & Rover )      .            . ,  ( Lunar Lander & Rover )      .   4.25         . 16,000    ISRO  2008               !

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/09/fig-2-discovery-of-water.jpg?w=584 )

2015               .    242   ( 1240   ) .       250    7   .      95     .     1000        .

    ,         . “  , ,          .   .       .       -3   , ”       ,  26, 2008          ( International Conference on Aerospace Science & Technologies ) . “  50   ,  ,          -1    , ”         .

++++++++++++++++++++++

.  & . 

  ! **  ! **

    !

    !

    ! **

   

    !

    **

   

  ,   , **

  ,   ,

  ,  

  ,   ,

  ** ** !

    !

    !

   

  !  ** **

  !   ! **

    !

   
    ?
  
    ?
 
, , 
 
   ?
 ,
 
    ?
   
   ?
 
 
 

  ?
  
 

  ?

++++++++++++++

! [ planet-fornation-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/planet-fornation-1.jpg?w=584&h=584 )

         .        .       .     .  ,       ,        .

 ,    [ Dust Grains ]    ,    ,    [ Reverse Aggregation Process ] .      * "    " [ Dust Traps ] *   .     [ High-Pressure Regions ]  ,   [ Dust Grains ] .          .

*    [ Lead Author Center of Research Astrophysics Lyon, France ] *

! [ dust-traps-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/dust-traps-1.jpg?w=584&h=329 )

! [ Image result for dust traps in planet formation ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.nasa.gov/images/content/659392mainkeplerplanetformation466.jpg )

! [ Image result for dust traps in planet formation ] ( https://i1.wp.com/sciencenotes.ucsc.edu/0101/planetimages/coreaccretion.jpg )

   [ Dust Traps ]   [ Right Ingredients ]     .        .        ,        .

*    [ Lead Author Center of Research Astrophysics Lyon, France ] *

! [ dust-trap-3 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/dust-trap-3.jpg?w=584&h=341 )

     

      , ,          .   ,          . - -       ,     [ Computer Simulations ] * "    " [ Dust Traps ] *    .           .

! [ dust-trap-details ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/dust-trap-details.jpg?w=584&h=615 )

 3500       .       ? "       ,    [ Building Blocks ] .      . ,     [ Royal Astronomical Society ]  , 2017  27    .

! [ dust-trap-protoplanet ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/dust-trap-protoplanet.jpg?w=584&h=438 )

 [ Meteors ]        .         ,     [ Building Blocks ] .            .              .

*  [ Post doctorate, MIT Dept of Earth ] *

        ,  ,   ,        . . . .   (  1990 )     !

* ,       ( European Space Agency ) [  15, 2008 ] *

! [ planet-fornation ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/03/planet-fornation1.jpg?w=490&h=544 )

    

     

         [ Asteroids ]    [ 2015  15 ]       .         .        [ Building Blocks ]       ;   [ Purdue ]    ,   , ”          [ Planetary Embryos ]   , ” .

! [ Hypergiant Star with disks of dust. ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/01/hypergiant-star-with-disks-of-dust.jpg?w=584 )

      [ Meteorites ] .  100       [ Beads like Chondrules ]  .       .     [ Computer Impact Model ]    .

  :

1.   [ Asteroids ]      .       .

2.   [ chondrules ]   .     .       .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/solar-family.jpg?w=565&h=445 )

     ?

 ,  ( Astronomers & Geologists )            .       “     ”  ( Radiometric Dating of Rocks )     4.6      .         3.9      !    ( Plate Tectonics )               !

     , ,               .        4.6      ,          .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172c.jpg )

     ?

     ,        250   . 1755       ( Immanuel Kant ) ( 1724-1804 )     ( Nebular Hypothesis ) :       ,   ,       ! 1796        ( Pierre Simon Laplace ) ( 1749-1827 )     .           !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172d.jpg )

       :         ( Mass Gravity )    .            ( Gravitational Contraction )  ,  .

      .        ( Molecular Gas Cloud )     100 AU ( Astronomical Unit ) [ 1 AU = Average distance between Sun & Earth ( 93   /150  .. ) ] ,     2  3   .      ( Cloud ’ s Gravitational Collapse )      ( Supernova )         .         .       .        .     ( Gravitational Potential Energy )      ( Density ) .       .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172a.jpg )

     ?

    ( Conservation of Angular Momentum )        .    ,        ( Proto-Planetary Disk )      “  ”  ( Pancake ) .                  ?               !            .               ( Tropical Hurricanes )   !

       ( Infant Proto-Star )     .   50                 .                .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/04/ulysses-orbit.jpg?w=584 )

             .        .      ,       ,  ( Silicates & Metals ) . ,           .

       .          .       .      “   ”  ( Oort Cloud of Comets ) .       .      .     250       .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/04/40804172g.jpg )

      !

         ?        ? ,         ?               ?              ?        .         .       “   ”   .

[  ]

++++++++++++++++++++++

056           

! [ enceladua-water-springs ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/enceladua-water-springs.jpg?w=584&h=334 )

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

++++++++++++++

 
 
   !
 
  !
 

   !
    !
 
 
  !
 
   !
  ,  !
   !
 
  
  ?
  ,
   ?
   !
 
   !

++++++++++++++++++++

! [ enceladus-water-springs ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/enceladus-water-springs.jpg?w=431&h=613 )

   

    24      [ Gravity Swing Flyby Force ] ,      [ Water Geysers ]     .    ,     ,    .        [ Magnetometer Signal ]     .

*  [     ] *

  :         [ Habitable Environments ]   .      [ -180 C ] [ -292 F ] .       .

  [ Luciano Iess ]   .

            ,        . [ Gravity changes due to Liquid water presence near South pole ] .      [ Radio Frequency ]  .

*  [ Co-Author NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory,California ] *

! [ Image result for enceladus hidden ocean ] ( https://i2.wp.com/csglobe.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/saturn.jpg )

   101    ,             .    :  -180  [ -292  F ] .       .    6  , 20 -25        .     ,     ,     .

*  [ ,       ] *

    ,       .         .     ,        .   ,   [ Ice & Water Vapor ]    .

*  [ Co-Author, California Institute of Technology ] *

! [ Image result for enceladus hidden ocean ] ( https://planetpailly.files.wordpress.com/2016/04/ap04-enceladus-subsurface-lake.jpg?w=450&h=360 )

     .

2017  19    ,       [ Magnetometer ] ,        ,    [ Change in Radio Singnal ]  ,       .     ,     .    ,    ,    . ,   ,      ,       ,    .        ,        .       ,   ?       ?

! [ Image result for enceladus hidden ocean ] ( http://www.dailygalaxy.com/.a/6a00d8341bf7f753ef01b8d2621d58970c-800wi )

  ,  ,        .         .      15.8   [ gega watts ]   .       .

    6  [ 10 .. ]  ,   19 - 25  [ 30 -40 . ]    .     ,     .

++++++++++++++++++

! [ Encyladus geysers -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/encyladus-geysers-21.jpg?w=584 )

   101    ,             .    :  -180  [ -292  F ] .       .    6  , 20 -25        .     ,     ,     .

! [ Encyladus geysers -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/encyladus-geysers-1.jpg?w=584 )

        2010   ,    ,    [ 30-40  ]        .    .      [ Condensation of Vapour ]    [ Latent Heat ] .        :      ;      .        !     .

*  [      ] *

! [ fig-3-cassini-space-probe-orbiting-saturn ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-3-cassini-space-probe-orbiting-saturn.jpg?w=500&h=420 )

“ (   )                !   ,        !           .        , ,      .           . ”

* ,      [  5, 2008 ] *

! [ Enceladus Erupts ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/enceladus-erupts.jpg?w=463&h=764 )

“      ( Ions of the Particles )    [ 12.64 ./ ( 7.5 / ) ]    [ 9.54 ./ ( 6 / ) ]  .      ( Plume from the Jets )  ,    ,        . ”

 , ·  ,   

! [ Encyladus Icy Moon ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/encyladus-icy-moon2.jpg?w=584 )

  101    

2014  28 ,         101    [ 101 Geysers ]  .   .          .            .     ,      .        [ Four Tiger Stripes ]         [ Water Particles & Vapour ]    .    101   .        . 2005       .              .

! [ fig-1-saturns-moon-enceladus ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-1-saturns-moon-enceladus.jpg?w=524&h=876 )

        2010   ,    ,    [ 30-40  ]        .    .      [ Condensation of Vapour ]    [ Latent Heat ] .        :      ;      .        !           ,   .

“        ,        [ Yellowstone Park Geysers ]       .     .      ,        ! ”

*  [     (  9, 2006 ) ] *

“    ,             ,    ”

*  [ Wesley Huntress, NASA Scientist ] *

*! [ american-yellowstone-park-geysers ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/american-yellowstone-park-geysers.jpg?w=400&h=830 )
*

“             .      ,         ”

*   [ Dr. Andre Brahic, Professor at University of Paris ] *

“       ‘   ‘ [ Time Machine ] ,   !     ,           ! ”

*  ,     [ Jet Propulsion Laboratory, Pasadena, California ] *

! [ Fountains -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/fountains-12.jpg?w=584 )

*
*     

2008  5       -  ( Cassini-Huygens Spacecraft )   25 .. ( 15  )        300         .       ( Erupting Plumes )     “   ” ( Yellowstone Park Geysers )   .           .       “  ” ( Tiger Stripe Cracks )  ,     “    ” ( Plumes of Ionic Particles )  E     .    E        .

! [ fig-1a-geysers-in-saturns-moon-enceladus1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-1a-geysers-in-saturns-moon-enceladus1.jpg?w=502&h=836 )

 52  ( 2008  ) 300      1789       ( William Herschel ) .      E  ( Outermost E Ring )   1.37   .    1.37      .                 . E               .      ( Plate Tectonics )  ,         .           ( Geyser Like Volcanic Eruptions )   .   , ,    “  ”         ,      .   2005                !

! [ Encyladus geysers -4 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/encyladus-geysers-4.jpg?w=584 )

        ?

    ,   ( Icy Grains )  .            .        .        ( Plate Tectonics )  .         .    .      ,   .

     1.3  . ( 800   ) .             .            ?         ?          ?               ?

! [ fig-1c-how-the-geyser-does-function ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-1c-how-the-geyser-does-function.jpg?w=530&h=865 )

              .       ( Frictional Heat Generated by Tectonics Plates )     .         ( Radioactive Decay Heat )      .    ,         .     “    ” ( Infrared Radiation Monitor )         .        .        .             .

! [ encelaus-ocean-methane ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/encelaus-ocean-methane.jpg?w=584&h=463 )

     

   ,         .    “ - ”    .       .             .        : ,    “  ” [ LO ]      ( Triton ) . ,        ( Molten Materials ) ,   .

! [ Image result for enceladus hidden ocean ] ( https://i2.wp.com/images.usatoday.com/tech/_photos/2009/11/06/enceladus.JPG )

        .    : 145   ( -200  F )  ( -130  C )   40  ( 130   )      .   .          .        , ,    ,    . 2007        3  5      .        .

! [ fig-4-hot-geysers-jump-upon-friction ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-4-hot-geysers-jump-upon-friction.jpg?w=524&h=1074 )

   

2004          ,           !     , 1997  15       ,    2.2   ,   !    , 2004  25     ,     2005  15      . ,  ,   ,                 260    ! 3.4     -     .       -  40    ,      !

! [ fig-3-water-springs ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-3-water-springs.jpg?w=516&h=387 )

2006   9           [ Enceladus ]      [ Geysers ]     !     52 ( 2008  )   .                .      [ Europa ]        .      ,                   !

! [ Cassini Space Probe -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/cassini-space-probe-1.jpg?w=584 )

*-     ?
*
1970-1980      ,  [ Pioneer-11, Voyager-I & II ]       -    ,     .     :

1.      87%       ?

2.          ?

3.       ?

4.     ,     ? [    21 (  :52 )   . ]

! [ fig-5-saturns-moons ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-5-saturns-moons.jpg?w=530&h=693 )

5.    [ Enceladus Moon ]       ?      [ Craters ]     ?       ? 2005         ?

6.    [ Iapetus Moon ]        ?     ?

7.       ?

8.    [ Biological Activity ]    [ Methane Compound ]      ?

9.    [ ,  ]  ?

10      [ Complex Organic Compounds ] ,    [ Pre-Biotic Molecules ]   ?

(  )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++
:

S. Jayabarathan ( jayabarathans@gmail.com ) [ February 24, 2017 ]

057          104   .

! [ isro-achievement-2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/isro-achievement-2.jpg?w=521&h=399 )

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

++++++++++++++

 !   !
   ! ……
 !   !
 !   !

*  (   ) *

! [ Image result for Aryabhata Satellite ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.npointercos.jp/images/UksssYzdsa.jpg )

“              !        .  ,  ,             !          ,        !          ! ”

  ,     ( 1919-1971 ) .

! [ isro-achievement-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/isro-achievement-1.jpg?w=584&h=619 )

* [ Click to Enlarge ] *

      [ Geosynchronous Launch Vehicle , GSLV Mk III Rocket ] ,          [ Foreign Exchange ]   .    4      [ GSLV Mk III ] 2017    .

*. .   [ Indian Space Research Organization Chairman ] *

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/04/40704051aa.jpg )

    

2017  15         104   ,        .      ஶ் .          [ Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle ( PSLV ) ]   .   9:28     16,777  [ 27,000 .. ]  104   30      .

! [ Image result for India puts record 104 satellites into orbit ] ( https://i2.wp.com/tech.firstpost.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/payloadconfigurationpslvC34_ISRO.jpg )

    [ Payload ] : 714 kg    ,  664 kg  103  [ Nano ]  96  , , ,   .  90         [ Planet Inc ] .    .

2015  * "    " * [ India's Space Work Horse ]      [ PSLV ]  39     23    .  2017      , 2014      39     .

! [ isro-launch-site ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/isro-launch-site.jpg?w=584&h=435 )

        .  2013           73  .         [ NASA MAVEN Mars Mission ]    : 671   [  9   ] .           ,   [  ] [ Venus ]       .

! [ isro-achievement ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/isro-achievement.jpg?w=584&h=377 )

, ,            ,     .             .

    [ Scramjet Engine ]         .    .        .      .            .

*.  [ ,     ] *

! [ indian-rockets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/indian-rockets.jpg?w=584 )

     

2016      [ ISRO – Indian Space Research Organization ]       .      20      !   “    ” [ Reusable Launch Vehicle ( RLV ) ] & “     ” [ Scramjet Engine ]  .   33    .  22    . 11   .    : 500   [ 73   ] .      [ Order ]  500    .         5   !     [ Multi-burn Technology ]       .

! [ Image result for Astrosat ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/29278-pslvc30.jpg?w=584 )

2017      ,     104            !       .            .          . 2017        [ Geosynchronous Satellite ]    [ Geosatellite Launch Vehicle ( GSLV Mk III ) ]  .  4     .   2017   83       .

! [ Image result for ISRO Orbital Vehicle ] ( https://images-blogger-opensocial.googleusercontent.com/gadgets/proxy?url=http%3A%2F%2F2.bp.blogspot.com%2F-bLrDoFq462E%2FVPcOPfogT2I%2FAAAAAAAAGj0%2Fn5RumMdxsDc%2Fs1600%2FRLVTDIDN_New.jpg&container=blogger&gadget=a&rewriteMime=image%2F* )

    

        ,  ,   [ NASA, ESA, JAXA ( Japan Aerospace Expolation Agency ) ]  , , ,          . 2006   : 16  , : 3.5  , : 1.8  , : 1.2  , : 900  , : 700  , : 300  , : 35        .                       .

! [ Image result for ISRO Orbital Vehicle ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/79526-img2010-07-08alas18-02-51.png?w=584 )

     ,    ,       GSLV-III [ Geostatioanry Satellite Launching Vehicle-III ]       .           . , ,                      .

! [ Image result for ISRO Orbital Vehicle ] ( https://i0.wp.com/iasmania.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/PSLV-and-GSLV.jpg )

     

             .             [ Silkroute ]  . 1804             .    [ William Congreve ] ,       .    ,  ,                    .         ,   ,      .

! [ Image result for India puts record 104 satellites into orbit ] ( https://i2.wp.com/media.indiatimes.in/media/content/2017/Feb/in314871213861487161160.jpg )

    1962      [ Indian National Committee for Space Research ( INCOSPAR ) ]  ,      .         [ Thumba Equatorial Rocket Launching Station ( TELRS ) ] ,       .    ,        [ Earth ’ s Magnetic Equator ] !      ,   ,     .    [ Artificial Satellite ]   .          .       [ Satellite Instructional Television Experiment ( SITE ) ]       ,  . 1963  21          [ Sodium Vapour Payload ]      .

! [ Image result for Astrosat Satellite ] ( https://i1.wp.com/static.dnaindia.com/sites/default/files/2015/09/28/380150-astrosat-components.jpg )

! [ Image result for Astrosat Satellite ] ( https://i0.wp.com/images.indianexpress.com/2015/10/sts.jpg )

    , 

    ,    [ Physical Reseach Laboratory & Space Application Centre ] ,     [ Space Physics Laboratory ] ,      [ Indian Space Research Organization ]      [ Satellites ] ,   [ Launch Vehicles ] ,   [ Sounding Rockets ]    ,    .    1975              .     [ -I, -II,  ]    [ 1979-1981 ]    .         SLV-3    .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/04/40704051b.jpg )

 40 ( ? )      .  23        SLV-3 [ Satellite Launch Vehicle-3 ] , ASLV [ Augmented Satellite Launch Vehicle ] , PSLV [ Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle ] , GSLV [ Geo-Synchronous Satellite Launch Vehicle ]    .  17 ( ? )  , , , ,     . 1993      [ Indian Remote Sensing Satellite ( IRS-1E ) ]       !

    

1983  30      [ Space Shuttle ]  [ INSAT-1B ]      .      [ INSAT Network Satellites ]  .      [ Indian National Satellite System ]  ,    [ Meteorology ] ,     [ Direct Satellite Television Broadcasting ]  .   [ INSAT Network ] 167    [ Telecommunication Terminals ] ,  4172    [ Two-Way Speech Circuits ]  .         [ Rural Telegraphy ]   .   ,  650    [ TV Transmitters ] , 80     ,    .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/04/40704051e.jpg )

     [ Communication through Satellite ] ,       [ Meteorology ]     . ,   [ Cyclone ]     ,       ,        .     ,  ,      .

! [ Image result for India puts record 104 satellites into orbit ] ( https://pbs.twimg.com/media/C4rkAcjW8AASliq.jpg:large )

    [ Remote Space Sensing ] , , ,  [ Minerals ] ,  [ Forestry ] ,  , [ Environment ] ,   [ Ocean Development ] ,  ,        . 2002  12    [ METSAT ]        [ Geo-synchronous Transfer Orbit ]  .  22,000              !      ,     !

! [ Image result for Aryabhata Satellite ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/a857b-aryabhatta.jpg?w=661&h=521 )

+++++++++++++++++++

(  )

058          

! [ olympus-mons-volcano-5 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-5.jpg?w=584&h=385 )

     

! [ mars-volcano-olympus-mons ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/mars-volcano-olympus-mons.jpg?w=503&h=787 )

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

++++++++++++++

      .    100  [ Meteorites ]    .        ,  100     .    [ Meteorites ]   [ North West Africa ( NWA ) 7635 ]  ,     . NWA 7635  1.1     [ Cosmic Rays ]      .  500      .    2       [ Magma ]    .     .

*  [ Marc Caffee, Professor of Astronomy, Purdue University, USA ] *

! [ olympus-mons-volcano-8 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-8.jpg?w=547&h=547 )

! [ olympus-mons-volcano-10 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-10.jpg?w=550&h=450 )

      

2012       [ Meteorite ]  .          .       . 6.9         ,      2         .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.space.com/images/i/000/026/895/original/OlyMons.jpg )

  1000   ,     ,  .        ,      .  100      .    [ North West Africa NWA 7635 ]    . 2012    11       * [ Shergottite ] *      .

! [ olympus-mons-volcano-4 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-4.jpg?w=537&h=625 )

   

     .      ,    ,      .       .          ,        .

! [ olympus-mons-meteorite ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-meteorite.jpg?w=503&h=780 )

    100  30       [ Purdue Rare Isotope Measurement Laboratory ] [ PRIME LAB ]  .           .  11         .  10   500  , *  [ Magma ] *      .      [ NWA 7635 ]  ,  2.4       .

        [ Tom Lapen ] 2017       [ Journal Science Advances ]       ,       .

! [ olympus-mons-volcano ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano.jpg?w=500&h=440 )

          .       [ Tectonic Activities ] .   ,       .    * "   " [ Olympus Mons ] *   .   * "   " [ Shield Volcano ] *  .    16  [ 25 .. ]  .   374  [ 624 .. ] .     .    .  4  [ 6 .. ]   [ Rim ] .    [ Caldera ] 50  [ 80 .. ] .     * "   " [ Mauna Loa ] *   100  .

! [ olympus-mons-volcano-9 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/olympus-mons-volcano-9.jpg?w=584&h=410 )

! [ Ocean of Mars ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/ocean-of-mars.jpg?w=584 )

                 .            ..

          . ,      .

    ,           ,       ?    [ Craters ]    .

*  [  , ,    ] *

! [ Mars Ocean ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/mars-ocean1.jpg?w=584 )

      [ Mars Science Laboratory Rover ]              .     [ Sedimentary Conglomerates ]          .

*   [     ] *

     ,     ,         .      ,        ,         .

*  [ Linda Kah, Associate Professor of Earth & Planetary Science, University of Tennessee, Knoxville ] *

! [ Clues for water in Mars ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/clues-for-water-in-mars.jpg?w=584 )

1980     [ NASA ’ S Viking Orbiter ]       20          :         !     ,      [   — Oceanus Borealis ]         !

   ,              .      :     [ Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter ] .     .            .

*! [ Water flow in Mars -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/water-flow-in-mars-1.jpg?w=395&h=507 ) *

         .      .        .

*   [   ,  ] *

,         .            .       .      .   ,    ,  ,     .          : [    ] [  3   ] , [      . ]

  .

*! [ Pebbles in Mars ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/pebbles-in-mars.jpg?w=450&h=532 ) *

         

  4        [ MSL Curiosity Rover ] [ MSL : Mars Science Laboratory ] 150 ..  ( 90  )   [ Gale Crater ]   ,      [ Rounded Pebbles within Sedimentary Conglomerate ]            .    2012   .       , ,     [ Golf ]   ,     .  ,          .        [ Aileen Yingst ]         .      275  [ 900   ]  ,     .

! [ Martian water ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/martian-water.jpg?w=451&h=532 )

         [ Electrical Discharges over Mars Iced Surfaces ]   .        [ Discharges ]   [ CO2 ]         .

*   [ Arturo Robledo-Martinez, Mexican Geo-physical Team ] *

“            .      .                . ”

*  ( Douglas McCuistion, Director of Mars Exploration Program NASA Headquarters ) *

“               ” .

*  ( German Astronomer Johannes Kepler ) ( 1571-1630 ) *

*! [ Water flow in Mars -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/water-flow-in-mars-2.jpg?w=448&h=918 ) *

       ( Gale Crater )        ( Sediment Rocks ) .    4          . ,  ,        .

*  ( Mars Science Lab Dy Project Scientist NASA ) *

( 2012    )         ( Mound at the center of Gale Crater ) MFF   ( Medusae Fossae Formation Exposure ) . ( MFF on Mars is an intensely eroded deposit .. )    ( Grand Canyon )  .          .    MFF    .          .

*  (   National Air & Space Museum ) *
