! [ fig-1b-the-galaxy-spirals-glow ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/01/fig-1b-the-galaxy-spirals-glow.jpg?w=530&h=893 )

‘         ,         ‘

*  ( John F. Herschel ) ( 1792-1871 ) *

 ,          .      [ Hoag Object ]  .     [ Galaxy: PGC 1000714 ]         .

*  [ Patrick Treuthart, Co-author, Astrophysicist, North Carolina Museum of Natural Sciences ] *

! [ W Herschel -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/w-herschel-2.jpg?w=584 )

 

    

2017  4            [ Galaxy ]      .    [ PGC 1000714 ] .    359   [ Light- years ]  .     .      .      .      [ Hoag's-type Galaxy ]  .    ?               [ Milky Way Galaxy ]  .            .

! [ double-ring-galaxy-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/01/double-ring-galaxy-1.jpg?w=584&h=442 )

* [ HOAG 's Bull's Eye Galaxy ] *

"      0.1%     , "   ,    [ Burcin Mutlu-Pakdil ] .                .          .    .             [ Multi-waveband Images ]   .

! [ fig-1c-how-galaxy-works ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2017/01/fig-1c-how-galaxy-works.jpg?w=500&h=590 )

        [ Disc-shaped ] .        . ,    ,      .    /     [ Environmental Interactions ] .   ,       [ Dwarf ]      .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201a.jpg )

Our Milky Way Galaxy

     

1600             ( Milky Way Galaxy )      .        .   1755      ( Immanuel Kant )       ( Lens-shaped Group of Stars ) ,        .         ( 1738-1822 )        .                  .

! [ Carina Nebula ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/carina-nebula.jpg?w=584 )

     

   ?              .   ,   ,  , ,    !    ,      ( Black Hole: A Single Point of Infinite Mass & Gravity )  .    ( Mass )  50       !     ,   90%   .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201aa.jpg )

   .    .   .        .           .           ,  .

               !       ,       .       ( Star Clusters )  ,  ,  , ,   .  ,    ( Denser Clusters ) ,   ,  ,   ( Open Clusters )    !

    

          ( Spiral Galaxy ) .     .     100    ( One Light Year :      :   186,000        ) .      .         .     “  ” ( Halo )   ( Band of Star Clusters ) ,      ( Cloud of Dark Matter )   !       .                !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201ab.jpg )

       ( Orion Arm )  30      !     ,      137   ( 220 ../ )  .       200       !

   ( Nebulae )   ?

1924            ·   .     .  ,     ,       !      !    , ,  ,   ( Spiral, Planetary, Emission & Reflection Nebulae ) .     .    ( Planetary Nebula )   !           .   ( Emission Nebula )     .        .       ( High Energy Ultra-Violet Radiation )   !    ( Orion Nebula )       .

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201ac.jpg )

     

    ,    ,             ,    .    ,   .          ,    .     , ,  [ Physics ] ,   [ Photochemistry ] ,   [ Philosophy of Science ]        .  ,  ·,         7500  ,    [ Archives ]    .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201ad.jpg )

   

  20 , 40            .       [ Cape of Good Hope ]      [ Southern Celestical Hemisphere ]    3347   [ Double Stars ] , 2602  [ Nebulae ]  .      [ First Catalogue of Nebulae ]  5079    ,    2477.  : 2602.

      [ Photographic Works ]      ,  . ‘ ·· ‘ [ Photography ]   § .   ‘  ‘ , ‘  ‘ [ Negative, Positive Films ]     !

     

  1792    [ Slough ]          .         1816   .     ,      .         ,      .             [ Double Stars ] ,   [ Star Clusters ] ,  [ Nebulae ]  .  ( 1864 )  ,     [ General Catalogue of Nebulae & Clusters ]         3347  ; 2400 .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201b.jpg )

 -1

      ¦          .    ,  [ Woodhouse ] .    [ Calculus ]     [ Leibnitz ] ,      !          .           . 1813       .

‘     ‘ [ On a Remarkable Application of Cotes ’ s Theorem ]    ,   · [ Fellow of Royal Society ] . 1820   ‘    ‘ [ Applications of Finite Differences ]     . 1820     ,        [ Astronomy ] .

     

78   [ 1816 ]       ,     . 1822   ,   ,  .          [ Eclipses of the Moon ]      .       :     ‘    ’ [ Catalogue of Double Stars ( 1824 ) ] .   ,      [ Deep Space Distant Stars ]   .    ‘   ‘ [ Parallax of a Star ]  .          ,   [ Orbits ] ,    . 1833           .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201c.jpg )

 

1834-1838       [ Cape of Good Hope ]    [ Southern Hemisphere ]   ,  ,    .    20       .     : 1835        [ Halley ‘ s Comet, Edmund Halley ( 1656-1742 ) ]    .                 .          .        [ Solar Wind ]   !     [ Repulsive Force ] ,      .            ! 1847       ,        [ Copley Medal ] .

   , 

      [ Big Bang ]  10       !           !     [ Gravitation ]        !         [ Giant Clusters of Stars ]    .     [ Galaxies ]   .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201d.jpg )

 

  100       !       !         [ Milky Way ]    !       !      1.9    ! [ Light Years -Distance light covers in a year at the rate of 186000 miles/sec ] .        [ Elliptical or Spiral Shape ] !     ,    .

   ?       [ Materials that form Galaxies ] ,       !     [ Edwin Hubble ( 1889-1953 ) ]  ‘   ‘ [ The Realm of the Nebulae ]          ,       .       !      ? ’  ‘ :  [ Nebula ]   ‘  ‘ [ Cloud ]  .  , ,  [ Planets, Comets, Astroids ]    ,          .             !

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201e.jpg )

   [ Galaxies ( M51 ) ] ,   [ Star Clusters ] ,   /  [ Intersteller Gas/Dust Clouds ]    .      ‘  ‘       ‘  ’   .       !        .    !         ,     .         !       [ A few light-years ]  ! ‘    ‘ [ Open Clusters ( M44 ) ] :     .     .      ,     .   Globular Clusters  [ Galactic Clusters ]  . 50     .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201f.jpg )

        .    [ Ultra-violet Light ]   ,           ,   [ Neon Light ]   !      !  ,   ‘   ‘ [ Emission Line ]  !    ,        !         ,     .

* ‘   ‘ [ Reflection Nebulae ( NGC 7023 ) ] :*

      !          [ Clouds of Dust ] !        !    ,         !     ‘   ‘ [ Diffuse Nebulae ]  .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201g.jpg )

* ‘   ‘ [ Dark Nebulae ( NGC 2264 ) ] :*

    ,       !   [ Silhouette Photography ]        ,    !    .   :    ,   !       !

* ‘   ‘ [ Planetary Nebulae ( M57 ) ] :*

       ,     !   5   ,      !     .   [ Planets ]    ,  !      . .          !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201h.jpg )

* ‘   ‘ [ Supernova Remnants ( M1 ) ] :*

      ,     ! ,  ‘  ‘   !     ,      !    ,  ,    !      !

    

   ‘    ‘ [ Discourse on Natural Philosophy ]   ,  · [ Michael Faraday ( 1791-1867 ) ]     : ‘        .         .      .    .        ‘ .

         . 1871         .        [ Jean Biot ( 1774-1862 ) ] : ‘    [ Laplace ] 1827    ,     ,  .      ,          ! ’

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712201i.jpg )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

:

1. Results of Astronomical Observations of John Herschel By: London, Smith, Elder Co.

2. Letters & Papers of Sir John Herschel from the Archives of the Royal Society [ 1990 ]

3. Types of Nebulae http://seds.lpl.arizona.edu/billa/twn/types.html

4. William Herschel ‘ s Catalogue of Deep Sky Objects

5. Nebulae http://www.seds.org/messier/nebula.html

6. Nebulae http://www.enchantedlearning/subjects/astronomy/stars/nebulae.html

7. John Herschel By: J.J. O ‘ Connor & E.F. Robertson

8. http://www.thinnai.com/?module=displaystory&story_id=40310231&format=html (     , , .

9. The Handy Space Answer Book ( 1998 )

10. https://www.astroleague.org/content/bright-nebula-observing-program

11. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orion_Nebula [ June 6, 2016 ]

12. http://www.dailygalaxy.com/my_weblog/2017/01/exotic-double-ring-galaxy-unlike-any-observed-before-blue-ring-around-an-ancient-red-core [ January 4, 2017 ]

13. http://www.space.com/35219-rare-ringed-galaxy-discovery-image.html [ January 4, 2017 ]

14. http://teknoatu.com/2017/01/05/astronomers-image-infrequent-double-ring-gal/axy [ January 5, 2017 ]

15. http://en.francais-express.com/news/tech-science/-101513-astronomers-photograph-rare-double-ring-galaxy/ [ January 5, 2017 ]

S. Jayabarathan ( jayabarathans@gmail.com ) January 6, 2017 [ R-2 ]

065         83    

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

++++++++++++++

 !   !
   ! ……
 !   !
 !   !

*  (   ) *

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/04/40704051aa.jpg )

      [ Geosynchronous Launch Vehicle , GSLV Mk III Rocket ] ,          [ Foreign Exchange ]   .    4      [ GSLV Mk III ] 2017    .

*. .   [ Indian Space Research Organization Chairman ] *

    [ Scramjet Engine ]         .    .        .      .            .

*.  [ ,     ] *

! [ Image result for Aryabhata Satellite ] ( https://i1.wp.com/image.slidesharecdn.com/improvedsmallsatellitepptbyashish-140210120342-phpapp02/95/small-satellite-ppt-by-ashish-kr-singh-3-638.jpg )

“              !        .  ,  ,             !          ,        !          ! ”

  ,     ( 1919-1971 ) .

! [ indian-rockets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/indian-rockets.jpg?w=500&h=693 )

     

2016      [ ISRO - Indian Space Research Organization ]       .      20      !   "    " [ Reusable Launch Vehicle ( RLV ) ] & "     " [ Scramjet Engine ]  .   33    .  22    . 11   .    : 500   [ 73   ] .      [ Order ]  500    .         5   !     [ Multi-burn Technology ]       .

! [ Image result for Astrosat ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/29278-pslvc30.jpg )

2017      ,     83            !       .            .          . 2017        [ Geosynchronous Satellite ]    [ Geosatellite Launch Vehicle ( GSLV Mk III ) ]  .  4     .   2017   83       .

! [ Image result for ISRO Orbital Vehicle ] ( https://images-blogger-opensocial.googleusercontent.com/gadgets/proxy?url=http%3A%2F%2F2.bp.blogspot.com%2F-bLrDoFq462E%2FVPcOPfogT2I%2FAAAAAAAAGj0%2Fn5RumMdxsDc%2Fs1600%2FRLVTDIDN_New.jpg&container=blogger&gadget=a&rewriteMime=image%2F* )

    

        ,  ,   [ NASA, ESA, JAXA ( Japan Aerospace Expolation Agency ) ]  , , ,          . 2006   : 16  , : 3.5  , : 1.8  , : 1.2  , : 900  , : 700  , : 300  , : 35        .                       .

! [ Image result for ISRO Orbital Vehicle ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/79526-img2010-07-08alas18-02-51.png )

     ,    ,       GSLV-III [ Geostatioanry Satellite Launching Vehicle-III ]       .           . , ,                      .

! [ Image result for ISRO Orbital Vehicle ] ( https://i0.wp.com/iasmania.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/PSLV-and-GSLV.jpg )

     

             .             [ Silkroute ]  . 1804             .    [ William Congreve ] ,       .    ,  ,                    .         ,   ,      .

! [ Image result for ISRO Orbital Vehicle ] ( https://i0.wp.com/drop.ndtv.com/albums/NEWS/isro-20-satellite-launch/20166$img21jun2016pti6212016_000341b.jpg )

    1962      [ Indian National Committee for Space Research ( INCOSPAR ) ]  ,      .         [ Thumba Equatorial Rocket Launching Station ( TELRS ) ] ,       .    ,        [ Earth ’ s Magnetic Equator ] !      ,   ,     .    [ Artificial Satellite ]   .          .       [ Satellite Instructional Television Experiment ( SITE ) ]       ,  . 1963  21          [ Sodium Vapour Payload ]     .

! [ Image result for Astrosat Satellite ] ( https://i0.wp.com/static.dnaindia.com/sites/default/files/2015/09/28/380150-astrosat-components.jpg )

! [ Image result for Astrosat Satellite ] ( https://i1.wp.com/images.indianexpress.com/2015/10/sts.jpg )

    , 

    ,    [ Physical Reseach Laboratory & Space Application Centre ] ,     [ Space Physics Laboratory ] ,      [ Indian Space Research Organization ]      [ Satellites ] ,   [ Launch Vehicles ] ,   [ Sounding Rockets ]    ,    .    1975              .     [ -I, -II,  ]    [ 1979-1981 ]    .         SLV-3    .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/04/40704051b.jpg )

 40 ( ? )      .  23        SLV-3 [ Satellite Launch Vehicle-3 ] , ASLV [ Augmented Satellite Launch Vehicle ] , PSLV [ Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle ] , GSLV [ Geo-Synchronous Satellite Launch Vehicle ]    .  17 ( ? )  , , , ,     . 1993      [ Indian Remote Sensing Satellite ( IRS-1E ) ]       !

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/04/40704051d.jpg )

    

1983  30      [ Space Shuttle ]  [ INSAT-1B ]      .      [ INSAT Network Satellites ]  .      [ Indian National Satellite System ]  ,    [ Meteorology ] ,     [ Direct Satellite Television Broadcasting ]  .   [ INSAT Network ] 167    [ Telecommunication Terminals ] ,  4172    [ Two-Way Speech Circuits ]  .         [ Rural Telegraphy ]   .   ,  650    [ TV Transmitters ] , 80     ,    .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/04/40704051e.jpg )

     [ Communication through Satellite ] ,       [ Meteorology ]     . ,   [ Cyclone ]     ,       ,        .     ,  ,      .

! [ Image result for Astrosat Satellite ] ( https://i1.wp.com/economictimes.indiatimes.com/photo/48700133.cms )

    [ Remote Space Sensing ] , , ,  [ Minerals ] ,  [ Forestry ] ,  , [ Environment ] ,   [ Ocean Development ] ,  ,        . 2002  12    [ METSAT ]        [ Geo-synchronous Transfer Orbit ]  .  22,000              !      ,     !

! [ Image result for Aryabhata Satellite ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/a857b-aryabhatta.jpg?w=661&h=521 )

+++++++++++++++++++

(  )

   ,
  
 
  !
  
 
   
 
  !
  ,
 
 
  !
 
  ,
   
  .
  
 
  !
 
  

  !

! [ rosetta-mission ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/rosetta-mission.jpg?w=584&h=563 )

       .         .       .

*   [ European Space Agency Director General ] *

         [ Rosetta Space Probe & Philae Lander ]  ,    ,     .        .

*  [ European Space Agency Director of Science ] *

! [ Comet Outbursts -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comet-outbursts-2.jpg?w=584&h=646 )

   ,    786    ,     [ Flyby Swing ] ,    ,  ,   .         .    ,       .

*  [ Rosetta Operation Manager ] *

         .        !        !    .

*  [    ] *

! [ philae-lander ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/philae-lander.jpg?w=584&h=435 )

  [ 2015 ]       ,            .         .

         .          .

  * [ ESA Rosetta Project Scientist ] *

! [ Halley's comet -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/halleys-comet-2.jpg?w=584 )

    

    2004      12      ,  [ Philae ]        .

     ,       *  [ Time Capsules ] *  .   ,   [ Nucleus ] ,     [ Organic Materials ]    ,      ,     .

 ,     .  ,          [ Two Lobes ]     .

! [ Comet Outbursts -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/08/comet-outbursts-1.jpg?w=584&h=621 )

      ,   ,   [ Density & Composition of Coma ] ,    .  ,  &   ,   , ,     [ Different Flavours ]  !    ,      !      .      :   4.5       ,    [ Protoplanetary Nebula ]    .

,   [ DNA & Cell Membranes ]  ,      [ Amino Acid Glycine ] ,         .

! [ difficult-landing-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/difficult-landing-1.jpg?w=584&h=681 )

     ,      [ Atum Region ]  [ Large Lobe ]     .         ,   [ Dust Cone ]      .        ,        .

*  [ Eberhard Grun, Nuclear Physics, Max-Plank Institute, Heidelberg, Germany ] *

! [ Which Instruments saw outbursts ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/which-instruments-saw-outbursts.jpg?w=584&h=646 )

2015       

   2015  19   -  [ Comet Name : 67P/Churyumov-Gerasimenko ]      [ Comet Outburst ]   . 20           [ ,  , ,     ] [ Cameras, Dust Collectors, Gas & Plasma Analysers ]    .         .         [ Royal Astronomical Society ]  ,      .              [ Eberhard Grun, Max-Plank Institute, Heidelberg, Germany ] .

! [ Comet Halley ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/09/comet-halley.jpg?w=584 )

   2016   9:40  [ GMT ]      [ Comet Dusty Coma ]         .      100      [ ALICE ]   .        [ Ultraviolet Brightness of the Sunlight Reflected by the Comet Nucleus ] .     6   . ,   [ ROSINA & RPC ]   [ 1.5 TO 2.5  ]  ,   .   [ MIRO ]     30.C  .  3  10     [ GIADA ] 200  .        [ Dust Grains ]  .        [ Comet Coma Density ]  .

! [ Image result for comet's structure ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.newscientist.com/data/images/ns/cms/dn25995/dn25995-2_850.jpg )

     ,      [ Atum Region ]  [ Large Lobe ]     .        ,   [ Dust Cone ]      .        ,        .        [ Thermal Stress ]          .               .

++++++++++++++++

! [ Image result for comet's structure ] ( https://www.sciencenews.org/sites/default/files/images/rosetta_vendiagram.png )

    [ Philae Lander ]      .          .     ,     .     .           .

*  [     ] *

240 .. [ 150  ]        ,    180 .. [ 110  ]  .

*  [      ] *

! [ Rosetta probe landing ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/rosetta-probe-landing.jpg?w=584 )

“             .      ,       .          . ”

*   [ ESA Director General ] [ November 12, 2014 ] *

“   [ 2004 – 2014 ]   ,                 . ”

*  [ ESA Director of Scince & Robotic Exploration ] [ November 12, 2014 ] *

! [ comet-chemicals ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/comet-chemicals.jpg?w=584&h=399 )

“      ?       ?  ,        !       ,      !    [ Deep Impact ]      .  , ,  ,      ! ”

*  [ Acting Diretor, Solar System Division, NASA ] *

! [ Roetta Probe on comet -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/roetta-probe-on-comet-1.jpg?w=584 )

Mothership Rosetta Drops Lander on the Comet

     

2014  12          !     * [ ESA -European Space Agency Spaceship Rosetta ] *         * [ Philae Lander ] *     . 1969              . 2004   2       10   , 6.4  ..  [ 3.8   ]     * [ Comet : 67P /Churyumov-Gerasimenko ] * 2014  6    ,    ,    .    30 ..  , 34,000 mph [ 55,000 kmh ]    .      ,  ,     .

! [ First comet image from Philae ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/first-comet-image-from-philae.jpg?w=584 )

      510  .. [ 300   ]     .      ,         .        :   1 . “ ,          .      ,     , ”    [ ESA Director of Human Spaceflight Operations ] .    : 18 kms [ 3600 mph ] .        .       : 1.6   [ 1.3   ]

! [ comet-structure-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/comet-structure-1.jpg?w=500&h=410 )

   

    ,       .   60   .    12   !         ,       .        .         ,      .   2015       .            .    13          ,      .

! [ comet-structure-2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/comet-structure-2.jpg?w=584&h=502 )

 [  6, 2014 ]    20 .. [ 12  ]      .     8 .. [ 5  ]      .  [ 2015  13 ]       185  .. [  110   ]   .

   ,          . 4.5           ,      ,           .

! [ comet-structure-3 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/comet-structure-3.jpg?w=584&h=566 )

2014                “  ” [ Orion Spacecraft ]   7  14     [ Asteroid ]      .                .              . ”

*  ,   [ Dr. Paul Abell, NASA Jonson Space Center, Houston ]
*

“       !         !      !       !         ( Porous Organic Mass ) ,        . ”

  ,  ·  , 

! [ Rosetta Mission ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-mission1.jpg?w=584 )

     ?

                    ,     !     [ 1000  . ]    ,   ,        [ Gravity Assist Swing ]      [ Elliptical Path & Velocity ] .               !            .               !

! [ rosetta-journey ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/rosetta-journey.jpg?w=584&h=412 )

* [ Click to Enlarge ] *

           .                 !            .  [ Asteroids ]       .      ?            .

! [ philae-lander-instruments ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/philae-lander-instruments.jpg?w=584&h=350 )

   

    : 1000   [   : 1.325   ]           [ European Space Agency ( ESA ) ]  : , , , , , , ,  .         [ German Aerospace Research Institute ( DLR ) ]     .

    [ 3  x 2  x 2  ] , ,  .  : 100  .    14    [ Solar Panels ]     .     64  .    2.2         .      .

! [ ESA Control Room -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/esa-control-room-2.jpg?w=584 )

* 11   :*

1. “  ”     [ ALlCE: Ultraviolet Imaging Spectrameter ]

2. “  ”    [ CONSERT: Comet Nucleus Sounding ]

3. “  ”       [ COSIMA: Cometary Secondary Ion Mass Analyser ]

4. “  ”   ,   [ GIADIA: Grain Impact Analyser & Dust Accumulator ]

5. “  ”     [ MIDAS: Micro-Imaging Analysing System ]

6. “  ”     [ MICRO: Microwave Instrument for Rosetta Orbiter ]

7. “  ”     [ OSIRIS: Rosetta Orbiter Imaging System ]

! [ orbit-of-a-comet ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/orbit-of-a-comet.jpg?w=584&h=382 )

8. “  ” ,        [ ROSINA: Rosetta Orbiter Spectrometer for Ion & Neutral Analysis ]

9. “  ”     [ RPC: Rosetta Plasma Consortium ]

10 “  ”     [ RSI: Radio Science Investigation ]

11 “  ” ,      [ VIRTIS: Visible & Infrared Mapping Spectrometer ]

    :

   9  :

1. “  ”   -   [ APXS: Alpha Proton X-Ray Spectrometer ]

2. “ / ”      [ CIVA/ROLIS: Rosetta Lander Imaging System ]

3. “  ”    [ CONSERT: Comet Nucleus Sounding ]

Philae Lander

! [ Philae Lander ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/philae-lander.jpg?w=540 )

4. “  ”      [ COSAC: Cometary Sampling & Composition Experiment ]

5. “   ”    [ MODULUS PTOLEMY: Evolved Gas Analyser ]

6. “  ”      [ MUPUS: Multi-Purpose Sensor for Surface & Subsurface Science ]

7. “  ”  ,   [ ROMAP: RoLand Magentometer & Plasma Monitor ]

8. “ 2 ”    [ SD2: Sample & Distribution Device ]

9. “  ”    ,    [ SESAME: Surface Electrical & Acoustic Monitoring Experiment, Dust Impact Collector ]

  :     [ European Space Operation Centre ( ESOC ) , Darmstadt, Germany ]  :  , ,  [ New Norcia, Near Perth, Australia ]

! [ Philae Lander components ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-lander-components.jpg?w=584 )

     

2007  14         2014         ,        [ Asteroid ]          [ Orion Spacecraft ]  .           .       .                   .       ,        .             .        7  14      .           .

Rosetta Spaceship Launching

* [ March 2, 2004 ] *

! [ Rosetta launching ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/rosetta-launching.jpg?w=540 )

2004  2     -5  [ Ariane-5G+ ]  ,  .     [ Earth Gravity Assist ( Earth ’ s Fly-by ) ] 2005  4   . “   ”        [ Sling-shot like Effect ] .        .         22,500    .            20        !          .       20    ,        .      ,          .

! [ Philae touchdown-3 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/philae-touchdown-32.jpg?w=584 )

    

         [ Kourov, French Guiana ]   . 1993           .   ,   ,     “ - ” ( Churyumov-Gerasimenko )   ( 67P ) .    ,        .     .   “  ” [ Name from Rosetta Stone of Black Basalt with Egyptian Scripts about Ptolemy V ]   .   -5 [ Ariane 5 Generic Rocket Engine, Payload 6-9.5 Tons ] 2004  2    ,      .

! [ Rosetta Orbit ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-orbit.jpg?w=584 )

  ,    , , ,   [ Astroids: Lutetia & Steins ]       [ Gravity Assist Maneuvers ]  . 2005  4       ,    .                 .  [ 2007  25 ]       [ Mars Fly-by ]  .       2007 , 2009   .  ,       2008 , 2010   .

! [ Rosetta-comet orbit ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/11/rosetta-comet-orbit.jpg?w=584 )

          ,     ,    2014   . 2014       ,      .               .                 .     2015    .

22. http://www.spacedaily.com/reports/Touchdown!RosettasPhilaeprobelandsoncomet_999.html [ November 12, 2014 ]

23. http://www.spacedaily.com/reports/Acloseupwithacomet999.html [ November 12, 2014 ]

24. http://www.spacedaily.com/reports/Europeanprobelandsoncometfailstoanchor999.html [ November 12, 2014 ]

25. http://www.bbc.com/news/science-environment-30034060 [ November 13, 2014 ]

26. http://www.spacedaily.com/reports/Philaetoattemptcometdrillmissionscientist_999.html [ November 14, 2014 ]

27. http://www.bbc.com/news/science-environment-30058176 [ November 15, 2014 ]

28. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rosetta_ ( spacecraft ) [ November 15, 2014 ]

29. http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rosetta_ ( sonde_spatiale ) [ ?November 15, 2014 ]

30. http://sci.esa.int/rosetta/14615-comet-67p/ [ November 16, 2014 ]

31. http://storiesbywilliams.com/2014/09/17/news-from-space-rosetta-maps-comet-surface/

32. http://sci.esa.int/rosetta/ ESA Rosetta Website [ June 19, 2015 ]

33. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rosetta_ ( spacecraft ) [ June 20, 2015 ]

34. http://rosetta.jpl.nasa.gov/ [ NASA Rosetta Site ]

35. http://www.space.com/27697-rosetta-comet-landing-full-coverage.html

067 100,000         ?

! [ 6a00d8341bf7f753ef01b8d228d896970c-800wi ] ( http://www.dailygalaxy.com/.a/6a00d8341bf7f753ef01b7c8a79fb9970b-800wi )

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) , 

++++++++++++++++++++

  
   !
  ,
  
 
 !
  
,
  
 ,   
  !
  
  
 ,
  !

++++++++++++++

! [ ice-age-image ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/ice-age-image.jpg?w=584&h=428 )

    

    [ Tiny Fossils ]   ,  100,000   ,   CO2  ,        ,     .

 CO2  ,   ,        [ Ocean Cap ] .

*   [   ,   ] *

! [ nature-of-sediments ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/nature-of-sediments.jpg?w=584&h=710 )

    [ Tiny Fossils ]   ,  ,  100,000        [ CO2 ] ,     .     :  CO2   , ,   .   :   ,       .     ,    .   CO2   ,  ,    .    ,     CO2    .

*   [   ,   ] *

! [ algae-formation-under-sea ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/algae-formation-under-sea.jpg?w=568&h=901 )

      

40,000            .       [ Mid-Paleistocene Transition ]      40,000  100,000   .

           ,      .        ,  &       " *   " [ 100,000 Year Problem ] *  .         .  100,000     ,       .    [ 18,000  ]  ,   16  F [ 8  C ] .   300   .

! [ Image result for earth's precession rotation ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.epm.ethz.ch/research/experimental/experimental-precession/jcrcontent/par/fullwidthimage/image.imageformat.lightbox.42707707.png )

! [ ] ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/MilankovitchCyclesOrbitandCoresRecaptioned.png/400px-MilankovitchCyclesOrbitandCoresRecaptioned.png )

! [ ] ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/82/Gyroscopeprecession.gif/220px-Gyroscopeprecession.gif )

   

1920       [ Serbian Geophysicist / Astronomer ]           :       [ Orbital Eccentricity ] ,    [ Axial Tilt ] &    [ Precession ]        .

26,000     [ Earth's Axis ]   . 100,000    /    . [ Earth's Orbit ] 21,000      [ Wobbling of Earth'a Axis ] .     [ Axis Tilt ] , 41,000   [ 22.1  24.5  ]   .

  ,      .      11,000  .   ,    .      .      [ CO2 ]       .

! [ ice-ages-warming ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/ice-ages-warming.jpg?w=584&h=745 )

    ,            !     ,  [ Ice Sheets ]       

 

‘            ,                 ‘ .

 

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.geocraft.com/WVFossils/PageMillImages/lastglamod.gif )

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.geocraft.com/WVFossils/PageMillImages/presentmod.gif )

‘    !  !   !    ,     .          ,         ‘ .

 

  [ Millennium ]                   !   !     [ Sediments ] !     ,   [ Fossils ] !       !     ! 1960           ,   ,   , ,   , , ,         .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/fig-1-north-americas-shaping.jpg?w=584 )

18,000     ,     .      [ 2 C to 3 C ]   .     .         .    ,  ,            .         300   500   ,    ,   [ ,  ]   [ Land Bridges ]   !  8000             .     [ , , , ,  ]         .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/5-plates-movement-era.jpg?w=584 )

           ,   ,   ,     [ Earth ‘ s Orbit ] .    ,   , ,   ! 100,000      [ Elliptical Orbit ]   ,     [ Near-Perfect Circular Orbit ]   !    [ Focus ]    ,       ,       !            .               .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2011/07/fig-1-last-ice-age1.jpg?w=584 )

    

1960      1.7      250,000      [ Ice Cores ] .      [ Prehistoric Atmospheres ] ,   [ Seasonal Snowfalls ] ,    [ Rocks crushed by Glaciers ] ,  ,      ‘   ‘ [ Time Capsule ] ! 167       [ Sea Cores ] 1.3   .       [ Volcano Trenches ] ,      [ Basalt Pieces ] ,   [ Marine Sediments ] ,         [ Microscopic Shells like Polar Ice ] . 200    4          ,    [ Oceanic Crust & Eroded Centers of Continents ]   !             !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.geocraft.com/WVFossils/PageMill_Images/image167.gif )

, , , ,          ,   200           .          ,        .          .         !

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.geocraft.com/WVFossils/PageMill_Images/image192.gif )

18,000    ,    [  2  C ( 4  F ) ]       !       ,       [ Continental Shelves ]  !      ,     ! , , ,       !     !     .      .    ,         [ 2 C ]   ,        !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.geocraft.com/WVFossils/PageMill_Images/image191.gif )

    ,     ,    !     [ Tilt of Planet Axis ] ,    [ Changes in Earth ‘ s Orbit ] ,   [ Sunspots ]    [ Swells of Radiation ] ,       [ Volcanic Activity Gas Emissions ]    !     ,          .

++++++++++++++++

(  )

:

1. The Continental Mosaic -Reader ‘ s Digest Atlas of the World [ 1987 ]

2. Hutchinson Encyclopedia of the Earth By Peter Smith [ 1985 ]

3. Earth ‘ s Restless Crust -ABC ‘ s of Nature, Reader ‘ s Digest [ 1984 ]

4. The Long Journey of Continents By: Ronald Schiller -The Marvels & Mysteries of The World Around US, Reader ‘ s Digest Publication [ 1972 ]

5. Continental Drift & Plate Tectonics [ www.zephryus.co.uk/geography/home.html ] ( Mar 20, 2003 )

6. Pangaea, Gondwana, Laurasia, Plate Tectonics, Alfred Wegener From: Wikipedia Encyclopedia

7. Theory of Continental Drift By: Jim Cornish, Newfoundland, Canada ( Sep 2001 )

8. Continental Frift, Geology & Oceanography. [ Several Internet Articles ]

9. Everyday Geography By: Kevin McKinney ( 1993 )

10 Eduard Suess, Austrian Scientist From: Wikipedia Encyclopedia

11 Our Changing Earth By: Tusco Wilson Ph.D. Frontiers of Science, National Geographic Society [ 1982 ]

12 This Changing Earth By: Samuel Matthews, National Geographic Society [ Jan 1973 ]

13 Our Restless Planet Earth Rick Gore By: National Geographic Society [ Aug 1985 ]

14 Fossils, Annals of Life Written in Rocks By: David Jeffery, National Geographic Society [ Aug 1985 ]

15 The Earth ‘ s Fractured Surface By: National Geographic Society [ 1995 ]

16 Physical Earth By: National Geographic Society [ 1998 ]

17 The Shaping of a Continent, North America ‘ s Active West [ 1995 ]

18 National Geographic Picture Atlas of our World [ 1990 ]

19 Differences Between Continental & Oceanic Islands [ www.abdn.ac.uk/zoohons/lecture1 ]

20 The Evolution of the Sumatran Earthquake Fault System, Indonesia, Andy McCarthy. Ph.D. [ July 9, 2002 ]

21 Isotopic Dating of Sumatran Fault System By: Imtihanah & MPhil

22 The Sumatran Fault System By Professor Kerry Sieh & Danny Natawidjaja [ Nov 1999 ]

23 Kumari Kandam & Lemuria [ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lemuria_ ( continent )

24 Kumari Kandam By: Chitta Ranjan Myilvaganan, Sydney, Australia. [ Jan 30, 2005 ]

25 Reader ‘ s Digest Publication: The Living Earth Book of Deserts By: Susan Arritt [ 1993 ]

26 Physical Earth, By: National Geographic Society, Millennium in Maps [ 1998 ]

26 [ a ] http://www.geocraft.com/WVFossils/ice_ages.html [ May 9, 2006 ]

27. http://www.dailygalaxy.com/my_weblog/2016/10/solved-mysterious-phenomena-of-earths-100000-year-ice-age-cycle.html? [ October 26, 2016 ]

28. http://www.grandunification.com/hypertext/Earths100000yr_cycle.html

29. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/100,000-year_problem [ September 30, 2016 ]

30. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milankovitch_cycles [ December 13, 2016 ]

31. http://science.sciencemag.org/content/289/5486/1897

32. http://science.sciencemag.org/content/289/5486/1897?variant=full-text&sso=1&ssoredirectcount=1&oauth-code=f8bedaea-fc66-46b1-89a1-3fbcfe87e4cd

33. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ice_age [ December 12, 2016 ]

   !

  !


   !
    !
 
 
  !
 
   !
  ,  !
   !
 
  
    !
  ,
    ?
  
  
   !

     ,    [ Radio Science Experiment ]   .           .

*  [   ,     ] *

  .         [ Ring-Gazing Orbit ]         .       .

  [   ,   * ] *

! [ Image result for Saturn's moons and rings ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.solstation.com/stars/sat1ring.gif )

! [ Image result for Saturn's moons and rings ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.nasa.gov/images/content/224769main_pia01627-browse.jpg )

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/live-news24.com/assets/news_photos/2016/11/24/image-17282.jpg )

    

2016  6  ,             .  4       57,000  [ 91,000 . ]    .     "  " ,  " [ Janus & Epimetheus ]        .    F   [ Saturn's F Ring ]  6,800  .        .     11   .  20   22, 2017   .

! [ Image result for Number of Rings On Saturn ] ( https://i2.wp.com/explanet.info/images/Ch10/10_04.jpg )

! [ Image result for Number of Rings On Saturn ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.oneminuteastronomer.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/03/Saturn-Rings.jpg )

! [ cassini-final-images-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/cassini-final-images-1.jpg?w=584&h=654 )

     [ Titan ]   [ Flyby Swing ]  .  , 1500  [ 2400 .. ]      26, 2017  22    .   15, 2017      ,     .

  1997   2004    . 12 , ,  ,      .         .       [ Enceladus ]   ,      [ Liquid Methane ]

! [ fig-1b-geysers-in-the-south-pole-of-enceladus ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-1b-geysers-in-the-south-pole-of-enceladus.jpg?w=450&h=505 )

    !   101    

! [ Encyladus geysers -2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/encyladus-geysers-21.jpg?w=584 )

   101    ,             .    :  -180  [ -292  F ] .       .    6  , 20 -25        .     ,     ,     .

*  [ ,       ] *

! [ Encyladus geysers -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/encyladus-geysers-1.jpg?w=584 )

        2010   ,    ,    [ 30-40  ]        .    .      [ Condensation of Vapour ]    [ Latent Heat ] .        :      ;      .        !     .

*  [      ] *

“ (   )                !   ,        !           .        , ,      .           . ”

* ,      [  5, 2008 ] *

! [ Enceladus Erupts ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/enceladus-erupts.jpg?w=537&h=886 )

“      ( Ions of the Particles )    [ 12.64 ./ ( 7.5 / ) ]    [ 9.54 ./ ( 6 / ) ]  .      ( Plume from the Jets )  ,    ,        . ”

 , ·  ,   .

! [ Encyladus Icy Moon ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/encyladus-icy-moon2.jpg?w=573&h=761 )

  101    

2014  28 ,         101    [ 101 Geysers ]  .   .          .            .     ,      .        [ Four Tiger Stripes ]         [ Water Particles & Vapour ]    .    101   .        . 2005       .              .

! [ fig-1-saturns-moon-enceladus ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-1-saturns-moon-enceladus.jpg?w=569&h=943 )

        2010   ,    ,    [ 30-40  ]        .    .      [ Condensation of Vapour ]    [ Latent Heat ] .        :      ;      .        !           ,   .

“        ,        [ Yellowstone Park Geysers ]       .     .      ,        ! ”

*  [     (  9, 2006 ) ] *

“    ,             ,    ”

*  [ Wesley Huntress, NASA Scientist ] *

*! [ american-yellowstone-park-geysers ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/american-yellowstone-park-geysers.jpg?w=400&h=830 )
*

“             .      ,         ”

*   [ Dr. Andre Brahic, Professor at University of Paris ] *

“       ‘   ‘ [ Time Machine ] ,   !     ,           ! ”

*  ,     [ Jet Propulsion Laboratory, Pasadena, California ] *

! [ Fountains -1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/fountains-12.jpg?w=584 )

*
*     

2008  5       -  ( Cassini-Huygens Spacecraft )   25 .. ( 15  )        300         .       ( Erupting Plumes )     “   ” ( Yellowstone Park Geysers )   .           .       “  ” ( Tiger Stripe Cracks )  ,     “    ” ( Plumes of Ionic Particles )  E     .    E        .

! [ fig-1a-geysers-in-saturns-moon-enceladus1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-1a-geysers-in-saturns-moon-enceladus1.jpg?w=450&h=757 )

 52  ( 2008  ) 300      1789       ( William Herschel ) .      E  ( Outermost E Ring )   1.37   .    1.37      .                 . E               .      ( Plate Tectonics )  ,         .           ( Geyser Like Volcanic Eruptions )   .   , ,    “  ”         ,      .   2005                !

! [ Encyladus geysers -4 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/encyladus-geysers-4.jpg?w=584 )

        ?

    ,   ( Icy Grains )  .            .        .        ( Plate Tectonics )  .         .    .      ,   .

     1.3  . ( 800   ) .             .            ?         ?          ?               ?

! [ fig-1c-how-the-geyser-does-function ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-1c-how-the-geyser-does-function.jpg?w=530&h=865 )

              .       ( Frictional Heat Generated by Tectonics Plates )     .         ( Radioactive Decay Heat )      .    ,         .     “    ” ( Infrared Radiation Monitor )         .         .        .             .

! [ fig-2-hot-giant-geysers-in-enceladus-south-pole ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-2-hot-giant-geysers-in-enceladus-south-pole.jpg?w=568&h=913 )

     

   ,         .    “ - ”    .       .             .        : ,    “  ” [ LO ]      ( Triton ) . ,        ( Molten Materials ) ,   .

        .    : 145   ( -200  F )  ( -130  C )   40  ( 130   )      .   .          .        , ,    ,    . 2007        3  5      .        .

! [ fig-4-hot-geysers-jump-upon-friction ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-4-hot-geysers-jump-upon-friction.jpg?w=524&h=1074 )

   

1997   2004          ,           !     , 1997  15       ,    2.2   ,   !    , 2004  25     ,     2005  15      . ,  ,   ,                 260    ! 3.4     -     .       -  40    ,      !

! [ fig-3-water-springs ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-3-water-springs.jpg?w=595&h=450 )

2006   9           [ Enceladus ]      [ Geysers ]     !     52 ( 2008  )   .                .      [ Europa ]        .      ,                   !

-    * ?
*
1970-1980      ,  [ Pioneer-11, Voyager-I & II ]       -    ,     .     :

1.      87%       ?

2.          ?

3.       ?

4.     ,     ? [    21 (  :52 )  . ]

! [ fig-5-saturns-moons ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/12/fig-5-saturns-moons.jpg?w=530&h=693 )

5.    [ Enceladus Moon ]       ?      [ Craters ]     ?       ? 2005         ?

6.    [ Iapetus Moon ]        ?     ?

7.       ?

8.    [ Biological Activity ]    [ Methane Compound ]      ?

9.    [ ,  ]  ?

10      [ Complex Organic Compounds ] ,    [ Pre-Biotic Molecules ]   ?

(  )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++

https://youtu.be/4mKtiK4PKBE

:
