069             

! [ our-solar-system-2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/our-solar-system-2.jpg?w=584&h=703 )

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

   
  
     !
  
 
  
  !
  
 
 
   !
  
  
 
 
   !
  
   
 
   !
  
    !
 
  
 ,
  
  !

+++++++++++++++

! [ new-solar-system-kepler-80 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/new-solar-system-kepler-80.jpg?w=584&h=892 )

    ,      [ Random Formation ]   .        [ Habitable Zone ] .     .

*  [ Planetary Scientist, Southwest Research Institute, Colorado, USA ] *

! [ habitable-zone ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/habitable-zone.jpg?w=584&h=680 )

  ,           .       .

*  [ Planetary Scientist, Southwest Research Institute, Colorado, USA ] *

      ,    * [ Systems of Tightly-packed Inner Planets ( STIPs ) ] *    .          ,    5% - 10%   .

*  &   [ University of British Columbia, Canada ] *

! [ solar-system ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/solar-system.jpg?w=584&h=276 )

        [ STIPs ]           .      ,      , 13    13        [ Computer Simulations ]  . 10         .  3  10     .

*  &   [ University of British Columbia, Canada ] *

! [ water-vapor-discovery ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/water-vapor-discovery.jpg?w=526&h=620 )

       ?

      2009       [ Kepler Mission Telescope ]   [ 2016 ]    4696  2331        .         &      .                 .           "     " [ Super Rocky Earths ] ,     "    " [ Giant Hot Jupiter ]  .

   *-80  [ Kepler -80 System ] *      [ 27 days ]   [ Synchronized to be aligned ] .       ,               .            .

! [ Hunt for Earth like planets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/hunt-for-earth-like-planets1.jpg?w=584 )

“         .  ,   .   .         .    , , ,   ,   .     ,        .          . ”

*  [       ] *

! [ water-found-in-exoplanet ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/12/water-found-in-exoplanet.jpg?w=459&h=865 )

    -62e, -62f [ Kepler -62e & Kepler -62f ]   .   -62 [ Kepler -62 ]    .   -62e    .         [ Warm and Humid ] .     -62f      “   ”    .        . ”

*  [    ] [ Dimitar Sasselov ] *

! [ Two Water Planets ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/two-water-planets.jpg?w=507&h=848 ) “        . ” *  &   ( Ray Villard & Adolf Schaller ) * “          ,          . ”

*  ( Ray Jayawardhana, Associate Professor of Astronomy, University of Toronto ) ( 2007 ) *

! [ Kepler -62 System ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/kepler-62-system.jpg?w=540&h=381 )

       

2013  6            .     -62 [ Kepler -62 ] .   -62    .  .      :  -62e,  -62f [ Kepler -62e and Kepler -62f ] .   -62e,      122 ;   -62f    267 .          .

  -62e,    60% ,   -62f 40%    .        ,    .  -62      -62e,  ,     .     -62f  CO2   , “    ” ,         .       .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311h.jpg )

     .

2013  11      63             .   : HD 189733b. 2005             . 2013     .      2.9     .       ,     ,     [ Gravitationally locked ] ,      .      : 2000  F.   : 4500 mph.    [ Cobalt Blue Colour ]          .        [ Silicate Particles ]      . 2007    [ Spitzer Space Telescope ]  ,  -   500  F   .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/08/fig-2-planets-gravitational-lensing.jpg?w=503&h=439 )

       ( Epsilon Eridani )       .      ,     !   ,       ( Brown Dwarf )   .

*   ( Barbara McArthur, Project Leader, University of Texas ) * ”

       [ 12,000  ] .      20       -581   .    0  40    .        .         . ”

*  [ Stephane Udry, Geneva Observatory ] *

! [ Hubble Space Telescope ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/hubble-space-telescope.jpg?w=536&h=720 )

“      ,           .  20   ,    .     ,      .              . ”

*  [ Alison Boyle, Curator of Astronomy, London ’ s Science Museum ] *

“                  .   .       . ”

   * [ Dr. Charles Beichman, Director Caltech ’ s Michelson Science Center ] *

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311aa.jpg ) “       .        .    ?     ?      [ Water Vapour ] ?        ?           . ”

*   [ Member, Terrestrial Planet Finder, NASA ] *

“             !      876 ( Gliese 876 )    !           450    !       ! ”

*  ( Michio Kakau, Professor Theoretical Physicist, City College of New York ) ( 2007 ) *

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/08/fig-3-two-images-in-gravitational-lensing1.jpg?w=529&h=875 )

     !

250            1755             !  [  3, 2008 ] 307               !         .   &  ( NASA & ESA )          . 1991             .     [ 2008 ]  307     !     “  ” ( Methusela ) . 7200            !            !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311ac.jpg ) 2006     ( American Astronomical Journal )      ( Epsilon Eridani Star )      .            . 4.5         !            !     .    – 800   !        !       30    !         ( Planet Jupiter )    !         ( Extra-Solar or Exo-Planet ) !       7   !          , 2007        .! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311ab.jpg )      

     (  25, 2007 ) ,            ,      .          [ Atacama European Science Observatory, ( ESO ) La Silla, Chille, South America ] 3.6  ( 12   )  , ,    .         “ -  ” [ Back-and-Forth Wobble of Stars, caused by the gravitational effect of the unseen Planets ]     .        ;   12,000 .      5 .     :  581 c [ Gliese 581 c ] .  ,     13  .       20.5   .    .     [  186,000   ]    .    ,        !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311ad.jpg )

    [  10, 2013 ] 1051, 797   ]   ( Exoplanets )  ,               .        .           .             .          ,       ·      .

   

2005  17         [ Andrzej Udalski ]       [ Optical Gravitational Lensing Experiment ( OGLE ) ]          ,        .           .     100   .      .        :        !         !            .       1.3  [ 4   ]   600     [ Micro-lensing Experiments ]  .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311e.jpg )

     ?

                [  400  ]   .       1% .      . 1936       ,        .       .         .      :          ,      [   ]     .      .  “   ” [ Einstein Ring ]   .     ,        .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/07/40807311g.jpg )

     

          .               .      ( Glare )  ,    .      ?   ,   ,   ,   ,  ,    ,    ,   ,   ,    ( Astrometry, Radial Velocity or Doppler Method, Pulsar Timing, Tansit Method, Gravitational Micro-Lensing, Circumsteller Discs, Eclipsing Binary, Orbital Phase, Polarimerty ) .               ( Ground-Based Telescopes )  .              .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2008/08/fig-1e-new-planet-details.jpg?w=530&h=813 )

1. 2006         ( COROT )  .

2.        .   &    :

3.    ( Kepler Space Telescope )  2009    .

4.     ( New Worlds Mission )     .

5.   :      ( ESA ’ s Darwin Space Mission ) (   : 2015 )

6.     ( Space Interferomerty Mission ) ( SIM ) (   : 2015 or 2016 )

7.    ( Terrestrial Planet Finder ) ( TRF ) (     . )

8.  (   )  ( PEGASE )

PEGASE is a proposed space mission to build a double-aperture interferometer composed of three free-flying satellites. The goal of the mission is the study of Hot Jupiters ( pegasids ) , brown dwarfs and the interior of protoplanetary disks The mission would be performed by the Centre National d ’ tudes Spatiales and is currently being studied for launch around 2010-2012.

(  )

++++++++++++++++++++++++++

! [ em-drive-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/em-drive-1.jpg?w=584&h=702 )

   [ Liquid Propellant ]        .      ,    ,   .        , 250 kW  720 mN [ micro Newton ]   .

*  [ Roger Sawyer, British Aerospace Engineer ] *

   * "   " [ Relativistic Effect ] *  .     [ Closed Resonator System ]    [ Microwaves ]   ,  ,        .

*  [ Roger Sawyer, British Aerospace Engineer ] *

! [ em-drive-2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/em-drive-2.jpg?w=584&h=702 )

       [ Second Generation Fuel-Less Thrusters ] *   [ Superconductor Technology ] *  .  ,   :    30    [ Specific Thrust : 30 kN ( kilo Newton ) per kW of Input Energy ]  .        [ One kW Microwave Oven ] 3.3   [    ] .        .

*  [ Roger Sawyer, British Aerospace Engineer ] *

! [ em-drive-testing ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/em-drive-testing.jpg?w=500&h=467 )

   

      .

2016  20        [ EM Drive ( Electro-Magnetic Drive ) ]   ,      .      .       .    ,         .    ,    .     70  .    18  .      5 ,   8 ,   9.5  .

! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/first-image-plasma-rocket-to-moon.jpg?w=547&h=426 )

* ( Superfast Plasma Rockets to Moon ) *

! [ universal-specific-thrust ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/universal-specific-thrust.jpg?w=584&h=701 )

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1a-vasimr-rocket-to-mars.jpg?w=584 ) *

* “     ( ( VASIMR )              ( High Power Electric Propulsion System ) . ” *

* “       ‘    ’ ( Transformational Technology in Nuclear Fusion ) .               . ” *

*  ( Franklin Chang-Diaz, VASIMR Plasma Rocket Engine Chief Designer ) *

* “    ( Deep Space -1 Spaceship )      ( Ion Propulsion Engine )           . ” *

* ,  · ( NASA Scientist John Brophy ) ( August 19, 2000 ) *

*
! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1b-chemical-vs-plasma-rockets1.jpg?w=584 )
*

* “ (     ) ( Solar Electric Ion Engine )              .                .      .       ‘    ’ ( Aurora ) . ” *

*  ( Roger Walker, ESA Advasnced Concepts Team ) *

* “       (   )  ,     . ” *

*  ( Neutel Project Chief Executive Officer ) *

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1b-simplified-plasma-engine.jpg?w=584 )
*

* “      ,    .                .       ( Micro-Gravity )  ,   ( Solar Radiation )       . ” *

*  ( Canadian Astronaut Twice in Space ) *

* “       .   ,  ( Efficiency ) . 50        . ” *

*  ( Neutel Project Head Engineer ) *

* “   .  ,           .   ( VASIMR )       ( Work Horse for the Transformational Infrastructure )   . ” *

*  ( Franklin Chang-Diaz, VASIMR Plasma Rocket Engine Chief Designer ) *

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1-plasma-rocket-to-mars.jpg?w=584 ) *

    

1960 -1970         -5  ( Saturn V Rocket )    .    ( Space Shuttle )     .        !           !    300    .      .      .              ,       .       .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1c-vasimr-space-missions.jpg?w=584 ) *

   200 .        .          .     ( Solid or Liquid Fuel )             .      2013         ( International Space Station )     .

  1963–1965           .  1998         ( Spaceship : Deep Space -1 )     ( Comet Borrelly )   .      200    .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1c-vasimr-details.jpg?w=584 ) *

  ( ESA -European Spase Agency ) 2003        ( Ion Engine for SMART -1 Spacecraft )  .          “     ’ ( Radio Station Transmitters )    .

    ( Nautel Ltd. of Hacketts Cove with Texas Rocket Compay )      ( Texas Rocket Company, Ad Astra )     .          ( Golf Bag Size Radio Frequency Generator ) .        ( Microwave Oven Heater )           ( Xenon or Argon Gas into Plasma )  .             .         .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1e-plasma-rocket-fuel.jpg?w=584 ) *

     ?

     -1  ( SMART -1 Lunar Probe )           .               .     :  ( Xenon Gas ) .

1.                ( Positively Charged Xenon Ions ) .

2.     ( Electric Coils )         ( Cathode ) .

3.    ,         .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1f-types-of-old-rockets.jpg?w=584 ) *

4.              .

,         ,      .          .    . .    .          .     .     ,  .      .          .  -1   ‘     ’ ( Solar Electric Propulsion )  .          16,000 . (  9600  ) .   375 ..      15  .  -1     110   ( 133  US  ) .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-1g-ion-rocket-engine.jpg?w=584 ) *

    

     ( Plasma Starts at 10,000 C )     ( Ionized Gas Fuel )     ( Fusion Technology ) .      . ,  ,  ( Forward Cell, Central Cell & Aft Cell )       .

1.   :    , ,            .

2.    :         ( Amplifier )   .       ( Microwave Oven )   .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-2-esa-lunar-probe-smart-1.jpg?w=584 ) *

3.   :     ‘    ’ ( Magnetic Nozzle )      100   C      ( Plasma )     .      ( Space Shuttle )    25,000   !               . ( Action & Reaction are equal & opposite ) .

*    ( Rocket ’ s Specific Impulse ) *

        .         .              .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-3-esa-lunar-plasma-thruster.jpg?w=584 ) *

Rocket Engines | Type | Thrust ( Pound Force ) * | *Specific Impulse ( Seconds ) * | *Lifetime Fuel Usage
-|-|-|-|-
Saturn V F-1 ( 1x ) ( 1960 years ) * | *Chemical | 1,700,000 | 298 | minutes
Space Shuttle Main Engine ( 1x ) ( 1980 years ) * | *Chemical | 500,000 | 440 | minutes
NSTAR Ion Engine ( 1 ) * | *Electric | 0.02 | 3300 | years
NEXT Ion Engine ( 2 ) * | *Electric | 0.07 | 4300 | years
*VASIMR ® VX-200 ( New Plasma Rocket ) *

* ( 2005 ) * | Electric | 1 | 5000 | > years

        .    ‘     ’ ( Fuel Efficiency of Rocket Engine )  ‘    ’ ( Specific Impulse )    .    ( Unit Fuel )     ( Unit Thrust )        . ‘    ’ ( Specific Impulse )  ( Seconds )  .

           300      ( Specific Impulse ) . ,    ( Liquid or Solid Chemical Fuel Rocket )     ‘    ’ ( Specific Impulse )   450 .

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-4-esa-lunar-probe-reaches-moon.jpg?w=525&h=723 ) *

   ( 500  )      ( Lb Force ) 450   .      ,    ‘    ’ 135,000   ( 450 X 300 = 135000 ) .

        2  .     40     .            !

*! [ ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2010/06/fig-6-international-space-station.jpg?w=584 ) *

* (  ) *

071     !     .

! [ luminosity-of-birth-star-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/luminosity-of-birth-star-1.jpg?w=584&h=926 )

**

.  B.E. ( Hons ) P.Eng ( Nuclear ) 

**

http://slideplayer.com/slide/1374764/

      .         .    [ Opaque Envelope ]         .  ,         ,    .

*  [ Emmy Noether Research Group for Massive Star Formation, Germany ] *

! [ protostar-formation ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/protostar-formation.jpg?w=584&h=423 )

       ,            .    ,      ,     .

*  [    ] *

! [ Life cycle of a Massive Star ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/life-cycle-of-a-massive-star.jpg?w=595&h=401 )

:               ( New Star Systems ) .                     .  5              ,    ,          !

! [ luminosity-of-stars-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/luminosity-of-stars-1.jpg?w=662&h=606 )

     

  ,     ,  .   :          .          .     ,    [ GRB - German Research Foundation ] [ Emmy Noether Research Group for Massive Star Formation ]     [ Rolf Kuiper ] .

       [ Computer Numerical Simulation ]    .     [ High Performance Computers ]  .          .         [ Accretion Disk ]  .        ,      .

[ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9j1AKzICLts?version=3&rel=1&fs=1&autohide=2&showsearch=0&showinfo=1&ivloadpolicy=1&wmode=transparent ]

[ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0wP5GPFALCg?version=3&rel=1&fs=1&autohide=2&showsearch=0&showinfo=1&ivloadpolicy=1&wmode=transparent ]

! [ Life cycle of a Star ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/life-cycle-of-a-star.jpg?w=584&h=305 )

     ,           !        ( Density )      ( Muli-colour Bands ) .        !       .       ,        !   “   ” ,   ( Protostars & Protoplanets )    ( Steller System Forerunners ) .

! [ luminosity-of-stars-2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/luminosity-of-stars-2.jpg?w=584&h=582 )

       ( 1910-1995 )   ,  ( Black Holes )       .        .      1.4           ( Neutron Star or Black Hole )   .   1.4   “   ” ( Chandrasekher Limit )     .  “  ”  ( White Dwarf Stars )  ,   .

! [ luminosity-of-stars-3 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/luminosity-of-stars-3.jpg?w=584&h=539 )

    !

    ,          !    [ Stellar Parallaxes ]  , 1838      .        .      ,    !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271aa.jpg )

   ,       [ Milky Way Galaxy ] !        !   ,       ,        !          ,  100     !      !   !

! [ luminosity-of-stars ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/luminosity-of-stars.jpg?w=584&h=453 )

  !    !    !     !         ,   ,  ,  ,  ,   [ Light Spectrum ] ,        !

        .      5000-10,000   !    [ Nova Star ]  .  [ Supernova ]         100    .    , , , , ,        ,      !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271ab.jpg )

Supernova & White Dwarf

   1.4  [ 1.4 times Solar Mass ]      [ White Dwarf ]     . [     ( Mass ) ,        .   !    [ Density ]   ! ]      ,   [ Supernova Explosion ]      ,    [ Neutron Star ] .   10    ,   ,    [ Black Hole ] .     ,  ,           .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271ac.jpg )

   

        1910    19   . 1930          ..   [ Nephew ] ,    !        .         .       ! 1918    ,       [ 1922-1925 ]    .

! [ Star Life cycle ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/star-life-cycle.jpg?w=584&h=407 )

  ..       , 1930     B.Sc.  .     ,       .        1933   Ph.D.  . 1936         .     [ Sir Arthur Eddington ] ,  [ E.A. Milne ]        .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271ad.jpg )

Sun ’ s Evolutionary Tracks

     1937    [ Research Assistant ]   ,  . 1938     [ Astrophysics ]  ,       [ Morton Hull ]   .     ,    [ Yerks Observatory, Williams Bay, Wisconsin ] .  1953    . 1952         ,      1986   .     ,      [ Theory on the Later Stages of Stellar Evolution ]    1983   ,    · [ William Fowler ]  .      [ Neutron Stars ] .  [ Black Holes ]    .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271ae.jpg )

H-R Diagram

 ,  

       [ Einjar Hertzsprung ]     [ Henri Russell ]     ,  ,  

    .  - [ Hertzsprung-Russell, H-R Diagram ]             .    [ Luminosity in Y-Axis ] ,    [ Temperature in X-Axis ] ,         .  10%        [ Main Sequence ]  .    ,      .       !     [ Super Giants ] !     [ Giant Stars ] !        [ Red Giants ] !       ,      [ White Dwarfs ] .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271af.jpg )

Supergiants & White Dwarfs

    ,       !       [ Red Giant ] ,      ,      ,    ,        ,      !     ,       .     ,     ,    [ Thermonuclear Reaction ]    .     ,     [ Sustained Fusion Reaction ] !

1930   ,          ,         .       [ White Dwarfs ]   .       [ Nuclei ]     [ Extremely High Density ]   ,     100,000-1000,000        !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271b.jpg )

Structure of a Star

     

       [ Evolution of Stars ] ,   [ Structure ]      [ Process of Energy Transfer ] ,      .  [ White Dwarfs ]   ,   ·  [ Ralph Fowler ] ,   [ Arthur Eddington ]        .

  [ Degenerate Matter ]    [ Extremely High Density ]  ,     [ Ionized Nuclei ] ,        1926     .

! [ Image result for subramanian chandrasekher ] ( https://i2.wp.com/image.slidesharecdn.com/scientists-140222211810-phpapp02/95/scientists-8-638.jpg )

        ,        .   ‘     ‘ [ An Introduction to the Study of Stellar Structure ]  ,           ,           .       [ Mass ]    !  ,    !    [ Gravitational Collapse ] ,     [ Relatively Constant ]     .    ,    [ Highly Compressed Electrons ]  ,   ,    [ White Dwarf ]    !

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271c.jpg )

What is a White Dwarf ?

      ?

1936  1939     [ Theory of White Dwarfs ] .    ,    [ Radius is inversely proportional to Mass ] !    1.4       !       1.4      ,    [ Nova Explosion ]  !          !      ,          !        1.4       !         [ 1.4 ] ‘   ‘ [ Chandrasekar Limit ]    .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271d.jpg )

Red Giant turning to White Dwarf

      [ Special Theory of Relativity ]     [ Principles of Quantum Physics ]    ,   . ‘    1.4      ,          .         [ Thermonuclear fuel ]    ,           ’ .

       ,     [ 1.4 ]    !      ,     [ Nuclear-Burning Lifetime ] ,     [ Neutron Star ] !    [ Black Hole ] !             .           ,    [ Supernovas ]   . [     ( Internal Nuclear Explosion )     ,   ] .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271e.jpg )

Star turning to Black Dwarf

   !

1968      ,     [ Archibald Wheeler ] .          [ John Mitchell ( 1783 ) ] ,        [ Piere Simon de Laplace ( 1796 ) ]       .

 [ Black Hole ]    [ Highly Dense ] ,      !           .  ,   ,    [ Electromagnetic Radiation ]     !

! [ star-formation-cycle ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/star-formation-cycle.jpg?w=584&h=389 )

 

        ;       !       ,       !     [ X-Rays ] ,     [ Radio Telescopes ]    .        ,   ,  [ Gravitation ]     !       [ Spherical Boundary ]  .      .   !       .   [ Gravitation Collapse ]   !   !                .  ,      ;     .

! [ our-sun ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/our-sun.jpg?w=584&h=417 )

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271f.jpg )

Star Structure

    

       !     !   ,     !        !   [ White Dwarfs ]   .              !

    [ Final Collapse ]  ,      [ Heavier Elements ]     !     [ Supernova ]     [ Galaxies ]     !    ,    ,    [ Core ]  !   ,     ,      !     [ Extremely Dense ]  ,    ,    [ Neutron Star ] !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271g.jpg )

Steller Formation seen By Hubble Telescope

        [ Beams of Radio Waves ] ,          [ Pulses ] !      [ Pulsar ]  .    9 !        !

     !  !

       ,      !    [ Radius ]  ,       !

! [ Star formation process ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/star-formation-process.jpg?w=584 )

   ,    ,      !        ,     !

        !      ,   .    [ Galaxy ]   [ Milky Way ] ,   !         !        .         1  [ 1.5 km ]    !     [ Other Galaxies ]    !

! [ ] ( https://i1.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271h.jpg )

The Spinning Black Hole

    

  [ Red Giant ]        !    ,       ,     [ Luminosity ]    .         [ Supernova ]  .    [ 1.4    ]       .      [ Parent Atoms ]    ,   [ Matter ]    [ Degenerate Gas ] !      ,    [ Gas Laws ] !     !        ,  ,   [ Yellow Dwarf ] ,   [ Red Dwarf ] ,   [ Brown Dwarf ]    [ Black Dwarf ]     !

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2007/12/40712271i.jpg )

Supernova turning to a Black Hole

    

1952  1971     [ Astrophysics Journal ]     [ Managing Editor ]  .       [ American Astronomical Society ]   . 1953      [ Royal Astronomical Society ]    . 1955      [ National Academy of Science ]  .    .       [ Energy Transfer By Radiation in Stellar Atmospheres ] ,     [ Convection in Solar Surface ] ,     [ An Introduction to the Study of Stellar Structure ( 1939 ) ] ,    [ Priciples of Stellar Dynamics

( 1942 ) ] ,   [ Radiative Transfer ( 1950 ) ] ,   &    [ Hydrodynamic & Hydromagnetic Stability ( 1961 ) ] ,    [ Mathematical Theory of Black Holes ( 1983 ) ] .   [ Truth & Beauty ] ,    [ Aesthetics & Motivation in Science ( 1987 ) ] .     [ The Polarization of Starlight ] ,      [ Convection of Fluids in Magnetic Fields ] .

! [ Solar Sytem formation ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/06/solar-sytem-formation.jpg?w=584 )

1999       [ Premier Unmanned Scientific Satellite ]    [ X-Ray Observatory ] .         [ Advanced X-Ray Astrophysics Facility ] . “    ”    ,    ,     .          .     ,      [ Pulsar in Crab Nebula ] ,   [ Cassiopeia A Supernova ]  .

! [ Image result for subramanian chandrasekher ] ( https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/2c/a2/9e/2ca29e3494ee7ce5b2d77f359d02c187.jpg )

  84      1995    21   .   1995     : ‘     ’ [ Newton ‘ Principia ’ for the Common Reader ] .       [ Tsung-Dao Lee, Chen Ning Yang ] 1957    [ Particle Physics ]   !     ,             · [ Enrico Fermi ] !             . ..  ,             !

++++++++++++++++++

! [ solar-position-for-supermoon ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/solar-position-for-supermoon.jpg?w=584&h=584 )

   
  !
     !
   !
  
 
   !
 
  ” *
*  
 
  !
   


  !
   
 
  !
   
 
   !
   
 
 !
*
*++++++++++++++++++++

! [ Image result for november 14, 2016 supermoon ] ( https://i1.wp.com/wac.450f.edgecastcdn.net/80450F/klaq.com/files/2016/11/RS9985_186328599.jpg )

! [ Image result for november 14, 2016 supermoon ] ( https://i1.wp.com/static3.businessinsider.com/image/567d6917c08a8017028b4f15-2400/gettyimages-490323138.jpg )

++++++++++++++++

  

2016  14       ,        !        .   * "   " *        !     69   ,  ,       .    ,   *221,524  [ 356,509 .. ] * .  ,   216,486  [ 348,401 .. ]  .      13      .

1948  26          .      2034  25  .

! [ apsidal-precession-of-moon ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/apsidal-precession-of-moon.jpg?w=584&h=507 )

  

! [ ] ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/89/PrecessingKeplerorbit280framese0.6_smaller.gif )

    .   .    : 238,900  [ 384,400 .. ] .    [ Perigee ]   [ Apogee ]        ,   .    -     .  ,   ,  [ 2% ]  .     - , , ,    .

! [ A commerical jet flies in front of the moon on its approach to Heathrow airport on November 13, 2016. ] ( https://i2.wp.com/i2.cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/161114130447-supermoon-november-2016-exlarge-169.jpg )

2016  14    ]    * [ Perigean Full Moon ] *   .     * "   " [ Supermoon ] *    .  1979   * :   [ Astrologer Richard Nolle ] *.   7% ,  15%  .      16%   .       .    30     .

+++++++++++++++++++

! [ super-moon-5 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/super-moon-5.jpg?w=559&h=579 )

“               ( Remnants of an Ancient Planet )       !             !      ( Theia ) .    .     .    4.5           . ”

*  ( NASA STEREO Project Scientist ) (  14, 2009 ) *

! [ Image result for november 14, 2016 supermoon ] ( https://i1.wp.com/i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2013/06/23/article-0-1A7185A4000005DC-972_634x583.jpg )

! [ moons-orbit-around-earth-1 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/moons-orbit-around-earth-1.jpg?w=584&h=438 ) *
*
“      ( Bulk Silicate )       ( Isotopic Composition ) .       “   ” ( Isotopic Equilibration )        .

*   ( Nature Science Journal ) *

! [ super-moon-8 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/super-moon-8.jpg?w=584&h=436 )

     

4.5                    “    ” ( The Giant Impact Hypothesis )    !      “  ” ( Theia )  .    :         ,  .    ?       .       ( Relatively Small Iron Core ) .

! [ super-moon-2 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/super-moon-2.jpg?w=584&h=292 )

 .       .     :          ( Iron Oxide or Siderophilic Elements ) ( Siderophile Elements : Any element that has a weak affinity for oxygen and sulfur and that is readily soluble in molten iron. Siderophile elements include iron itself, nickel, cobalt, platinum, gold, tin, and tantalum. )    ( Ratio of Volatile Elemets )  ?          ( Magma Ocean )        !

! [ supermoon-12 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/supermoon-12.jpg?w=565&h=545 )

   

1898      ( George Howard Darwin ) (       )         .           ( Centrifugal Force )         .                  .     ,       .

! [ Fig 1 The Theia Planet Theory ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-1-the-theia-planet-theory.jpg?w=540&h=528 )

              ! 1946         ( Reginald Aldworth Daly )    ,             .      1975     ,      .          .

! [ Fig 1B The Birth of the Moon ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-1b-the-birth-of-the-moon.jpg?w=546&h=610 )

    

     .     .      . 4.5           .     ,     .      .        ( Lagrangian Points L4 or L5 Relative to Earth )        .       60    60      .             !             !

! [ Fig 1C Earth & Moon Axes Tilts ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-1c-earth-moon-axes-tilts.jpg?w=547&h=529 )

   –   ,   .      ,       !   ( Mantle )           !           .   ( Computer Simulations )   2%              .         .

! [ Image result for november 14, 2016 supermoon ] ( https://i1.wp.com/c.tadst.com/gfx/750x500/super-full-moon-bangkok.jpg )

   “   ” ( Angular Momentum )  ( Mass )     .    ,         5    !         !       ,        .    ,         100          !

! [ Fig 1E NASA's STEREO Probes ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-1e-nasas-stereo-probes.jpg?w=584 )

    

1969-1970        ( Apollo Moon Missions )            .      “    ” ( Oxygen Isotope Materials )   .  ,       ( Same Region of the Solar System )    !          ( Volatile Elemets that melt at high Temperatures )   !           .

! [ Fig 4 STEREO Twin Probes Looking at the Sun ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-4-stereo-twin-probes-looking-at-the-sun.jpg?w=584 )

         ( Earth ’ s Mantle )  .          .               ! -11        “  ” ( Anorthosite ) .    ,    ( Sodium & Calcium Aluminiuam Silicates )  .

! [ Fig 3 STEREO Probe's Tools ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-3-stereo-probes-tools.jpg?w=647&h=560 )

   

    ( NASA ’ s Space Weather Monitoring Spacecraft STEREO )       2006   25       .        ( NASA ’ s Solar Terrestrial Probes ) .          ( 3D Probing )    ( Anatomy of Solar Storms )   .   ( Sun Spots )  !     .          ( Lagrangian Point Zones L4 & L5 )         2%    !              !

! [ Fig 2 The Giant Impact Theory ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2009/05/fig-2-the-giant-impact-theory.jpg?w=538&h=624 )

      ( Asteroids )     ( Gravitaional Parking Lots )  .                    .                 ( Oxygen Isotope Compositions )   .

! [ Image result for november 14, 2016 supermoon ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.pakistantv.tv/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/sUPER-mOON.jpg )

! [ super-moon-9 ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/super-moon-9.jpg?w=584&h=507 )

[  ]
+++++++++++++++++++

   !
 
    !
 
  
  !
    !
  !
 
   !  !
   !
  !
  !
  
  !
   !
, , 
  !
   
**    *
*  !

+++++++++++++++++

! [ early-earth-spin-altered ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2016/11/early-earth-spin-altered.jpg?w=584&h=584 )

     ?

  ,     ,      5     .    "    " [ The Giant Impact Theory ] .         ,       .

! [ Is Earth a Satellite to the Moon ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/is-earth-a-satellite-to-the-moon.jpg?w=584 )

 -         [ Theoretical Computer Modelling ]  ,      ,    ,        .          [ Computer Simulations ]  , "   " [ Big Whack ]    .    [   ]  [ Orbit ]   .     ,   *  [ Ecliptic ] *     [ 23.5  ]   .    ,     ,  ,          .

! [ ] ( https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/61/AxialTiltObliquity.png )

  ,    [  1.5″  ]      ,         . ,      ,    .  ,     .     5   ,   24   .

          .    [ 2012 ]      &   [ Cuk & Sara Stewart ]      .    ,  ,    2     .

! [ Protoplanet Impact ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/protoplanet-impact.jpg?w=584 )

“   ,   . ” **

*  ,   ( 1865-1939 ) *

             .

*,    ( 1596-1650 ) *

,      .

*,   “   ” ( 1608-1674 ) *

     .

*     ( 1564-1616 ) *

! [ Fig 1 The Theia Planet Theory ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/fig-1-the-theia-planet-theory.jpg?w=584 )

        ?

    95             2014  2    “   ” [ Nature Journal ]   .      , 4.470       [ Proto-Earth ]   ,           .      32   ,  .    4.567         .      [ Oldest Meteorites ]      .     150        ..

! [ Moon birth Era ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/moon-birth-era.jpg?w=584 )

    ,        .            .       ( 30 -200 )        .    ,         [ Radioactive Decay of unstable Elements ]    .

2014  2         .   , ,    [ Planetary Scientists ]  “    ” [ Computer Simulation Model ]  .        ,     “   ” [ Planetesimals ]    .    , , , ,    [ Planetary Embryos ]  .            .          0.5%   .        95    ,             .

! [ Earth Moon comparision ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/earth-moon-comparision1.jpg?w=584 )

     

                ,  ,  ( Liquid, Solid & Vapour )     .              !              !           !   ,              !                      .

    , ,  (  ) ,       ( Solid Matter ) .        .    , , ,        ?          .            .

! [ Moon formation ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/moon-formation.jpg?w=584 )

     

   ,    .         .   .    63 ,  62 ,  27 ,  13    .                .  “   ”  ( Co-Accretion )    .                   .   ( Capture Theory )   ,          .   ( Fission Theory ) :          ( Semi-fluid State )         .  “   ” ( Condensation Theory ) .       “  ” ( Nebula )     ,   .

1969-1970        ( Apollo Moon Missions )            .      “    ” ( Oxygen Isotope Materials )   .  ,       ( Same Region of the Solar System )    !          ( Volatile Elemets that melt at high Temperatures )   !           .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802711d.jpg )

         ( Earth ’ s Mantle )  .          .               ! -11        “  ” ( Anorthosite ) .    ,    ( Sodium & Calcium Aluminiuam Silicates )  .

     

                :

1.     [ ( Moon ’ s Density 3.3 gram/c.c ) ( Earth ’ s Density 5.5 gram/c.c ) ]   ,    ( Iron Core )      .

2.       ( Volatile Substances ) .         ( Baking of Lunar Surface ) .

3.            ( Relative Abundane of Oxygen Isotopes ) .       ,   .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802712.jpg )

     

              .      ,  “    ” ( The Giant Impact Theory )    .

*1.   ( The Fission Theory ) *

                    .             !           .   .    ( Earth ’ s Mantle )     .   ,          .          “    ” ( Fossil Evidences )   ?         .       ( Baked Rock Substances )       .

! [ The big impact ] ( https://jayabarathan.files.wordpress.com/2014/04/the-big-impact.jpg?w=584 )

*2.   ( The Capture Theory ) *

   :       ,           .           ,        .                  .       ( Baked Rock Substances )       .

*3.   ( The Condensation Theory ) *

    “  ” ( Nebula ) ,                !          “    ” ( Same Dense Iron Core )     .       ( Composition of Materials )  .       ( Baked Rock Substances )       .

4.        * ( The Giant Impact Theory or The Ejected Ring Theory ) *

       .        ,      ,            .     .       .         !      ,          .          .

! [ ] ( https://i2.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802717.jpg )

     

1970            ( The Giant Impact Theory ) .       , “ -  ” ( Off-center Impact )   .         ( Fast Inititial Spin )   ,          .             .    “    ”   . 1984        ,         .

50                     !     ,       ( Robin Canup, Southwest Research Institute ) ,  ·     ( Erik Asphaug )    “    ” ( Computer Simulation )  .

! [ ] ( https://i0.wp.com/www.thinnai.com/photos/2008/02/sc40802716.jpg )

[  ]

:
